XXbsu021_u:6: ekasmin samaye bhagavāṃllaṅkāpure samudramalayaśikhare viharati sma nānāratnagotrapuṣpapratimaṇḍite mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ mahatā ca bodhisattvagaṇena nānābuddhakṣetrasaṃnipatitairbodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ anekasamādhivaśitābalābhijñāvikrīḍitairmahāmatibodhisattvapūrvaṃgamaiḥ sarvabuddhapāṇyabhiṣekābhiṣiktaiḥ svacittadṛśyagocaraparijñānārthakuśalairnānāsattvacittacaritrarūpanayavinayadhāribhiḥ pañcadharmasvabhāvavijñānanairātmyādvayagatiṃgataiḥ tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavān sāgaranāgarājabhavanāt saptāhenottīrṇa
XXbsu021_u:8: anekaśakrabrahmanāgakanyākoṭibhiḥ pratyudgamyamāno laṅkāmalayamavalokya smitamakarot - pūrvakairapi tathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairasmiṃllaṅkāpurīmalayaśikhare svapratyātmāryajñānatarkadṛṣṭitīrthyaśrāvakapratyekabuddhāryaviṣaye tadbhāvito dharmo deśitaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:9: yannvahamapi atraiva rāvaṇaṃ yakṣādhipatimadhikṛtya etadevodbhāvayan dharmaṃ deśayeyam //
XXbsu021_u:10: aśrauṣīdrāvaṇo rākṣasādhipatistathāgatādhiṣṭhānāt - bhagavān kila sāgaranāgarājabhavanāduttīrya anekaśakrabrahmanāgakanyākoṭibhiḥ parivṛtaḥ
XXbsu021_u:11: puraskṛtaḥ samudrataraṃgānavalokya ālayavijñānodadhipravṛttivijñānapavanaviṣaye preritāṃstebhyaḥ saṃnipatitebhyaścittānyavalokya tasminneva sthitaḥ udānamudānayati sma -
XXbsu021_u:13: tanme syāddīrgharātramarthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca //
XXbsu021_u:14: atha rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipatiḥ saparivāraḥ pauṣpakaṃ vimānamadhiruhya yena bhagavāṃstenopajagāma
XXbsu021_u:15: upetya vimānādavatīrya saparivāro bhagavantaṃ triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tūryatālāvacaraiḥ pravādyadbhirindranīlamayena daṇḍena vaiḍūryamusāra(galva)pratyuptāṃ vīṇāṃ priyaṅgupāṇḍunā anardhyeṇa
XXbsu021_u:16: vastreṇa pārśvāvalambitāṃ kṛtvā ṣaḍjarṣabhagāndhāradhaivataniṣādamadhyamakaiśikagītasvaragrāmamūrchanādiyuktenānusārya salīlaṃ vīṇāmanupraviśya gāthābhigītairanugāyati sma -
XXbsu021_u:18: pratyātmavedyagatisūcanakaṃ deśehi nāyaka iha dharmanayam // Lank_1.1 //
XXbsu021_u:21: pratyātmavedyagatidharmarataṃ laṅkāṃ hi gantu samayo 'dya mune // Lank_1.2
XXbsu021_u:23: deśehi nātha iha dharmavaraṃ śroṣyanti yakṣa bahurūpadharāḥ // Lank_1.3 //
XXbsu021_u:24: atha rāvaṇo laṅkādhipatiḥ toṭakavṛttenānugāyya punarapi gāthābhigītenānugāyati sma -
XXbsu021_u:26: sāgarendrasya bhavanāt samuttīrya taṭe sthitaḥ // Lank_1.4 //
XXbsu021_u:29: ṛddhyā gatvā tamadhvānaṃ yatra tiṣṭhati nāyakaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:33: anugṛhṇāhi me laṅkāṃ ye cāsmin puravāsinaḥ // Lank_1.7 //
XXbsu021_u:38: śrotukāmā vayaṃ cādya ye ca laṅkānivāsinaḥ // Lank_1.9 //
XXbsu021_u:57: anukampārthaṃ mahyaṃ vai yāhi laṅkāṃ sutaiḥ saha // Lank_1.17 //
XXbsu021_u:60: ājñākaro 'haṃ buddhānāṃ ye ca teṣāṃ jinātmajāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:61: nāsti tadyanna deyaṃ me anukampa mahāmune // Lank_1.19 //
XXbsu021_u:67: anukampyo 'si yakṣendra sugatānāṃ mamāpi ca // Lank_1.22 //
XXbsu021_u:72: tatra gatvā purīṃ ramyāṃ punaḥ pūjāṃ pralabdhavān /
XXbsu021_u:83: ahaṃ hi śrotā yakṣāśca jinaputrāśca sanniha /
XXbsu021_u:84: adhyeṣayāmi tvāṃ yakṣā jinaputrāśca paṇḍitāḥ // Lank_1.29 //
XXbsu021_u:86: adhyeṣayāmi tvāṃ bhaktyā nayaṃ pṛccha viśārada // Lank_1.30 //
XXbsu021_u:92: tatraiva rāvaṇo yakṣa ekaikasmin vyavasthitaḥ // Lank_1.33 //
XXbsu021_u:93: atra tāḥ parṣadaḥ sarvā ekaikasmin hi dṛśyate /
XXbsu021_u:94: sarvakṣetrāṇi tatraiva ye ca teṣu vināyakāḥ // Lank_1.34 //
XXbsu021_u:100: dideśa nikhilaṃ sūtraṃ śatasāhasrikaṃ girau // Lank_1.36 //
XXbsu021_u:102: adrākṣīdrāvaṇo yakṣa ātmabhāvaṃ gṛhe sthitam // Lank_1.37 //
XXbsu021_u:103: cinteti kimidaṃ ko 'yaṃ deśitaṃ kena vā śrutam /
XXbsu021_u:104: kiṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kena vā dṛṣṭaṃ nagaro vā kva saugataḥ // Lank_1.38 //
XXbsu021_u:105: tāni kṣetrāṇi te buddhā ratnaśobhāḥ kva saugatāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:106: svapno 'yamatha vā māyā nagaraṃ gandharvaśabditam // Lank_1.39 //
XXbsu021_u:109: atha vā dharmatā hyeṣā dharmāṇāṃ cittagocare /
XXbsu021_u:110: na ca bālāvabudhyante mohitā viśvakalpanaiḥ // Lank_1.41 //
XXbsu021_u:111: na draṣṭā na ca draṣṭavyaṃ na vācyo nāpi vācakaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:113: ye paśyanti yathādṛṣṭaṃ na te paśyanti nāyakam // Lank_1.42 //
XXbsu021_u:116: apravṛttibhave buddhaḥ saṃbuddho yadi paśyati // Lank_1.43 //
XXbsu021_u:118: 'vikalpapracārasthitasya laṅkādhipateḥ pūrvakuśalamūlasaṃcoditasya sarvaśāstravidagdhabuddheryathātathyadarśanasya aparapraṇeyasya svabuddhivicālanakuśalasya tarkadṛṣṭivyapetadarśanasya aparapraṇeyasya
XXbsu021_u:119: mahāyogayogino mahāviśvarūpadhāriṇaḥ upāyakauśalyagatiṃgatasya sarvabhūmyuttarottarasvalakṣaṇādhigamanakuśalasya cittamagomanovijñānasvabhāvavivekaratasya trisaṃtativyavacchinnadarśanasya sarvakāraṇatīrthyavyapetabuddheḥ tathāgatagarbhabuddhabhūmyadhyātmasamāpannasya sthitabuddhabuddhergaganādadhyātmavedyaśabdamaśrauṣīt - sādhu sādhu laṅkādhipate, sādhu khalu punastvaṃ laṅkādhipate /
XXbsu021_u:120: evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yoginā yathā tvaṃ śikṣase /
XXbsu021_u:121: evaṃ ca tathāgatā draṣṭavyāḥ dharmāśca, yathā tvayā dṛṣṭāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:129: eṣa laṅkādhipate abhisamayo mahāyogināṃ parapravādamathanānāmakuśaladṛṣṭidālanānāmātmadṛṣṭivyāvartanakuśalānāṃ sūkṣmamabhivijñānaparāvṛttikuśalānāṃ jinaputrāṇāṃ mahāyānacaritānām /
XXbsu021_u:131: evaṃ kriyamāṇe bhūyo 'pyuttarottaraviśodhako 'yaṃ laṅkādhipate mārgo yastvayā
XXbsu021_u:143: atha tasminnantare rāvaṇasyaitadabhavat - yannvahaṃ punarapi bhagavantaṃ
XXbsu021_u:144: sarvayogavaśavartinaṃ tīrthyayogavyāvartakaṃ pratyātmagatigocarodbhāvakaṃ nairmitanairmāṇikavyapetamadhigamabuddhiryadyogināṃ yogābhisamayakāle samādhimukhe samāptānāmadhigamo bhavati /
XXbsu021_u:145: tasya ca adhigamādyogināṃ yogaśabdo nipātyate adhigamaneneti /
XXbsu021_u:146: tadahaṃ kāruṇikaṃ kleśendhanavikalpakṣayakaraṃ taṃ jinaputraiḥ parivṛtaṃ sarvasattvacittāśayānupraviṣṭaṃ sarvagataṃ sarvajñaṃ kriyālakṣaṇavinivṛttaṃ tayaivamṛddhyā (Vaidya 6) paśyeyam,
XXbsu021_u:147: taddarśanānnādhigatamadhigaccheyam, adhigataṃ ca me nirvikalpācāraḥ sukhasamādhisamāpattivihārastathāgatagatibhūmiprāpako vivṛddhiṃ yāyāt //
XXbsu021_u:148: atha bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ laṅkādhipateranutpattikadharmakṣāntyadhigataṃ viditvā tayaiva śobhayā daśagrīvasyānukampayā punarapyātmānaṃ śikhare subahuratnakhacite ratnajālavitate darśayati sma /
XXbsu021_u:149: adrākṣīddaśagrīvo laṅkādhipatiḥ punarapi dṛṣṭānubhūtāṃ śobhāṃ śikhare tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ dvātriṃśadvaralakṣaṇavibhūṣitatanum /
XXbsu021_u:150: svātmabhāvaṃ caikekasmin girau tathāgatānāṃ purataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ mahāmatinā sārdhaṃ tathāgatapratyātmagatigocarakathāṃ prakurvantaṃ yakṣaiḥ parivṛtaṃ tāṃ deśanāpāṭhakathāṃ kathayantam te ca kṣetrāḥ sanāyakāḥ //
XXbsu021_u:151: atha bhagavān punarapi tasyāṃ velāyāṃ parṣadamavalokya buddhyā na māṃsacakṣuṣā siṃharājavadvijṛmbhya mahāhāsamahasat /
XXbsu021_u:152: ūrṇākośācca raśmiṃ niścāryamāṇaḥ pārśvorukaṭikāyācca śrīvatsātsarvaromakūpebhyo yugāntāgniriva dīpyamānaḥ tejasendradhanurudayabhāskaropamena prabhāmaṇḍalena dedīpyamānaḥ śakrabrahmalokapālairgaganatale nirīkṣyamāṇaḥ sumeruśṛṅgapratispardhini śikhare niṣaṇṇo mahāhāsamahasat /
XXbsu021_u:153: atha tasyā bodhisattvaparṣadaḥ teṣāṃ ca śakrabrahmādīnāmetadabhavat - ko nu khalvatra
XXbsu021_u:154: hetuḥ, ka ḥ pratyayo yadbhagavān sarvadharmavaśavartī mahāhāsaṃ
XXbsu021_u:155: smitapūrvakaṃ hasati? raśmīṃśca svavigrahebhyo niścārayati? niścārya tūṣṇīmabhavat svapratyātmāryajñānagocarasamādhimukhe patitāśayo 'vismitaḥ
XXbsu021_u:157: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvamevādhyeṣito rāvaṇasyānukampāmupādāya tasyā bodhisattvaparṣadaścittāśayavicāramājñāya anāgatāṃ janatāṃ cāvalokya deśanāpāṭhābhiratānāṃ sattvānāṃ cittavibhramo bhaviṣyatīti yathārutārthābhiniviṣṭānāṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhatīrthyayogabalābhiniviṣṭānāṃ tathāgatā api
XXbsu021_u:159: teṣāṃ kautūhalavinivṛttyarthaṃ bhagavantaṃ paripṛcchati sma - kaḥ khalvatra hetuḥ, kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya pravṛttaye? bhagavānāha - sādhu sādhu mahāmate, sādhu khalu punastvaṃ mahāmate, lokasvabhāvamavalokya kudṛṣṭipatitānāṃ ca lokānāṃ traikālyacittāvabodhāya māṃ praṣṭumārabdhaḥ evaṃ paṇḍitaiḥ paripṛcchanajātīyairbhavitavyaṃ svaparobhayārtham /
XXbsu021_u:160: eṣa mahāmate rāvaṇo laṅkādhipatiḥ pūrvakānapi tathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān praśnadvayaṃ pṛṣṭavān /
XXbsu021_u:167: yadyadevākāṅkṣasi, ahaṃ te tasta tasyaiva praśnasyavyākaraṇena cittamārādhayiṣyāmi /
XXbsu021_u:168: yathā tvaṃ parāvṛttavikalpāśraye bhūmivipakṣakauśalena pravicayabuddhyā vicārayamāṇaḥ pratyātmanayalakṣaṇasamādhisukhavihāraṃ samādhibuddhaiḥ parigṛhītaḥ
XXbsu021_u:169: (Vaidya 7) śamathasukhavyavasthitaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhasamādhipakṣānatikramya acalāsādhumatīdharmameghābhūmivyavasthito dharmanairātmyayathātathākuśalo mahāratnapadmavimāne samādhijinābhiṣekatāṃ pratilapsyase tadanurūpaiḥ padmaiḥ svakāyavicitrādhiṣṭhānādhiṣṭhitaistaiḥ padmaiḥ svakāyaṃ niṣaṇṇaṃ
XXbsu021_u:176: atha khalu laṅkādhipatirbhagavatā kṛtāvakāśa utthāya tasmādraśmivimalaprabhādratnapadmasadṛśādratnaśikharāt sāpsarogaṇaparivṛto vividhairanekavidhairnānāprakāraiḥ puṣpamālyagandhadhūpavilepanacchatradhvajapatākāhārārdhahārakirīṭamukuṭairanyaiśca adṛṣṭaśrutapūrvairābharaṇaviśeṣairviśiṣṭaistūryatālāvacarairdevanāgayakṣarākṣasagandharvakinnaramahoragamanuṣyātikrāntaiḥ sarvakāmadhātuparyāpannān vādyabhāṇḍānabhinirmāya ye cānyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu tūryaviśeṣā dṛṣṭāḥ, tānabhinirmāya bhagavantaṃ bodhisattvāṃśca ratnajālenāvaṣṭabhya nānāvastrocchritapatākaṃ kṛtvā sapta tālān gagane 'bhyudgamya mahāpūjāmeghānabhipravṛṣya tūryatālāvacarāṇi nirnādya tasmādgaganādavatīrya sūryavidyutprabhe dvitīye mahāratnapadmālaṃkṛtau ratnaśikhare niṣasāda niṣadya upacārātsmitapūrvaṃ bhagavatā kṛtāvakāśo bhagavanta praśnadvayaṃ pṛcchati sma - pṛṣṭā mayā pūrvakāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:185: tatsādhu me bhagavān svayameva dharmavaśavartī dharmadvayaṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho deśayatu /
XXbsu021_u:191: bhavati? ke cādharmā dharmāḥ? kathaṃ sati dvitvaṃ prahāṇadharmāṇāṃ vikalpalakṣaṇapatitānāṃ vikalpasvabhāvābhāvānāmabhautikabhautikānāmālayavijñānāparijñānādaviśeṣalakṣaṇānāṃ keśoṇḍukasvabhāvāvasthitānāmaśuddhakṣayajñānaviṣayiṇām tatkathaṃ teṣāṃ prahāṇamevaṃbhāvinām?
XXbsu021_u:192: bhagavānāha - nanu laṅkādhipate, dṛṣṭo ghaṭādīnāṃ bhedanātmakānāṃ
XXbsu021_u:195: gṛhyate? asti dharmādharmayoḥ prativibhāgo bālaprativikalpamupādāya, na tvāryajñānādhigamaṃ prati darśanena /
XXbsu021_u:196: tiṣṭhantu tāvallaṅkādhipate ghaṭādayo bhāvā vicitralakṣaṇapatitā bālānāṃ na tvāryāṇām /
XXbsu021_u:203: evaṃ sarvadharmaprarohadharmiṇāṃ bāhyānāmādhyātmikānāmapyavidyāniryātānāṃ skandhadhātvāyatanopagānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ traidhātukopapannānāṃ dṛṣṭasukhasaṃsthānāmabhilāpyagativiśeṣāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:204: vijñānānāmekalakṣaṇānāṃ viṣayābhigrahaṇapravṛttānāṃ dṛṣṭo hīnotkṛṣṭamadhyamaviśeṣo vyavadānāvyavadānataśca kuśalākuśalataśca /
XXbsu021_u:205: na kevalameṣāṃ laṅkādhipate dharmāṇāṃ prativibhāgaviśeṣaḥ, yogināmapi yogamabhyasyatāṃ yogamārge
XXbsu021_u:207: kimaṅga punardharmādharmayoḥ prativikalpapravṛttayorviśeṣo na bhavati? bhavatyeva //
XXbsu021_u:209: tatra laṅkādhipate dharmāḥ katame? yaduta ete tīrthyaśrāvakapratyekabuddhabālavikalpakalpitāḥ
XXbsu021_u:210: kāraṇato guṇadravyapūrvakā dharmā ityupadiśyante, te prahātavyāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:212: svacittadṛśyadharmatābhiniveśānna santi ghaṭādayo dharmā bālaparikalpitā alabdhaśarīrāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:214: tatra adharmāḥ katame? ye 'labdhātmakā lakṣaṇavikalpāpracārā dharmā ahetukāḥ teṣāmapravṛttirdṛṣṭā bhūtābhūtataḥ /
XXbsu021_u:223: yaduktavānasi laṅkādhipate dharmādharmāḥ kathaṃ praheyā iti, tadetaduktam
XXbsu021_u:224: yadapyuktavānasi laṅkādhipate - pūrvakā api tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā mayā pṛṣṭāḥ, taiśca visarjitaṃ pūrvam /
XXbsu021_u:235: kena na kalpante? manasā ātmato jīvataḥ pudgalataḥ /
XXbsu021_u:236: kathaṃ na vikalpante? manovijñānena viṣayārthahetukena yathā rūpalakṣaṇasaṃsthānākārataśca
XXbsu021_u:248: tadyathā darpaṇāntargataṃ svabimbapratibimbaṃ jale vā svāṅgacchāyā vā jyotsnādīpapradīpite vā gṛhe vā aṅgacchāyā pratiśrutkāni /
XXbsu021_u:259: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāmatibodhisattvasahitaḥ sarvabuddhakṣetrānucārī buddhānubhāvena utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantaṃ gāthābhirabhyaṣṭāvīt -
XXbsu021_u:261: sadasannopalabdhaste prajñayā kṛpayā ca te // Lank_2.1 //
XXbsu021_u:263: sadasannopalabdhāste prajñayā kṛpayā ca te // Lank_2.2 //
XXbsu021_u:265: sadasannopalabdhaste prajñayā kṛpayā ca te // Lank_2.3 //
XXbsu021_u:267: bhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvānāṃ yo 'nutpādaḥ sa saṃbhavaḥ // Lank_2.4 //
XXbsu021_u:269: praśaṃsā yadi vā nindā tasyocyeta kathaṃ mune // Lank_2.5 //
XXbsu021_u:271: viśuddhamānimittena prajñayā kṛpayā ca te // Lank_2.6 //
XXbsu021_u:272: na nirvāsi nirvāṇena nirvāṇaṃ tvayi saṃsthitam /
XXbsu021_u:275: te bhonti nirupādānā ihāmutra nirañjanāḥ // Lank_2.8 //
XXbsu021_u:276: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantamābhiḥ sārūpyābhirgāthābhirabhiṣṭutya svanāmagotraṃ bhagavate saṃśrāvayati sma -
XXbsu021_u:278: aṣṭottaraṃ praśnaśataṃ pṛcchāmi vadatāṃ varam // Lank_2.9 //
XXbsu021_u:279: tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā buddho lokavidāṃ varaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:281: pṛcchantu māṃ jinasutāstvaṃ ca pṛccha mahāmate /
XXbsu021_u:283: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavatā kṛtāvakāśo bhagavataścaraṇayornipatya bhagavantaṃ praśnaṃ paripṛcchati sma -
XXbsu021_u:285: kathaṃ hi śudhyate tarkaḥ kasmāttarkaḥ pravartate /
XXbsu021_u:286: kathaṃ hi dṛśyate bhrāntiḥ kasmādbhrāntiḥ pravartate // Lank_2.12 //
XXbsu021_u:288: nirābhāsaḥ kramaḥ kena jinaputrāśca te kutaḥ // Lank_2.13 //
XXbsu021_u:289: muktasya gamanaṃ kutra baddhaḥ kaḥ kena mucyate /
XXbsu021_u:290: dhyāyināṃ viṣayaḥ ko 'sau kathaṃ yānatrayaṃ bhavet // Lank_2.14 //
XXbsu021_u:291: pratyate jāyate kiṃ tatkāryaṃ kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ca kim /
XXbsu021_u:292: ubhayāntakathā kena kathaṃ vā saṃpravartate // Lank_2.15 //
XXbsu021_u:294: saṃjñānirodhaśca kathaṃ kathaṃ kasmāddhi mucyate // Lank_2.16 //
XXbsu021_u:296: kathaṃ dṛśyaṃ vibhāvo kathaṃ kathaṃ bhūmiṣu vartate // Lank_2.17 //
XXbsu021_u:297: nirbhidyentribhavaṃ ko 'sau kiṃ sthānaṃ kā tanurbhavet /
XXbsu021_u:298: sthitaḥ pravartate kutra jinaputraḥ kathaṃ bhavet // Lank_2.18 //
XXbsu021_u:300: samādhyate kathaṃ cittaṃ brūhi me jinapuṃgava // Lank_2.19 //
XXbsu021_u:302: kathaṃ pravartate dṛśyaṃ kathaṃ dṛśyānnivartate // Lank_2.20 //
XXbsu021_u:304: lakṣaṇasya vyavasthānaṃ nairātmyaṃ ca kathaṃ bhavet // Lank_2.21 //
XXbsu021_u:305: kathaṃ na vidyate sattvaḥ saṃvṛtyā deśanā katham /
XXbsu021_u:307: kathaṃ hi tīrthikāstvaṃ ca lakṣaṇairna virudhyase /
XXbsu021_u:308: naiyāyikāḥ kathaṃ brūhi bhaviṣyanti anāgate // Lank_2.23 //
XXbsu021_u:309: śūnyatā ca kathaṃ kena kṣaṇabhaṅgaśca te katham /
XXbsu021_u:310: kathaṃ pravartate garbhaḥ kathaṃ loko nirīhikaḥ // Lank_2.24 //
XXbsu021_u:312: marīcidakacandrābhaḥ kena loko bravīhi me // Lank_2.25 //
XXbsu021_u:314: marāśca deśasaṃkṣobho bhavadṛṣṭiḥ kathaṃ bhavet // Lank_2.26 //
XXbsu021_u:317: kathaṃ ca budhyase lokaṃ kathaṃ brūṣe nirakṣaram // Lank_2.27 //
XXbsu021_u:319: tathatā bhavetkatividhā cittaṃ pāramitāḥ kati // Lank_2.28 //
XXbsu021_u:321: nairātmyaṃ ca dvidhā kena kathaṃ jñeyaṃ viśudhyati // Lank_2.29 //
XXbsu021_u:322: jñānaṃ katividhaṃ nātha śīlaṃ sattvākarāṇi ca /
XXbsu021_u:327: kathaṃ yuktiḥ katividhā vyākhyānaṃ ca kathaṃvidham // Lank_2.32 //
XXbsu021_u:328: annapānaṃ ca vaicitryaṃ maithunaṃ jāyate katham /
XXbsu021_u:329: rājā ca cakravartī ca maṇḍalī ca kathaṃ bhavet // Lank_2.33 //
XXbsu021_u:332: vidyāsthānaṃ bhavetkiṃ ca mokṣo yogī katividhaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:337: prajñaptimātraṃ ca kathaṃ brūhi me vadatāṃvara // Lank_2.37 //
XXbsu021_u:338: ghanāḥ khe pavanaṃ kena smṛtirmegho kathaṃ bhavet /
XXbsu021_u:339: taruvallyaḥ kathaṃ kena brūhi me tribhaveśvara // Lank_2.38 //
XXbsu021_u:340: hayā gajā mṛgāḥ kena grahaṇaṃ yānti bāliśāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:341: uhoḍimā narāḥ kena brūhi me cittasārathe // Lank_2.39 //
XXbsu021_u:343: strīpuṃnapuṃsakānāṃ ca kathaṃ janma vadāhi me // Lank_2.40 //
XXbsu021_u:345: kathaṃ caivaṃvidhā yoge narāḥ sthāpyā vadāhi me // Lank_2.41 //
XXbsu021_u:347: gatyāgatānāṃ sattvānāṃ kiṃ liṅgaṃ kiṃ ca lakṣaṇam /
XXbsu021_u:348: dhaneśvaro kathaṃ kena brūhi me gaganopama // Lank_2.42 //
XXbsu021_u:350: ṛṣirdīrghapatāḥ kena kathaṃ tena prabhāvitam // Lank_2.43 //
XXbsu021_u:353: abhakṣyaṃ hi kathaṃ māṃsaṃ kathaṃ māṃsaṃ niṣidhyate /
XXbsu021_u:354: kravyādagotrasaṃbhūtā māsaṃ bhakṣyanti kena vai // Lank_2.45 //
XXbsu021_u:356: śrīvatsasiṃhasaṃsthānāḥ kṣetrāḥ kena vadāhi me // Lank_2.46 //
XXbsu021_u:358: sarvaratnamayā kṣetrāḥ kathaṃ kena vadāhi me // Lank_2.47 //
XXbsu021_u:360: ādityacandravirajāḥ kathaṃ kena vadāhi me // Lank_2.48 //
XXbsu021_u:361: kena nirmāṇikā buddhāḥ kena buddhā vipākajāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:362: tathatā jñānabuddhā vai kathaṃ kena vadāhi me // Lank_2.49 //
XXbsu021_u:363: kāmadhātau kathaṃ kena na vibuddho vadāhi me /
XXbsu021_u:364: akaniṣṭhe kimarthaṃ tu vītarāgeṣu budhyase // Lank_2.50 //
XXbsu021_u:366: kiyatsthāyī bhavecchāstā kiyantaṃ sthāsyate nayaḥ // Lank_2.51 //
XXbsu021_u:368: vinayo bhikṣubhāvaśca kathaṃ kena vadāhi me // Lank_2.52 //
XXbsu021_u:372: cittaṃ hi bhūmayaḥ sapta kathaṃ kena vadāhi me // Lank_2.54 //
XXbsu021_u:374: cikitsāśāstraṃ sattvānāṃ kathaṃ kena vadāhi me // Lank_2.55 //
XXbsu021_u:379: kasmāttattvaṃ na sarvatra cittamātraṃ prabhāṣase // Lank_2.57 //
XXbsu021_u:383: ṛṣigandharvasaṃkīrṇāḥ kathaṃ kena vadāhi me // Lank_2.59 //
XXbsu021_u:384: idaṃ śrutvā mahāvīro buddho lokavidāṃ varaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:385: mahāyānamayaṃ cittaṃ buddhānāṃ hṛdayaṃ balam // Lank_2.60 //
XXbsu021_u:391: merusamudrā hyacalā dvīpā kṣetrāṇi medinī // Lank_2.63 //
XXbsu021_u:393: vimokṣā vaśitābhijñā balā dhyānā samādhayaḥ // Lank_2.64 //
XXbsu021_u:394: nirodhā ṛddhipādāśca bodhyaṅgā mārga eva ca /
XXbsu021_u:395: dhyānāni cāpramāṇāni skandhā gatyāgatāni ca // Lank_2.65 //
XXbsu021_u:397: cittaṃ manaśca vijñānaṃ nairātmyaṃ dharmapañcakam // Lank_2.66 //
XXbsu021_u:398: svabhāvaḥ kalpanā kalpyaṃ dṛśyaṃ dṛṣṭidvayaṃ katham /
XXbsu021_u:401: jñānaṃ jñeyo gamaṃ prāptiḥ sattvānāṃ ca bhavābhavam // Lank_2.68 //
XXbsu021_u:402: hayā gajā mṛgāḥ kena grahaṇaṃ brūhi me katham /
XXbsu021_u:404: kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ kena nānābhrāntistathā nayam /
XXbsu021_u:405: cittamātraṃ na dṛśyo 'sti bhūmīnāṃ nāsti vai kramaḥ // Lank_2.70 //
XXbsu021_u:409: acalānāṃ tathā meroḥ pramāṇaṃ hi kṣiteḥ katham /
XXbsu021_u:410: udadheścandrasūryāṇāṃ pramāṇaṃ brūhi me katham // Lank_2.72 //
XXbsu021_u:412: kṣetre kṣetre rajāḥ kṛtto dhanvo dhanve bhavetkati // Lank_2.73 //
XXbsu021_u:414: śaśavātāyanaṃ likṣā eḍakaṃ hi yavāḥ kati // Lank_2.74 //
XXbsu021_u:415: prasthe hi syādyavāḥ kyantaḥ prasthārdhe ca yavāḥ kati /
XXbsu021_u:416: droṇe khāryāṃ tathā lakṣāḥ koṭyo vai biṃbarāḥ kati // Lank_2.75 //
XXbsu021_u:417: sarṣape hyaṇavaḥ kyanto rakṣikā sarṣapāḥ kati /
XXbsu021_u:418: katirakṣiko bhavenmāṣo dharaṇaṃ māṣakāḥ kati // Lank_2.76 //
XXbsu021_u:419: karṣo hi dharaṇāḥ kyantaḥ palaṃ vai kati kārṣikā /
XXbsu021_u:421: evaṃ hi pṛccha māṃ putra anyathā kiṃ nu pṛcchasi // Lank_2.77 //
XXbsu021_u:423: katyaṇuko bhavetkāyaḥ kiṃ nu evaṃ na pṛcchasi // Lank_2.78 //
XXbsu021_u:424: vahneḥ śikhā katyaṇukā pavane hyaṇavaḥ kati /
XXbsu021_u:425: indriye indriye kyanto romakūpe bhruvoḥ kati // Lank_2.79 //
XXbsu021_u:427: rājyaṃ ca taiḥ kathaṃ rakṣyaṃ mokṣaścaiṣāṃ kathaṃ bhavet // Lank_2.80 //
XXbsu021_u:428: gadyaṃ padyaṃ kathaṃ brūṣe maithunaṃ lokaviśrutā /
XXbsu021_u:430: vajrasaṃhananāḥ kena hyacalā brūhi me katham /
XXbsu021_u:432: ghanānāṃ saṃbhavaḥ kutra ṛtūnāṃ ca kuto bhavet /
XXbsu021_u:434: śobhāśca jinaputrāśca kutra me pṛccha māṃ suta /
XXbsu021_u:435: kathaṃ hi acalā divyā ṛṣigandharvamaṇḍitāḥ // Lank_2.84 //
XXbsu021_u:436: muktasya gamanaṃ kutra baddhaḥ kaḥ kena mucyate /
XXbsu021_u:437: dhyāyināṃ viṣayaḥ ko 'sau nirmāṇastīrthakāni ca // Lank_2.85 //
XXbsu021_u:440: kathaṃ hi śudhyate tarkaḥ kena tarkaḥ pravartate // Lank_2.86 //
XXbsu021_u:441: kriyā pravartate kena gamanaṃ brūhi me katham /
XXbsu021_u:442: saṃjñāyāśchedanaṃ kena samādhiḥ kena cocyate // Lank_2.87 //
XXbsu021_u:443: vidārtha tribhavaṃ ko 'sau kiṃ sthānaṃ kā tanurbhavet /
XXbsu021_u:444: asatyātmakathā kena saṃvṛtyā deśanā katham // Lank_2.88 //
XXbsu021_u:445: lakṣaṇaṃ pṛcchase kena nairātmyaṃ pṛcchase katham /
XXbsu021_u:446: garbhā naiyāyikāḥ kena pṛcchase māṃ jinaurasāḥ // Lank_2.89 //
XXbsu021_u:448: abhilāpastathā jñānaṃ śīlaṃ gotraṃ jinaurasāḥ // Lank_2.90 //
XXbsu021_u:450: annapānaṃ nabho meghā mārāḥ prajñaptimātrakam // Lank_2.91 //
XXbsu021_u:451: taruvallyaḥ kathaṃ kena pṛcchase māṃ jinaurasa /
XXbsu021_u:453: vaṃśaḥ kaste guruḥ kena pṛcchase māṃ jinaurasa /
XXbsu021_u:454: uhoḍimā narā yoge kāmadhātau na budhyase // Lank_2.93 //
XXbsu021_u:455: siddhānto hyakaniṣṭheṣu yuktiṃ pṛcchasi me katham /
XXbsu021_u:456: abhijñāṃ laukikāṃ kena kathaṃ bhikṣutvameva ca // Lank_2.94 //
XXbsu021_u:457: nairmāṇikān vipākasthān buddhān pṛcchasi me katham /
XXbsu021_u:458: tathatājñānabuddhā vai saṃghāścaiva kathaṃ bhavet // Lank_2.95 //
XXbsu021_u:460: cittaṃ hi bhūmayaḥ sapta pṛcchase māṃ jinaurasa /
XXbsu021_u:461: etāṃścānyāṃśca subahūn praśnān pṛcchasi māṃ suta // Lank_2.96 //
XXbsu021_u:463: siddhāntaṃ deśanāṃ vakṣye sahasā tvaṃ śṛṇohi me // Lank_2.97 //
XXbsu021_u:464: upanyāsaṃ kariṣyāmi padānāṃ śṛṇu me suta /
XXbsu021_u:473: hetupadam ahetupadam, kleśapadam akleśapadam, tṛṣṇāpadam atṛṣṇāpadam,
XXbsu021_u:476: śiṣyapadam aśiṣyapadam, gurupadam agurupadam, gotrapadam agotrapadam,
XXbsu021_u:482: kṣetrapadam akṣetrapadam, aṇupadam anaṇupadam, jalapadam ajalapadam,
XXbsu021_u:486: vāyupadam avāyupadam, bhūmipadam abhūmipadam, cintyapadam acintyapadam,
XXbsu021_u:490: atīrthyapadam, ḍamarapadam aḍamarapadam, māyāpadam amāyāpadam, svapnapadam
XXbsu021_u:491: asvapnapadam, marīcipadam amarīcipadam, bimbapadam abimbapadam, cakrapadam
XXbsu021_u:500: dṛśyapadam adṛśyapadam, rakṣyapadam arakṣyapadam, vaṃśapadam avaṃśapadam,
XXbsu021_u:501: ṛṣipadam anarṣipadam, rājyapadam arājyapadam, grahaṇapadam agrahaṇapadam,
XXbsu021_u:504: arasapadam, kriyāpadam akriyāpadam, dehapadam adehapadam, tarkapadam
XXbsu021_u:514: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat
XXbsu021_u:516: dvividho mahāmate vijñānānāmutpattisthitinirodho bhavati, na ca tārkikā
XXbsu021_u:520: trividhaṃ vijñānaṃ pravṛttilakṣaṇaṃ karmalakṣaṇaṃ jātilakṣaṇaṃ ca /
XXbsu021_u:521: dvividhaṃ mahāmate vijñānaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa aṣṭalakṣaṇoktaṃ khyātivijñānaṃ vastuprativikalpavijñānaṃ ca /
XXbsu021_u:522: yathā mahāmate darpaṇasya rūpagrahaṇam, evaṃ khyātivijñānasyākhyāsyati /
XXbsu021_u:528: tatra sarvendriyavijñānanirodho mahāmate yaduta ālayavijñānasya abhūtaparikalpavāsanāvaicitryanirodhaḥ
XXbsu021_u:534: mṛtpiṇḍaḥ, na cānyo nānanyaḥ, tathā suvarṇaṃ bhūṣaṇāt /
XXbsu021_u:535: yadi ca mahāmate mṛtpiṇḍo mṛtparamāṇubhyo 'nyaḥ syāt, tairnārabdhaḥ syāt /
XXbsu021_u:542: athānanyāni pravṛttivijñānanirodhe ālayavijñānavirodhaḥ syāt, sa ca na bhavati svajātilakṣaṇanirodhaḥ
XXbsu021_u:543: tasmānmahāmate na svajātilakṣaṇanirodho vijñānānāṃ kiṃ tu karmalakṣaṇanirodhaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:546: tīrthakarāṇāṃ mahāmate ayaṃ vādo yaduta viṣayagrahaṇoparamādvijñānaprabandhoparamo bhavati
XXbsu021_u:549: na cakṣurvijñānasya rūpālokasamudayata utpattiṃ varṇayanti anyatra kāraṇataḥ /
XXbsu021_u:551: punaraparaṃ mahāmate saptavidho bhāvasvabhāvo bhavati yaduta samudayasvabhāvo bhāvasvabhāvo lakṣaṇasvabhāvo mahābhūtasvabhāvo hetusvabhāvaḥ pratyayasvabhāvo niṣpattisvabhāvaśca saptamaḥ punaraparaṃ mahāmate saptavidhaḥ paramārtho yaduta cittagocaro jñānagocaraḥ prajñāgocaro dṛṣṭidvayagocaro dṛṣṭidvayātikrāntagocaraḥ sutabhūmyanukramaṇagocarastathāgatasya pratyātmagatigocaraḥ //
XXbsu021_u:553: etanmahāmate atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bhāvasvabhāvaparamārthahṛdayaṃ yena samanvāgatāstathāgatā laukikalokottaratamān dharmānāryeṇa prajñācakṣuṣā svasāmānyalakṣaṇapatitān vyavasthāpayanti /
XXbsu021_u:554: tathā ca vyavasthāpayanti yathā tīrthakaravādakudṛṣṭisādhāraṇā na bhavanti /
XXbsu021_u:555: kathaṃ ca mahāmate tīrthakaravādakudṛṣṭisādhāraṇā bhavanti? yaduta svacittaviṣayavikalpadṛṣṭyanavabodhanādvijñānānām
XXbsu021_u:558: ye kecinmahāmate śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā abhūtvā śraddhāhetuphalābhivyaktidravyaṃ ca kālāvasthitaṃ pratyayeṣu ca skandhadhātvāyatanānāmutpādasthitiṃ cecchanti, bhūtvā ca vyayam, te mahāmate saṃtatikriyotpādabhaṅgabhavanirvāṇamārgakarmaphalasatyavināśocchedavādino bhavanti /
XXbsu021_u:560: tadyathā mahāmate ghaṭakapālābhāvo ghaṭakṛtyaṃ na karoti, nāpi dagdhabījamaṅkurakṛtyaṃ karoti, evameva mahāmate ye
XXbsu021_u:564: trisaṃgatipratyayakriyāyogenotpattirabhaviṣyat, asatāmapi mahāmate kūrmaromnāmutpattirabhaviṣyat, sikatābhyo vā tailasya /
XXbsu021_u:567: teṣāmapi mahāmate trisaṃgatipratyayakriyāyogenopadeśo vidyate hetuphalasvalakṣaṇatayā atītānāgatapratyutpannāsatsallakṣaṇāstitāṃ yuktyāgamaistarkabhūmau vartamānāḥ svadṛṣṭidoṣavāsanatayā nirdekṣyanti /
XXbsu021_u:568: evameva mahāmate bālapṛthagjanāḥ kudṛṣṭidaṣṭā viṣamamatayo 'jñaiḥ praṇītaṃ sarvapraṇītamiti vakṣyanti //
XXbsu021_u:569: ye punaranye mahāmate śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā niḥsvabhāvaghanālātacakragandharvanagarānutpādamāyāmarīcyudakacandrasvapnasvabhāvabāhyacittadṛśyavikalpānādikālaprapañcadarśanena svacittavikalpapratyayavinivṛttirahitāḥ parikalpitābhidhānalakṣyalakṣaṇābhidheyarahitā dehabhogapratiṣṭhāsamālayavijñānaviṣayagrāhyagrāhakavisaṃyuktaṃ nirābhāsagocaramutpādasthitibhaṅgavarjyaṃ svacittotpādānugataṃ
XXbsu021_u:570: vibhāvayiṣyanti, nacirātte mahāmate bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ saṃsāranirvāṇasamatāprāptā bhaviṣyanti
XXbsu021_u:571: mahākaruṇopāyakauśalyānābhogagatena mahāmate prayogena sarvasattvamāyāpratibimbasamatayā anārabdhapratyayatayā adhyātmabāhyaviṣayavimuktatayā cittabāhyādarśanatayā animittādhiṣṭhānānugatā anupūrveṇa bhūmikramasamādhiviṣayānugamanatayā
XXbsu021_u:573: svacittanirābhāsamātrāvatāreṇa prajñāpāramitāvihārānuprāptā utpādakriyāyogavirahitāḥ samādhivajrabimbopamaṃ tathāgatakāyānugataṃ tathatānirmāṇānugataṃ balābhijñāvaśitākṛpākaruṇopāyamaṇḍitaṃ sarvabuddhakṣetratīrthyāyatanopagataṃ cittamanomanovijñānarahitaṃ parāvṛttyānuśrayānupūrvakaṃ tathāgatakāyaṃ mahāmate te bodhisattvāḥ (Vaidya 20) pratilapsyante /
XXbsu021_u:575: anādikālāprapañcadauṣṭhulyavikalpavāsanahetukaṃ tribhavaṃ paśyato nirābhāsabuddhabhūmyanutpādasmaraṇatayā pratyātmāryadharmagatiṃgataḥ svacittavaśavartī anābhogacaryāgatiṃgato viśvarūpamaṇisadṛśaḥ sūkṣmaiḥ sattvacittānupraveśakairnirmāṇavigrahaiścittamātrāvadhāraṇatayā bhūmikramānusaṃghau pratiṣṭhāpayati /
XXbsu021_u:576: tasmāttarhi mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena svasiddhāntakuśalena bhavitavyam //
XXbsu021_u:578: cittamanomanovijñānapañcadharmasvabhāvalakṣaṇakusumadharmaparyāyaṃ buddhabodhisattvānuyātaṃ svacittadṛśyagocaravisaṃyojanaṃ sarvabhāṣyayuktitattvalakṣaṇavidāraṇaṃ sarvabuddhapravacanahṛdayaṃ laṅkāpurigirimalaye nivāsino bodhisattvānārabhyodadhitaraṃgālayavijñānagocaraṃ dharmakāyaṃ tathāgatānugītaṃ prabhāṣasva //
XXbsu021_u:579: atha khalu bhagavān punareva mahāmatiṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat
XXbsu021_u:584: / yathā mahāmate cakṣurvijñāne, evaṃ sarvandriyaparamāṇuromakūpeṣu yugapatpravṛttikramaviṣayādarśabimbadarśanavat udadheḥ pavanāhatā iva mahāmate viṣayapavanacittodadhitaraṃgā avyucchinnahetukriyālakṣaṇā anyonyavinirmuktāḥ karmajātilakṣaṇasuvinibaddharūpasvabhāvānavadhāriṇo
XXbsu021_u:586: saha taireva mahāmate pañcabhirvijñānakāyairhetuviṣayaparicchedalakṣaṇāvadhārakaṃ nāma manovijñānaṃ taddhetujaśarīraṃ pravartate /
XXbsu021_u:587: na ca teṣāṃ tasya caivaṃ bhavati - vayamatrānyonyahetukāḥ svacittadṛśyavikalpābhiniveśapravṛttā
XXbsu021_u:589: tathā ca pravartamānāḥ pravartante yathā samāpannasyāpi yoginaḥ sūkṣmagativāsanāpravṛttā na prajñāyante /
XXbsu021_u:594: evaṃ sūkṣmo mahāmate ālayavijñānagatipracāro yattathāgataṃ sthāpayitvā bhūmipratiṣṭhitāṃśca
XXbsu021_u:595: bodhisattvān, na sukaramanyaiḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhatīrthyayogayogibhiradhigantuṃ samādhiprajñābalādhānato 'pi vā paricchettum /
XXbsu021_u:599: ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate yoginā kalyāṇamitrajinayoge yogaḥ prārabdhavyaḥ //
XXbsu021_u:600: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
XXbsu021_u:602: nṛtyamānāḥ pravartante vyucchedaśca na vidyate // Lank_2.99 //
XXbsu021_u:605: nīle rakte 'tha lavaṇe śaṅkhe kṣīre ca śārkare /
XXbsu021_u:606: kaṣāyaiḥ phalapuṣpādyaiḥ kiraṇā yatha bhāskare // Lank_2.101 //
XXbsu021_u:607: na cānyena ca nānanyena taraṃgā hyudadhermatāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:608: vijñānāni tathā sapta cittena saha saṃyutāḥ // Lank_2.102 //
XXbsu021_u:610: ālayaṃ hi tathā citraṃ vijñānākhyaṃ pravartate // Lank_2.103 //
XXbsu021_u:612: abhinnalakṣaṇā hyaṣṭau na lakṣyā na ca lakṣaṇam // Lank_2.104 //
XXbsu021_u:614: vijñānānāṃ tathā cittaiḥ pariṇāmo na labhyate // Lank_2.105 //
XXbsu021_u:615: cittena cīyate karma manasā ca vicīyate /
XXbsu021_u:616: vijñānena vijānāti dṛśyaṃ kalpeti pañcabhiḥ // Lank_2.106 //
XXbsu021_u:620: vṛttiśca varṇyate cittaṃ lakṣaṇārthaṃ hi bāliśān // Lank_2.108 //
XXbsu021_u:621: na tasya vidyate vṛttiḥ svacittaṃ grāhyavarjitam /
XXbsu021_u:622: grāhye sati hi vai grāhastaraṃgaiḥ saha sādhyate // Lank_2.109 //
XXbsu021_u:624: tenāsya dṛśyate vṛttistaraṃgaiḥ saha sādṛśā // Lank_2.110 //
XXbsu021_u:626: ālayasya tathā vṛttiḥ kasmādbuddhyā na gamyate // Lank_2.111 //
XXbsu021_u:631: tathā tvaṃ lokapradyota tattvaṃ deśesi bāliśān // Lank_2.113 //
XXbsu021_u:633: bhāṣase yadi vā tattvaṃ citte tattvaṃ na vidyate // Lank_2.114 //
XXbsu021_u:634: udadheryathā taraṃgā hi darpaṇe supine yathā /
XXbsu021_u:635: dṛśyanti yugapatkāle tathā cittaṃ svagocare // Lank_2.115 //
XXbsu021_u:637: vijñānena vijānāti manasā manyate punaḥ // Lank_2.116 //
XXbsu021_u:638: pañcānāṃ khyāyate dṛśyaṃ kramo nāsti samāhite /
XXbsu021_u:640: citrārthe nāmayedraṅgān deśayāmi tathā hyaham // Lank_2.117 //
XXbsu021_u:641: raṅge na vidyate citraṃ na bhūmau na ca bhājane /
XXbsu021_u:643: deśanā vyabhicāraṃ ca tattvaṃ hyakṣaravarjitam // Lank_2.118 //
XXbsu021_u:646: deśemi jinaputrāṇāṃ neyaṃ bālāna deśanā // Lank_2.119 //
XXbsu021_u:647: vicitrā hi yathā māyā dṛśyate na ca vidyate /
XXbsu021_u:651: buddhā hi tadvatsattvānāṃ cittamātraṃ vadanti vai // Lank_2.121 //
XXbsu021_u:653: yaṃ deśayanti vai nāthāḥ pratyātmagatigocaram // Lank_2.122 //
XXbsu021_u:654: punaraparaṃ mahāmate bodhisattvena svacittadṛśyagrāhyagrāhakavikalpagocaraṃ parijñātukāmena saṃgaṇikāasaṃsargamiddhanivaraṇavigatena bhavitavyam /
XXbsu021_u:658: punaraparaṃ mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena cittavijñānaprajñālakṣaṇavyavasthāyāṃ sthitvā upariṣṭādāryajñānalakṣaṇatrayayogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:659: tatropariṣṭādāryajñānalakṣaṇatrayaṃ mahāmate katamat? yaduta nirābhāsalakṣaṇaṃ sarvabuddhasvapraṇidhānādhiṣṭhānalakṣaṇaṃ
XXbsu021_u:661: yānyadhigamya yogī khañjagardabha iva cittaprajñājñānalakṣaṇaṃ hitvā jinasutāṣṭamīṃ prāpya bhūmiṃ taduttare lakṣaṇatraye yogamāpadyate //
XXbsu021_u:665: etanmahāmate āryāṇāṃ lakṣaṇatrayaṃ yenāryeṇa lakṣatrayeṇa samanvāgatā āryāḥ svapratyātmāryajñānagatigocaramadhigacchanti
XXbsu021_u:667: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punareva tasyā bodhisattvaparṣadaścittāśayavicāramājñāya āryajñānavastupravicayaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ sarvabuddhādhiṣṭhānādhiṣṭhito bhagavantaṃ paripṛcchati sma - deśayatu me bhagavānāryajñānavastupravicayaṃ nāma
XXbsu021_u:668: dharmaparyāyamaṣṭottarapadaśataprabhedāśrayam, yamāśritya tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ svasāmānyalakṣaṇapatitānāṃ parikalpitasvabhāvagatiprabhedaṃ deśayanti,
XXbsu021_u:669: yena parikalpitasvabhāvagatiprabhedena suprativibhāgaviddhena pudgaladharmanairātmyapracāraṃ prativiśodhya bhūmiṣu kṛtavidyāḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhatīrthakaradhyānasamādhisamāpattisukhamatikramya tathāgatācintyaviṣayapracāragatipracāraṃ pañcadharmasvabhāvagativinivṛttaṃ tathāgataṃ dharmakāyaṃ prajñājñānasunibaddhadharmaṃ māyāviṣayābhinivṛttaṃ sarvabuddhakṣetratuṣitabhavanākaniṣṭhālayopagaṃ tathāgatakāyaṃ
XXbsu021_u:671: bhagavānāha - iha mahāmate eke tīrthyātīrthyadṛṣṭayo nāstitvābhiniviṣṭā vikalpabuddhihetukṣayasvabhāvābhāvānnāsti śaśasya viṣāṇaṃ vikalpayanti /
XXbsu021_u:673: anye punarmahāmate bhūtaguṇāṇudravyasaṃsthānasaṃniveśaviśeṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā nāstiśaśaśṛṅgābhiniveśābhiniviṣṭā asti gośṛṅgamiti kalpayanti /
XXbsu021_u:676: dehabhogapratiṣṭhāgativikalpamātre mahāmate śaśaśṛṅgaṃ nāstyastivinivṛttaṃ na kalpayettathā mahāmate sarvabhāvānāṃ nāstyastivinivṛttaṃ na kalpayitavyam //
XXbsu021_u:677: ye punarmahāmate nāstyastivinivṛttā nāsti śaśaśṛṅgaṃ na kalpayanti,
XXbsu021_u:680: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - nanu bhagavan vikalpasyāpravṛttilakṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā anumimīmahe vikalpāpravṛttyapekṣaṃ tasya nāstitvam /
XXbsu021_u:691: tadubhayabhāvābhāvātkasya kimapekṣya nāstitvaṃ bhavati? atha na bhavati mahāmate apekṣya nāstitvaṃ śaśaviṣāṇasya astitvamapekṣya nāstitvaṃ śaśaviṣāṇaṃ na kalpayitavyaṃ viṣamahetutvānmahāmate nāstyastitvam
XXbsu021_u:693: anye punarmahāmate tīrthakaradṛṣṭayo rūpakāraṇasaṃsthānābhiniveśābhiniviṣṭā ākāśabhāvāparicchedakuśalā rūpamākāśabhāvavigataṃ paricchedaṃ dṛṣṭvā vikalpayanti /
XXbsu021_u:697: bhūtāni mahāmate pravartamānāni parasparasvalakṣaṇabhedabhinnāni ākāśe cāpratiṣṭhitāni /
XXbsu021_u:699: evameva śaśasya viṣāṇaṃ mahāmate goviṣāṇamapekṣya bhavati /
XXbsu021_u:700: goviṣāṇaṃ punarmahāmate aṇuśo vibhajyamānaṃ punarapyaṇavo vibhajyamānā aṇutvalakṣaṇe nāvatiṣṭhante
XXbsu021_u:703: atha khalu bhagavān punarapi mahāmatiṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat
XXbsu021_u:708: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
XXbsu021_u:709: dṛśyaṃ na vidyate cittaṃ cittaṃ dṛśyātpravartate /
XXbsu021_u:712: nairātmyaṃ dvitayaṃ śuddhaṃ prabhāṣante vināyakāḥ // Lank_2.124 //
XXbsu021_u:715: aṇuśo bhajyamānaṃ hi naiva rūpaṃ vikalpayet /
XXbsu021_u:716: cittamātraṃ vyavasthānaṃ kudṛṣṭyā na prasīdati // Lank_2.126 //
XXbsu021_u:718: yaṃ deśayanti vai nāthāḥ pratyātmagatigocaram // Lank_2.127 //
XXbsu021_u:719: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi svacittadṛśyadhārāviśuddhyarthaṃ bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma - kathaṃ bhagavan svacittadṛśyadhārā viśudhyati yugapatkramavṛttyā vā? bhagavānāha
XXbsu021_u:720: - kramavṛttyā mahāmate svacittadṛśyadhārā viśudhyati na yugapat /
XXbsu021_u:721: tadyathā mahāmate āmraphalāni kramaśaḥ pacyante na yugapat, evameva mahāmate svacittadṛśyadhārā sattvānāṃ kramaśo viśudhyati (Vaidya 25) na yugapat /
XXbsu021_u:722: tadyathā mahāmate kumbhakāraḥ kramaśo bhāṇḍāni kurute na yugapat, evameva mahāmate tathāgataḥ sattvānāṃ svacittadṛśyadhārāṃ kramaśo viśodhayati na yugapat /
XXbsu021_u:723: tadyathā mahāmate pṛthivyāṃ tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayaḥ kramavṛttyā virohanti na yugapat, evameva mahāmate sattvānāṃ tathāgataḥ kramaśaḥ svacittadṛśyadhārāṃ viśodhayati na yugapat tadyathā mahāmate hāsyalāsyagītavāditravīṇālekhyayogyāḥ kramaśaḥ pravartante na yugapat,
XXbsu021_u:724: evemeva mahāmate tathāgataḥ sarvasattvānāṃ kramaśaḥ svacittadṛśyadhārāṃ viśodhayati na yugapat
XXbsu021_u:725: tadyathā mahāmate darpaṇāntargatāḥ sarvarūpāvabhāsāḥ saṃdṛśyante nirvikalpā yugapat, evameva mahāmate svacittadṛśyadhārāṃ yugapattathāgataḥ sarvasattvānāṃ viśodhayati nirvikalpāṃ nirābhāsagocarām tadyathā mahāmate somādityamaṇḍalaṃ yugapatsarvarūpāvabhāsān kiraṇaiḥ prakāśayati, evameva mahāmate tathāgataḥ
XXbsu021_u:728: evameva mahāmate niṣyandabuddho yugapatsattvagocaraṃ paripācya ākaniṣṭhabhavanavimānālayayogaṃ yogināmarpayati /
XXbsu021_u:729: tadyathā mahāmate dharmatābuddho yugapanniṣyandanirmāṇakiraṇairvirājate, evameva mahāmate pratyātmāryagatidharmalakṣaṇaṃ bhāvābhāvakudṛṣṭivinivartanatayā yugapadvirājate //
XXbsu021_u:732: tadyathā tṛṇakāṣṭhagulmalatāśrayānmāyāvidyāpuruṣasaṃyogātsarvasattvarūpadhāriṇaṃ māyāpuruṣavigrahamabhiniṣpannaikasattvaśarīraṃ vividhakalpavikalpitaṃ khyāyate, tathā khyāyannapi mahāmate tadātmako na bhavati, evameva mahāmate paratantrasvabhāve parikalpitasvabhāve vividhavikalpacittavicitralakṣaṇaṃ khyāyate vastuparikalpalakṣaṇābhiniveśavāsanātparikalpayan mahāmate parikalpitasvabhāvalakṣaṇaṃ bhavati
XXbsu021_u:741: punaraparaṃ mahāmate dvividhaṃ śrāvakayānanayaprabhedalakṣaṇaṃ yaduta pratyātmāryādhigamaviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ ca bhāvavikalpasvabhāvābhiniveśalakṣaṇaṃ ca /
XXbsu021_u:744: svacittaṃ samādhāya dhyānavimokṣasamādhimārgaphalasamāpattivimuktivāsanācintyapariṇaticyutivigataṃ pratyātmāryagatilakṣaṇasukhavihāraṃ mahāmate adhigacchanti śrāvakāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:746: etaddhi mahāmate śrāvakāṇāṃ pratyātmāryādhigamavihārasukhamadhigamya bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nirodhasukhaṃ samāpattisukhaṃ ca sattvakriyāpekṣayā pūrvasvapraṇidhānābhinirhṛtatayā ca na sākṣātkaraṇīyam /
XXbsu021_u:747: etanmahāmate śrāvakāṇāṃ pratyātmāryagatilakṣaṇasukhaṃ yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pratyātmāryagatilakṣaṇasukhe na śikṣitavyam /
XXbsu021_u:748: bhāvavikalpasvabhāvābhiniveśaḥ punarmahāmate śrāvakāṇāṃ katamaḥ? yaduta nīlapītoṣṇadravacalakaṭhināni
XXbsu021_u:752: etanmahāmate śrāvakāṇāṃ bhāvavikalpasvabhāvābhiniveśalakṣaṇaṃ yaduktam, idaṃ tatpratyuktam
XXbsu021_u:754: nityamacintyaṃ ca bhagavatā pratyātmāryagatigocaraṃ paramārthagocaraṃ ca prabhāṣitam /
XXbsu021_u:756: bhagavānāha - na mahāmate tīrthakarāṇāṃ kāraṇasya nityācintyatāṃ prāpnoti
XXbsu021_u:757: / tatkasya hetoḥ? tīrthakarāṇāṃ mahāmate nityācintyaṃ na hetusvalakṣaṇayuktam /
XXbsu021_u:760: nityācintyavādaḥ punarmahāmate yadi hetusvalakṣaṇayuktaḥ syāt, nityaṃ kāraṇādhīnahetulakṣaṇatvānnityamacintyaṃ na bhavati /
XXbsu021_u:761: mama tu mahāmate paramārthanityācintyaṃ paramārthalakṣaṇahetuyuktaṃ bhāvābhāvavigataṃ pratyātmāryādhigamalakṣaṇatvāllakṣaṇavatparamārthajñānahetutvācca hetumadbhāvābhāvavigatatvādakṛtakākāśanirvāṇanirodhadṛṣṭāntasādharmyānnityam /
XXbsu021_u:764: / tasmāttarhi mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nityācintyapratyātmāryajñānādhigamāya yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ //
XXbsu021_u:767: yadi punarmahāmate tīrthakarāṇāṃ nityācintyatā kṛtakabhāvābhāvādanityatāṃ dṛṣṭvā anumānabuddhyā nityaṃ samāpyate, tenaiva hetunā mamāpi mahāmate kṛtakabhāvābhāvādanityatāṃ dṛṣṭvā nityamahetūpadeśāt yadi punarmahāmate hetulakṣaṇasaṃyuktaṃ nityācintyatā, tīrthakarāṇāṃ hetubhāvasvalakṣaṇabhāvābhāvācchaśaviṣāṇatulyā mahāmate nityācintyatā,
XXbsu021_u:770: yaduta vāgvikalpamātraṃ hi mahāmate śaśaviṣāṇaṃ svahetulakṣaṇābhāvāt /
XXbsu021_u:774: yasya punarmahāmate bāhyābhāvānnityānumānānnityācintyatvānnityam, tasyā nityācintyatāyāḥ svahetulakṣaṇaṃ na jānīte /
XXbsu021_u:777: saṃsāranirvāṇayoraviśeṣajñāḥ sarvabhāvavikalpābhāvādindriyāṇāmanāgataviṣayoparamācca mahāmate nirvāṇaṃ vikalpayanti na pratyātmagativijñānālayaṃ parāvṛttipūrvakaṃ mahāmate /
XXbsu021_u:778: ataste mahāmate mohapuruṣā yānatrayavādino bhavanti, na cittamātragatinirābhāasavādinaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:779: ataste mahāmate atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ svacittadṛśyagocarānabhijñā bāhyacittadṛśyagocarābhiniviṣṭāḥ
XXbsu021_u:788: dehabhogapratiṣṭhāgatisvabhāvalakṣaṇaṃ mahāmate ālayavijñānaṃ grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇena pravartamānaṃ bālā utpādasthitibhaṅgadṛṣṭidvayapatitāśayā utpādaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ sadasatorvikalpayanti /
XXbsu021_u:797: yaḥ śrāvakayānābhisamayaṃ dṛṣṭvā ṣaṭpañcamyāṃ bhūmau paryutthānakleśaprahīṇo vāsanakleśāprahīṇo
XXbsu021_u:798: samyaksiṃhanādaṃ nadati - kṣīṇā me jātiḥ, uṣitaṃ brahmacaryam, ityevamādi nigadya pudgalanairātmyaparicayādyāvannirvāṇabuddhirbhavati
XXbsu021_u:800: anye punarmahāmate kāraṇādhīnān sarvadharmān dṛṣṭvā nirvāṇagatibuddhayo bhavanti /
XXbsu021_u:803: atra te mahāmate kudṛṣṭivyāvṛttyarthaṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ //
XXbsu021_u:805: tatra mahāmate pratyekabuddhayānābhisamayagotrakaḥ, yaḥ pratyekābhisamaye deśyamāne aśruhṛṣṭaromāñcitatanurbhavati
XXbsu021_u:806: asaṃsargapratyayādbhāvābhiniveśabahuvividhasvakāyavaicitryarddhivyastayamakaprātihāryadarśane nirdiśyamāne 'nunīyate, sa pratyekabuddhayānābhisamayagotraka iti viditvā pratyekabuddhayānābhisamayānurūpā kathā karaṇīyā /
XXbsu021_u:812: yadā punarmahāmate trayāṇāmapyeṣāmanyatame deśyamāne svacittadṛśyadehālabhogapratiṣṭhācintyaviṣaye deśyamāne notrasati na saṃtrasati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate, veditavyamayaṃ tathāgatayānābhisamayagotraka iti /
XXbsu021_u:814: aniyatagotrakaḥ punarmahāmate triṣvapyeteṣu deśyamāneṣu yatrānunīyate tatrānuyojyaḥ syāt /
XXbsu021_u:817: pratyātmālaye tu svakleśavāsanāśuddhasya dharmanairātmyadarśanātsamādhisukhavihāraṃ prāpya śrāvako jinakāyatāṃ pratilapsyate //
XXbsu021_u:818: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣat -
XXbsu021_u:826: saṃjñānirodho nikhilaṃ cittamātre na vidyate // Lank_2.131 //
XXbsu021_u:829: tatra sarvakuśalamūlotsargaḥ katamaḥ? yaduta bodhisattvapiṭakanikṣepo 'bhyākhyānaṃ ca naite sūtrāntā vinayamokṣānukūlā iti bruvataḥ
XXbsu021_u:831: dvitīyaḥ punarmahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ bhavapraṇidhānopāyapūrvakatvānnāparinirvṛtaiḥ sarvasattvaiḥ parinirvāsyāmīti tato na parinirvāti /
XXbsu021_u:833: punarapi mahāmatirāha - katamo 'tra bhagavan atyantato na parinirvāti?
XXbsu021_u:834: bhagavānāha - bodhisattvecchantiko 'tra mahāmate ādiparinirvṛtān sarvadharmān viditvā atyantato na parinirvāti /
XXbsu021_u:837: tatkasya hetoḥ? yaduta aparityaktā hi mahāmate tathāgatānāṃ sarvasattvāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:839: punaraparaṃ mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena svabhāvalakṣaṇatrayakuśalena bhavitavyam /
XXbsu021_u:841: kathaṃ punarmahāmate parikalpitasvabhāvo nimittātpravartate? tatra mahāmate paratantrasvabhāvo
XXbsu021_u:844: parikalpitasvabhāvaṃ vyavasthāpayanti tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā nāmābhiniveśalakṣaṇena ca nāmavastunimittābhiniveśalakṣaṇena ca /
XXbsu021_u:846: nimittalakṣaṇābhiniveśaḥ punaryaduta teṣveva ādhyātmikabāhyeṣu dharmeṣu svasāmānyalakṣaṇaparijñānāvabodhaḥ
XXbsu021_u:849: tatra mahāmate pariniṣpannasvabhāvaḥ katamaḥ? yaduta nimittanāmavastulakṣaṇavikalpavirahitaṃ tathatāryajñānagatimanapratyātmāryajñānagatigocaraḥ /
XXbsu021_u:854: eṣa mahāmate pañcadharmasvabhāvalakṣaṇapravicayo nāma dharmaparyāyaḥ pratyātmāryajñānagatigocaraḥ, yatra tvayā anyaiśca bodhisattvaiḥ śikṣitavyam //
XXbsu021_u:855: punaraparaṃ mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nairātmyadvayalakṣaṇapravicayakuśalena bhavitavyam
XXbsu021_u:856: tatra mahāmate katamannairātmyadvayalakṣaṇam? yaduta ātmātmīyarahitaskandhadhātvāyatanakadambamajñānakarmatṛṣṇāprabhavaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpādigrahaṇābhiniveśātpravartamānaṃ vijñānaṃ sarvendriyaiḥ svacittadṛśyabhājanadehālayasvacittavikalpavikalpitaṃ vijñāpayati /
XXbsu021_u:860: tatra mahāmate dharmanairātmyajñānaṃ katamat? yaduta skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ parikalpitalakṣaṇasvabhāvāvabodhaḥ
XXbsu021_u:861: yathā mahāmate skandhadhātvāyatanānyātmavirahitāni skandhasamūhamātraṃ hetukarmatṛṣṇāsūtropanibaddhamanyonyapratyayatayā pravartate nirīham,
XXbsu021_u:862: tathā skandhā api mahāmate svasāmānyalakṣaṇavirahitā abhūtaparikalpalakṣaṇavicitraprabhāvitā bālairvikalpyante na tvāryaiḥ /
XXbsu021_u:863: (Vaidya 30) cittamanomanovijñānapañcadharmasvabhāvarahitān mahāmate sarvadharmān vibhāvayan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmanairātmyakuśalo bhavati /
XXbsu021_u:864: dharmanairātmyakuśalaḥ punarmahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nacirātprathamāṃ bodhisattvabhūmiṃ nirābhāsapravicayāṃ pratilabhate /
XXbsu021_u:871: atra te mahāmate śikṣitavyam, anyaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ //
XXbsu021_u:872: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat
XXbsu021_u:873: - samāropāpavādalakṣaṇaṃ me bhagavān deśayatu yathāhaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvāḥ samāropāpavādakudṛṣṭivarjitamatayaḥ
XXbsu021_u:876: atha khalu bhagavān punarapi mahāmaterbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyādhyeṣaṇāṃ viditvā imāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata
XXbsu021_u:884: apavādaḥ punarmahāmate katamaḥ? yaduta asyaiva kudṛṣṭisamāropasyānupalabdhipravicayābhāvādapavādo bhavati /
XXbsu021_u:886: punaraparaṃ mahāmate asallakṣaṇasamāropasya lakṣaṇaṃ katamat? yaduta skandhadhātvāyatanānāmasatsvasāmānyalakṣaṇābhiniveśaḥ - idamevamidaṃ nānyatheti /
XXbsu021_u:892: asaddhetusamāropaḥ punarmahāmate yaduta ahetusamutpannaṃ prāgvijñānaṃ paścādabhūtvā māyāvadanutpannaṃ pūrvaṃ cakṣūrūpālokasmṛtipūrvakaṃ pravartate /
XXbsu021_u:904: parikalpitasvabhāvā iva paratantrāśayā viśvarūpacintāmaṇisadṛśāḥ sarvabuddhakṣetraparṣanmaṇḍalagatā māyāsvapnapratibhāsapratibimbodakacandragatisamānutpādabhaṅgaśāśvatocchedarahitān sarvadharmān saṃmukhaṃ sarvatathāgatebhyaḥ
XXbsu021_u:907: yāvadanekāni samādhikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi pratilabhyaḥ taiḥ samādhibhiḥ kṣetrātkṣetraṃ saṃkrāmanti
XXbsu021_u:908: buddhapūjābhiyuktāśca sarvopapattidevabhavanālayeṣu ratnatrayamupadeśya buddharūpamāsthāya śrāvakagaṇabodhisattvagaṇaparivṛtāḥ svacittadṛśyamātrāvatāraṇatayā bāhyabhāvābhāvopadeśaṃ kurvanti sadasatpakṣavinivṛttyartham //
XXbsu021_u:912: labhante te balābhijñāvaśitaiḥ saha saṃyutam // Lank_2.134 //
XXbsu021_u:913: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma - deśayatu bhagavān
XXbsu021_u:915: ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā nāstyastivikalpavarjitāḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeran
XXbsu021_u:916: atha khalu bhagavān mahāmatiṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - tena hi mahāmate śṛṇu, tatsādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru /
XXbsu021_u:918: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
XXbsu021_u:923: yaduta lakṣaṇaśūnyatā bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā apracaritaśūnyatā pracaritaśūnyatā sarvadharmanirabhilāpyaśūnyatā paramārthāryajñānamahāśūnyatā itaretaraśūnyatā ca saptamī //
XXbsu021_u:924: (Vaidya 32) tatra mahāmate lakṣaṇaśūnyatā katamā? yaduta svasāmānyalakṣaṇaśūnyāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ
XXbsu021_u:928: bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā punarmahāmate katamā? yaduta svayaṃ svabhāvābhāvotpattito mahāmate bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā bhavati sarvadharmāṇām /
XXbsu021_u:930: apracaritaśūnyatā punarmahāmate katamā? yaduta apracaritapūrvaṃ nirvāṇaṃ
XXbsu021_u:933: pracaritaśūnyatā punarmahāmate katamā? yaduta skandhā ātmātmīyarahitā
XXbsu021_u:938: paramārthāryajñānamahāśūnyatā punarmahāmate katamā? yaduta svapratyātmāryajñānādhigamaḥ sarvadṛṣṭidoṣavāsanābhiḥ śūnyaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:940: itaretaraśūnyatā punarmahāmate katamā? yaduta yadyatra nāsti tattena śūnyamityucyate /
XXbsu021_u:941: tadyathā mahāmate śṛgālamātuḥ prāsāde hastigavaiḍakādyā na santi /
XXbsu021_u:944: na ca punarmahāmate prāsādaḥ prāsādabhāvato nāsti, bhikṣavaśca bhikṣubhāvato na santi /
XXbsu021_u:945: na ca te 'nyatra hastigavaiḍakādyā bhāvā nāvatiṣṭhante /
XXbsu021_u:952: na svayamutpadyate, na ca punarmahāmate te notpadyante anyatra
XXbsu021_u:958: advayalakṣaṇaṃ punarmahāmate katamat? yaduta cchāyātapavaddīrghahrasvakṛṣṇaśuklavanmahāmate dvayaprabhāviatā na pṛthakpṛthak /
XXbsu021_u:960: na yatra mahāmate nirvāṇaṃ tatra saṃsāraḥ /
XXbsu021_u:965: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmime gāthe abhāṣata -
XXbsu021_u:967: saṃsāraṃ svapnamāyākhyaṃ na ca karma vinaśyati // Lank_2.135 //
XXbsu021_u:971: atha khalu bhagavān punarapi mahāmatiṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat
XXbsu021_u:974: eṣa hi mahāmate sūtrāntaḥ sarvasattvāśayadeśanārthavyabhicāraṇī, na sā tattvapratyavasthānakathā
XXbsu021_u:976: udakabhāvābhiniveśenābhiniveśyate, tasyāṃ codakaṃ nāsti, evameva mahāmate sarvasūtrāntadeśanā dharmā bālānāṃ svavikalpasaṃtoṣaṇam, na tu sā
XXbsu021_u:978: tasmāttarhi mahāmate arthānusāriṇā bhavitavyaṃ na deśanābhilāpābhiniviṣṭena //
XXbsu021_u:981: sa ca kila tvayā prakṛtiprabhāsvaraviśuddhyādiviśuddha eva varṇyate dvātriṃśallakṣaṇadharaḥ sarvasattvadehāntargataḥ /
XXbsu021_u:982: mahārghamūlyaratnaṃ malinavastupariveṣṭitamiva skandhadhātvāyatanavastuveṣṭito rāgadveṣamohābhūtaparikalpamalamalino nityo dhruvaḥ śivaḥ śāśvataśca bhagavatā varṇitaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:983: tatkathamayaṃ bhagavaṃstīrthakarātmavādatulyastathāgatagarbhavādo na bhavati? tīrthakarā api bhagavan nityaḥ kartā nirguṇo vibhuravyaya ityātmavādopadeśaṃ kurvanti
XXbsu021_u:984: bhagavānāha - na hi mahāmate tīrthakarātmavādatulyo mama tathāgatagarbhopadeśaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:985: kiṃ tu mahāmate tathāgatāḥ śūnyatābhūtakoṭinirvāṇānutpādānimittāpraṇihitādyānāṃ mahāmate padārthānāṃ tathāgatagarbhopadeśaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bālānāṃ nairātmyasaṃtrāsapadavivarjanārthaṃ nirvikalpanirābhāsagocaraṃ tathāgatagarbhamukhopadeśena deśayanti /
XXbsu021_u:986: na cātra mahāmate anāgatapratyutpannaiḥ bodhisattvairmahāsattvairātmābhiniveśaḥ kartavyaḥ
XXbsu021_u:987: tadyathā mahāmate kumbhakāra ekasmānmṛtparamāṇurāśervividhāni bhāṇḍāni karoti hastaśilpadaṇḍodakasūtraprayatnayogāt, evameva mahāmate tathāgatāstadeva dharmanairātmyaṃ sarvavikalpalakṣaṇavinivṛttaṃ vividhaiḥ prajñopāyakauśalyayogairgarbhopadeśena vā nairātmyopadeśena vā kumbhakāravaccitraiḥ padavyañjanaparyāyairdeśayante etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate tīrthakarātmavādopadeśatulyastathāgatagarbhopadeśo na bhavati /
XXbsu021_u:988: evaṃ hi mahāmate tathāgatagarbhopadeśamātmavādābhiniviṣṭānāṃ tīrthakarāṇāmākarṣaṇārthaṃ tathāgatagarbhopadeśena nirdiśanti - kathaṃ bata abhūtātmavikalpadṛṣṭipatitāśayā vimokṣatrayagocarapatitāśayopetāḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeranniti /
XXbsu021_u:989: etadarthaṃ mahāmate tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāstathāgatagarbhopadeśaṃ kurvanti /
XXbsu021_u:991: tasmāttarhi mahāmate tīrthakaradṛṣṭivinivṛttyarthaṃ tathāgatanairātmyagarbhānusāriṇā ca te bhavitavyam //
XXbsu021_u:996: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo 'nāgatāṃ janatāṃ samālokya punarapi
XXbsu021_u:997: bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma - deśayatu me bhagavān yogābhisamayaṃ yathā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahāyogayogino bhavanti /
XXbsu021_u:999: caturbhirmahāmate dharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā mahāyogayogino bhavanti
XXbsu021_u:1001: utpādasthitibhaṅgadṛṣṭivivarjanatayā ca bāhyabhāvābhāvopalakṣaṇatayā ca svapratyātmāryajñānādhigamābhilakṣaṇatayā ca /
XXbsu021_u:1002: ebhirmahāmate caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahāyogayogino bhavanti
XXbsu021_u:1003: tatra kathaṃ mahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svacittadṛśyavibhāvanākuśalo
XXbsu021_u:1004: bhavati? yaduta sa evaṃ pratyavekṣate - svacittamātramidaṃ traidhātukamātmātmīyarahitaṃ nirīhamāyūhaniyūhavigatamanādikālaprapañcadauṣṭhulyavāsanābhiniveśavāsitaṃ traidhātukavicitrarūpopacāropanibaddhaṃ dehabhogapratiṣṭhāgativikalpānugataṃ vikalpyate khyāyate ca /
XXbsu021_u:1005: evaṃ hi mahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svacittadṛśyavibhāvanākuśalo bhavati //
XXbsu021_u:1006: kathaṃ punarmahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattva utpādasthitibhaṅgadṛṣṭivivarjito bhavati? yaduta māyāsvapnarūpajanmasadṛśāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ svaparobhayābhāvānnotpadyante /
XXbsu021_u:1007: svacittamātrānusāritvādbāhyabhāvābhāvadarśanādvijñānānāmapravṛttiṃ dṛṣṭvā pratyayānāmakūṭarāśitvaṃ ca vikalpapratyayodbhavaṃ traidhātukaṃ paśyanto 'dhyātmabāhyasarvadharmānupalabdhibhirniḥsvabhāvadarśanādutpādadṛṣṭivinivṛttau
XXbsu021_u:1010: mahāmatirāha - manomayakāya iti bhagavan kena kāraṇena? bhagavānāha -
XXbsu021_u:1012: tadyathā mahāmate mano 'pratihataṃ girikuḍyanadīvṛkṣādiṣvanekāni yojanaśatasahasrāṇi pūrvadṛṣṭānubhūtān viṣayānanusmaran svacittaprabandhāvicchinnaśarīramapratihatagati pravartate, evameva mahāmate manomayakāyasahapratilambhena māyopamasamena samādhinā balavaśitābhijñānalakṣaṇakusumitamāryagatinikāyasahajo mana iva pravartate
XXbsu021_u:1014: evaṃ hi mahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattva utpādasthitibhaṅgadṛṣṭivivarjito bhavati //
XXbsu021_u:1015: tatra kathaṃ mahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bāhyabhāvābhāvopalakṣaṇakuśalo bhavati? yaduta marīcisvapnakeśoṇḍukaprakhyā mahāmate sarvabhāvāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1017: ebhirmahāmate caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahāyogayogino bhavanti
XXbsu021_u:1020: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma -
XXbsu021_u:1021: deśayatu me bhagavān hetupratyayalakṣaṇaṃ sarvadharmāṇām, yena hetupratyayalakṣaṇāvabodhena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā sadasaddṛṣṭivikalparahitāḥ sarvabhāvanākramaṃ yugapadutpattiṃ na kalpayeyuḥ //
XXbsu021_u:1023: sarvadharmāṇāṃ yaduta bāhyaṃ ca ādhyātmikaṃ ca /
XXbsu021_u:1026: yathā ca mahāmate ghaṭo mṛtpiṇḍādeva, tantubhyaḥ paṭāḥ,
XXbsu021_u:1027: vīraṇebhyaḥ kaṭāḥ, bījādaṅkuraḥ, manthādipuruṣaprayatnayogāddadhno navanīta utpadyate, evameva mahāmate bāhyaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pūrvottarottaro draṣṭavyam //
XXbsu021_u:1028: tatra ādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādo yaduta avidyā tṛṣā karmetyevamādyā mahāmate dharmāḥ pratītyasamutpādasaṃjñāṃ pratilabhante /
XXbsu021_u:1029: ebhya utpannā mahāmate skandhadhātvāyatanākhyā dharmāḥ pratītyasamutpādasaṃjñāṃ pratilabhante
XXbsu021_u:1037: vyañjanahetuḥ punarmahāmate utpannasya vikalpasya bhāvasya lakṣaṇoddyotanakṛtyaṃ karoti pradīpavadrūpādīnām
XXbsu021_u:1039: ete hi mahāmate svavikalpakalpitā bālapṛthagjanairna kramavṛttyā na yugapatpravartante /
XXbsu021_u:1040: tatkasya hetoḥ? yadi punarmahāmate yugapatpravarteran, kāryakāraṇavibhāgo na syādapratilabdhahetulakṣaṇatvāt
XXbsu021_u:1041: / atha kramavṛttyā pravarteran, alabdhasya lakṣaṇātmakatvātkramavṛttyā na
XXbsu021_u:1051: utpadyante nirudhyante pratyayā eva kalpitāḥ // Lank_2.138 //
XXbsu021_u:1054: yatra bālā vikalpanti pratyayaiḥ sa nivāryate // Lank_2.139 //
XXbsu021_u:1059: tadā grāhaśca grāhyaṃ ca bhrāntiṃ dṛṣṭvā nivartate // Lank_2.141 //
XXbsu021_u:1060: na cotpādyaṃ na cotpannaḥ pratyayo 'pi na kiṃcana /
XXbsu021_u:1062: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat
XXbsu021_u:1063: - deśayatu me bhagavān vāgvikalpalakṣaṇahṛdayaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ yena vāgvikalpalakṣaṇahṛdayena bhagavan suprativibhāgavinibaddhena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā abhilāpābhilāpyārthadvayagatiṃgatāḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya abhilāpābhilāpyārthadvayagatiṃ sarvasattvānāṃ viśodhayeyuḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1065: tena hi mahāmate śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru /
XXbsu021_u:1067: sādhu bhagavan iti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
XXbsu021_u:1074: etaddhi mahāmate caturvidhaṃ vāgvikalpalakṣaṇamiti me yaduktam, idaṃ tatpratyuktam //
XXbsu021_u:1075: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametamevārthamadhyeṣate sma - deśayatu me bhagavān punarapi vāgvikalpābhivyaktigocaram /
XXbsu021_u:1076: kutra kasmāt kathaṃ kena bhagavan nṛṇāṃ vāgvijñaptivikalpaḥ pravartate? bhagavānāha -
XXbsu021_u:1078: mahāmatirāha - kiṃ punarbhagavan vāg vikalpādanyā uta ananyā?
XXbsu021_u:1079: bhagavānāha - na hi mahāmate vāg vikalpādanyā nānanyā /
XXbsu021_u:1082: yadi punarmahāmate vāg vikalpādanyā syāt, avikalpahetukī syāt /
XXbsu021_u:1088: punarapi mahāmatirāha - kiṃ punarbhagavan vacanameva paramārthaḥ, uta yadvacanenābhilapyate sa paramārthaḥ? bhagavānāha - na mahāmate vacanaṃ
XXbsu021_u:1089: paramārthaḥ, na ca yadvacanenābhilapyate sa paramārthaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1104: bhavaṃ parīkṣeta na saṃsāre nāpi nirvāyāt // Lank_2.144 //
XXbsu021_u:1106: pralobhya krīḍayitvā ca bhūtān dadyāttato mṛgān // Lank_2.145 //
XXbsu021_u:1109: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat
XXbsu021_u:1112: yathā ca ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā evamādiṣu parikalpitasvabhāvasvasāmānya lakṣaṇavinivṛttadṛṣṭayaḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya sarvasattvānāṃ sarvaguṇasaṃpattīḥ paripūrayema bhagavānāha - sādhu sādhu mahāmate, sādhu khalu punastvaṃ mahāmate,
XXbsu021_u:1114: bahujanahitāya tvaṃ mahāmate pratipanno bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca /
XXbsu021_u:1115: tena hi mahāmate śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu
XXbsu021_u:1118: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ (Vaidya 38) pratyaśrauṣīt /
XXbsu021_u:1119: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - svacittadṛśyamātrānavabodhānmahāmate bālapṛthagjanā bāhyavicitrabhāvābhiniveśena ca nāstyastitvaikatvānyatvobhayanaivāstinanāstinityānityasvabhāvavāsanāhetuvikalpābhiniveśena vikalpayanti /
XXbsu021_u:1120: tadyathā mahāmate mṛgatṛṣṇodakaṃ mṛgā udakabhāvena vikalpya grīṣmābhitaptāḥ pātukāmatayā pradhāvanti,
XXbsu021_u:1121: svacittadṛṣṭibhrāntyanavabodhānna prajānantinātrodakamiti, evameva mahāmate bālapṛthagjanā anādikālavividhaprapañcavikalpavāsitamatayo rāgadveṣamohāgnitāpitamanaso vicitrarūpaviṣayābhilāṣiṇaḥ
XXbsu021_u:1128: tadyathā mahāmate kaścideva puruṣaḥ śayitaḥ svapnāntare strīpuruṣahastyaśvarathapadātigrāmanagaranigamagomahiṣavanodyānavividhagirinadītaḍāgopaśobhitaṃ janapadamantaḥpuraṃ praviśya prativibudhyeta /
XXbsu021_u:1131: api nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet, yastadabhūtaṃ
XXbsu021_u:1133: bhagavānāha - evameva mahāmate bālapṛthagjanāḥ kudṛṣṭidaṣṭāstīrthyamatayaḥ svapnatulyātsvacittadṛśyabhāvānna
XXbsu021_u:1135: tadyathā mahāmate citrakarakṛtapradeśā animnonnatāḥ santo nimnonnatā bālaiḥ kalpyante,
XXbsu021_u:1138: te ekatvānyatvobhayānubhayavādābhiniviṣṭāḥ svayaṃ naṣṭā anyānapi sadasatpakṣaviviktānutpādavādino nāstikā iti vakṣyanti /
XXbsu021_u:1142: tadyathā mahāmate taimirikāḥ keśoṇḍukaṃ dṛṣṭvā parasparamācakṣate - iadaṃ citramidaṃ citramiti paśyantu bho mārṣāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1143: tacca keśoṇḍukamubhayānutpannatayā na bhāvo nābhāvo darśanādarśanataḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1144: evameva mahāmate tīrthyakudṛṣṭivikalpāśayābhiniviṣṭāḥ sadasatpakṣaikatvānyatvobhayānubhayatvavādābhiniviṣṭāḥ saddharmāpavādakā ātmānaṃ parāṃśca vinipātayiṣyanti /
XXbsu021_u:1145: tadyathā mahāmate acakramalātacakraṃ bālaiścakrabhāvena parikalpyate na paṇḍitaiḥ, evameva mahāmate kudṛṣṭitīrthyāśayapatitā ekatvānyatvobhayānubhayatvaṃ parikalpayiṣyanti
XXbsu021_u:1147: tadyathā mahāmate deve pravarṣati jalabudbudakāḥ sphaṭikamaṇisadṛśāḥ khyāyante /
XXbsu021_u:1149: te ca mahāmate udakabudbudakā na maṇayo nāmaṇayo grahaṇāgrahaṇataḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1153: punaraparaṃ mahāmate pramāṇatrayāvayavapratyavasthānaṃ kṛtvā āryajñānapratyātmādhigamyaṃ svabhāvadvayavinirmuktaṃ vastu svabhāvato vidyata iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
XXbsu021_u:1154: na ca mahāmate cittamano manovijñānacittaparāvṛttyāśrayāṇāṃ svacittadṛśyagrāhyagrāhakavikalpaprahīṇānāṃ tathāgatabhūmipratyātmāryajñānagatānāṃ yogināṃ bhāvābhāvasaṃjñā pravartate /
XXbsu021_u:1156: sa evaiṣāmātmagrāhaḥ poṣagrāhaḥ puruṣagrāhaḥ pudgalagrāhaḥ syāt /
XXbsu021_u:1157: yā punarevaṃ mahāmate bhāvasvabhāvasvasāmānyalakṣaṇadeśanā, eṣā mahāmate nairmāṇikabuddhadeśanāḥ na dharmatābuddhadeśanā /
XXbsu021_u:1160: sā ca na cchāyā nācchāyā vṛkṣasaṃsthānāsaṃsthānataḥ, evameva mahāmate tīrthyadṛṣṭivāsanāvāsitavikalpā ekatvānyatvobhayatvānubhayatvanāstyastitvaṃ vikalpayiṣyanti
XXbsu021_u:1162: tadyathā mahāmate darpaṇāntargatāni sarvarūpapratibimbakāni khyāyante yathāpratyayataḥ svavikalpanācca, na tāni bimbāni nābimbāni bimbābimbadarśanataḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1163: atha ca te mahāmate svacittadṛśyavikalpāḥ khyāyante bālānāṃ bimbākṛtayaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1166: sā ca na bhāvā nābhāvā ghoṣāghoṣaśravaṇataḥ, evameva mahāmate nāstyastitvaikatvānyatvobhayanobhayadṛṣṭisvacittavāsanāvikalpāḥ khyāyante /
XXbsu021_u:1168: te ca na bhāvā nābhāvā lobhyālobhyataḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1170: tadyathā mahāmate vetālayantrapuruṣau niḥsattvau piśācayuktigātspandanakriyāṃ kurvāte /
XXbsu021_u:1171: tatra ca asadvikalpe bālā abhiniviśante gamanāgamanataḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1182: mṛgā gṛhṇanti pānīyaṃ na cāsyāṃ vastu vidyate // Lank_2.149 //
XXbsu021_u:1184: bālā gṛhṇanti jāyantaṃ timiraṃ taimirā yathā // Lank_2.150 //
XXbsu021_u:1186: bālaḥ kīle yathā kīlaṃ pralobhya vinivartayet // Lank_2.151 //
XXbsu021_u:1190: evaṃ dharmān vijānanto na kiṃcitpratijānate // Lank_2.153 //
XXbsu021_u:1192: skandhāḥ keśoṇḍukākārā yatra cāsau vikalpyate // Lank_2.154 //
XXbsu021_u:1193: cittaṃ keśoṇḍukaṃ māyāṃ svapna gandharvameva ca /
XXbsu021_u:1194: alātaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇā ca asantaḥ khyāti vai nṛṇām // Lank_2.155 //
XXbsu021_u:1197: darpaṇe udake netre bhāṇḍeṣu ca maṇīṣu ca /
XXbsu021_u:1198: bimbaṃ hi dṛśyate teṣu bimbaṃ nāsti ca kutracid // Lank_2.157 //
XXbsu021_u:1199: bhāvābhāsaṃ tathā cittaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇā yathā nabhe /
XXbsu021_u:1200: dṛśyate citrarūpeṇa svapne vandhyauraso yathā // Lank_2.158 //
XXbsu021_u:1201: punaraparaṃ mahāmate catuṣṭayavinirmuktā tathāgatānāṃ dharmadeśanā, yaduta ekatvānyatvobhayānubhayapakṣavivarjitā nāstyastisamāropāpavādavinirmuktā /
XXbsu021_u:1204: punaraparaṃ mahāmate kleśajñeyāvaraṇadvayaviśuddhyarthaṃ sārthavāhavadānupūrvyā aṣṭottare nirābhāsapadaśate pratiṣṭhāpayanti yānabhūmyaṅgasuvibhāgalakṣaṇe ca //
XXbsu021_u:1206: katamaccaturvidham? yaduta bālopacārikaṃ dhyānam, arthapravicayaṃ dhyānam, tathatālambanaṃ
XXbsu021_u:1210: evamidaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ nānyatheti (Vaidya 41) paśyataḥ pūrvottarottarata ā
XXbsu021_u:1214: tatra tathatālambanaṃ dhyānaṃ mahāmate katamat? yaduta parikalpitanairātmyadvayavikalpayathābhūtāvasthānādapravṛttervikalpasya tathatālambanamiti vadāmi /
XXbsu021_u:1219: tathatālambanaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyānaṃ tāthāgataṃ śubham // Lank_2.159 //
XXbsu021_u:1222: nimittāni ca citrāṇi tīrthamārgaṃ nayanti te /
XXbsu021_u:1226: śiro hi tasya mārjanti nimittaṃ tathatānugam // Lank_2.162 //
XXbsu021_u:1227: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat
XXbsu021_u:1234: tatrānucchedo yaduta sarvārthā atītānāgatapratyutpannāḥ pratyātmamapi gacchanti, ato nocchedaḥ punarmahāmate mahāparinirvāṇaṃ na nāśo na maraṇam /
XXbsu021_u:1235: yadi punarmahāmate mahāparinirvāṇaṃ maraṇaṃ syāt, punarapi janmaprabandhaḥ syāt /
XXbsu021_u:1237: ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate mahāparinirvāṇaṃ na nāśaṃ na maraṇam /
XXbsu021_u:1251: punaraparaṃ mahāmate adhiṣṭhānadvayādhiṣṭhitā bodhisattvāstathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ caraṇayornipatya praśnān paripṛcchanti /
XXbsu021_u:1253: tatra mahāmate bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prathamāyāṃ bhūmau buddhādhiṣṭhānādhiṣṭhitā mahāyānaprabhāsaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpadyante /
XXbsu021_u:1254: samanantarasamāpannānāṃ ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mahāyānaprabhāsaṃ bodhisattvasamādhim, atha daśadiglokadhātuvyavasthitāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā mukhānyupadarśya sarvakāyamukhavācāsaṃdarśanenādhiṣṭhānaṃ kurvanti /
XXbsu021_u:1255: yathā mahāmate vajragarbhasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anyeṣāṃ ca tādṛglakṣaṇaguṇasamanvāgatānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām, evaṃ mahāmate prathamāyāṃ bhūmau bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ samādhisamāpattyadhiṣṭhānaṃ pratilabhante /
XXbsu021_u:1256: kalpaśatasahasraṃ saṃcitaiḥ kuśalamūlairanupūrveṇa bhūmipakṣavipakṣalakṣaṇagatiṃgatāṃ dharmameghāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau mahāpadmavimānāsanasthasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tadanurūpairbodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ parivṛtasya sarvaratnābharaṇavibhūṣitakirīṭasya haritālakanakacampakacandrāṃśumayūkhapadmasadṛśā daśadiglokadhātvāgatā
XXbsu021_u:1258: sa ca bodhisattvaste ca bodhisattvāḥ pāṇyabhiṣekādhiṣṭhānādhiṣṭhitā ityucyante /
XXbsu021_u:1262: punaraparaṃ mahāmate yatkiṃcidbodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pratibhāti samādhyṛddhideśanākāreṇa, tatsarvabuddhādhiṣṭhānadvayādhiṣṭhitānām /
XXbsu021_u:1263: yadi punarmahāmate bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmadhiṣṭhānamantareṇa pratibhānaṃ pratibhāyāt, bālapṛthagjanānāmapi mahāmate pratibhānaṃ pratibhāyāt /
XXbsu021_u:1265: tṛṇagulmavṛkṣaparvatā api mahāmate vividhāni ca vādyabhāṇḍāni nagarabhavanagṛhavimānāsanasthānāni tathāgatapraveśādhiṣṭhānena pravādyante /
XXbsu021_u:1266: kiṃ punarmahāmate sacetanā mūkāndhabadhirā api mahāmate svadoṣebhyo vimucyante /
XXbsu021_u:1269: samyaksaṃbuddhā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ samādhisamāpattyavasthānakāle viśeṣabhūmau ca abhiṣekādhiṣṭhānaṃ prakurvanti? (Vaidya 43) bhagavānāha -
XXbsu021_u:1270: mārakarmakleśaviyuktārthaṃ śrāvakadhyānabhūmyaprapatanatayā ca tathāgatabhūmipratyātmādhigamanatayā ca prāptadharmādhigamavivṛddhaye ca /
XXbsu021_u:1271: etena mahāmate kāraṇena tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmadhiṣṭhānairadhitiṣṭhanti
XXbsu021_u:1272: anadhiṣṭhitāśca mahāmate bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kutīrthyaśrāvakamārāśayapatitā nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeran /
XXbsu021_u:1278: pratītyasamutpādaṃ punarbhagavatā deśayatā kāraṇavyapadeśa eva kṛto na svanayaprakṛtyavasthānakathā
XXbsu021_u:1279: tīrthakarā api bhagavan kāraṇata utpattiṃ varṇayanti, yaduta pradhāneśvarapuruṣakālāṇupratyayebhyo bhāvānāmutpattayaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1285: avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvajjarāmaraṇamiti, ahetuvādavyapadeśa eṣa bhagavatānuvarṇitaḥ, na sa hetuvādaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1286: yugapadvayavasthitānāṃ bhagavannetadbhavati - asmin satīdaṃ bhavatīti, na kramavṛttyapekṣāvasthitānām
XXbsu021_u:1287: kiṃ tu tīrthakaravyapadeśa eva bhagavan viśiṣyate na tvadīyam /
XXbsu021_u:1290: tava tu bhagavan kāraṇamapi kāryāpekṣaṃ kāryamapi kāraṇāpekṣam /
XXbsu021_u:1292: ahetutvaṃ ca bhagavan lokasya - asmin satīdaṃ bruvataḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1296: ye tu mahāmate grāhyagrāhakābhiniviṣṭāḥ svacittadṛśyamātraṃ nāvabudhyante
XXbsu021_u:1297: bāhyasvaviṣayabhāvābhāvatvena, teṣāṃ mahāmate eṣa doṣaḥ prasajyate , na tu mama pratītyakāraṇavyapadeśaṃ kurvataḥ //
XXbsu021_u:1300: yadi punarbhagavan bhāvā na syuḥ, abhilāpo na pravartate /
XXbsu021_u:1305: te ca mahāmate na bhāvā nābhāvāḥ, abhilapyante ca /
XXbsu021_u:1307: abhilāpasadbhāvātsanti sarvabhāvā iti, sa hi vādaḥ prahīṇaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1314: yathā mahāmate animiṣāyāṃ gandhasugandhāyāṃ ca lokadhātau samantabhadrasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya buddhakṣetre animiṣairnetraiḥ prekṣamāṇāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anutpattikadharmakṣāntiṃ pratilabhante anyāṃśca samādhiviśeṣān, ata evāsmātkāraṇānmahāmate nābhilāpasadbhāvātsanti sarvabhāvāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1316: iha loke kṛmimakṣikaivamādyāḥ sattvaviśeṣā anabhilāpenaiva svakṛtyaṃ kurvanti //
XXbsu021_u:1318: ākāśaṃ śaśaśṛṅgaṃ ca vandhyāyāḥ putra eva ca /
XXbsu021_u:1319: asanto hyabhilapyante tathā bhāveṣu kalpanā // Lank_2.164 //
XXbsu021_u:1322: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat
XXbsu021_u:1323: - nityaśabdaḥ punarbhagavan kvabhihitaḥ? bhagavānāha - bhrāntau mahāmate /
XXbsu021_u:1325: tadyathā mahāmate mṛgatṛṣṇālātacakrakeśoṇḍukagandharvanagaramāyāsvapnapratibimbākṣapuruṣā loke 'vidvadbhirviparyasyante, na tu vidvadbhiḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1330: kathaṃ punarmahāmate bhāvābhāvavivarjitā bhrāntiḥ? yaduta sarvabālavicitragocaratvātsamudrataraṃgagaṅgodakavatpretānāṃ darśanādarśanataḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1332: yasmācca tadudakamanyeṣāṃ khyāyate, ato hyabhāvo na bhavati /
XXbsu021_u:1335: na hi mahāmate bhrāntirvividhavicitranimittavikalpena vikalpyamānā bhedamupayāti
XXbsu021_u:1337: kathaṃ punarmahāmate bhrāntistattvaṃ bhavati? yena punaḥ kāraṇena mahāmate āryāṇāmasyāṃ bhrāntau viparyāsabuddhirna pravartate, nāviparyāsabuddhiḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1338: nānyatra mahāmate āryā asyāṃ bhrāntau yakiṃcitsaṃjñino bhavanti nāryajñānavastusaṃjñinaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1340: sā punarbhrāntirviparyāsāviparyāsena vikalpyamānā gotradvayāvahā bhavati yaduta āryagotrasya vā bālapṛthagjanagotrasya vā /
XXbsu021_u:1342: tatra kathaṃ punarmahāmate bālairbhrāntirvikalpyamānā śrāvakayānagotraṃ janayati? yaduta mahāmate svasāmānyalakṣaṇābhiniveśenābhiniviśyamānā śrāvakayānagotrāya saṃvartate /
XXbsu021_u:1343: evaṃ mahāmate sā bhrāntiḥ śrāvakayānagotrāvahā bhavati /
XXbsu021_u:1344: tatra kathaṃ punarmahāmate saiva bhrāntirvikalpyamānā pratyekabuddhayānagotrāvahā
XXbsu021_u:1345: bhavati? yaduta tasyā eva mahāmate bhrānteḥ svasāmānyalakṣaṇābhiniveśāsaṃsargataḥ pratyekabuddhayānagotrāvahā
XXbsu021_u:1347: bhrāntirvikalpyamānā buddhayānagotrāvahā bhavati? yaduta mahāmate svacittadṛśyamātrāvabodhādbāhyabhāvābhāvavikalpanatayā vikalpyamānā buddhayānagotrāavahā bhavati /
XXbsu021_u:1350: vicitravastubhāvanā punarmahāmate bālairbhrāntirvikalpyamānā saṃsārayānagotrāvahā bhavati, evamidaṃ nānyatheti /
XXbsu021_u:1354: ata etaduktaṃ bhavati mahāmate - tathatāpi cittavinirmukteti /
XXbsu021_u:1359: yadi punarmahāmate bhrāntirlakṣaṇābhiniveśena vidyate, avyāvṛtta eva mahāmate bhāvābhiniveśaḥ syāt /
XXbsu021_u:1361: mahāmatirāha - yadi bhagavan māyāprakhyā bhrāntiḥ, tenānyasyā bhrānteḥ kāraṇībhaviṣyati
XXbsu021_u:1364: avikalpyamānā māyā punarmahāmate parapuruṣavidyādhiṣṭhānātpravartate, na svavikalpadauṣṭhulyavāsanādhiṣṭhānataḥ
XXbsu021_u:1368: āryo na paśyati bhrāntiṃ nāpi tattvaṃ tadantare /
XXbsu021_u:1370: bhrāntiṃ vidhūya sarvāṃ hi nimittaṃ jāyate yadi /
XXbsu021_u:1371: saiva tasya bhavedbhrāntiraśuddhaṃ timiraṃ yathā // Lank_2.167 //
XXbsu021_u:1374: mahāmatirāha - kiṃ punarbhagavan vicitramāyābhiniveśalakṣaṇena sarvadharmāṇāṃ māyopamatvaṃ bhavati, atha
XXbsu021_u:1376: sarvadharmāṇāṃ māyopamatvaṃ bhavati, hanta bhagavan na bhāvā māyopamāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1378: na hi bhagavan kaściddheturasti yena rūpaṃ vicitralakṣaṇākāraṃ khyāyate māyāvat /
XXbsu021_u:1381: māyopamāḥ, kiṃ tarhi mahāmate vitathāśuvidyutsadṛśasādharmyeṇa sarvadharmā māyopamāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1382: tadyathā mahāmate (Vaidya 46) vidyullatā kṣaṇabhaṅgadṛṣṭanaṣṭadarśanaṃ punarbālānāṃ khyāyate, evameva mahāmate sarvabhāvāḥ svavikalpasāmānyalakṣaṇāḥ pravicayābhāvānna khyāyante rūpalakṣaṇābhiniveśataḥ tatredamucyate -
XXbsu021_u:1385: punaraparaṃ mahāmatirāha - yatpunaretaduktaṃ bhagavatā - anutpannāḥ sarvabhāvā māyopamāśceti
XXbsu021_u:1386: nanu te bhagavan evaṃ bruvataḥ pūrvottaravacanavyāghātadoṣaḥ prasajyate, anutpādaṃ bhāvānāṃ māyopamatvenābhilapataḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1387: bhagavānāha - na mahāmate mamānutpādaṃ bhāvānāṃ māyopamatvenābhilapataḥ pūrvottaravacanavyāghātadoṣo bhavati /
XXbsu021_u:1391: tīrthakaramohavargā hi mahāmate sadasatorbhāvānāmutpattimicchanti na svavikalpavicitrābhiniveśapratyayataḥ
XXbsu021_u:1394: bhāvopadeśaḥ punarmahāmate saṃsāraparigrahārthaṃ ca nāstītyucchedanivāraṇārthaṃ ca /
XXbsu021_u:1396: māyābhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇanirdeśena mahāmate bhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇavyāvṛttyarthaṃ bālapṛthagjanānāṃ kṛdṛṣṭilakṣaṇapatitāśayānāṃ svacittadṛśyamātrānavadhāriṇāṃ hetupratyayakriyotpattilakṣaṇābhiniviṣṭhānāṃ nivāraṇārthaṃ māyāsvapnasvabhāvalakṣaṇān sarvadharmān deśayāmi /
XXbsu021_u:1397: ete bālapṛthagjanāḥ kudṛṣṭilakṣaṇāśayābhiniviṣṭā ātmānaṃ paraṃ ca sarvadharmā yathābhūtāvasthānadarśanādvisaṃvādayiṣyanti
XXbsu021_u:1398: tatra yathābhūtāvasthānadarśanaṃ mahāmate sarvadharmāṇāṃ yaduta svacittadṛśyamātrāvatāraḥ
XXbsu021_u:1403: yairnāmapadavyañjanakāyaiḥ sūpalakṣitairbodhisattvā mahāsattvā arthapadavyañjanānusāriṇaḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya tathaiva sarvasattvānavabodhayiṣyanti /
XXbsu021_u:1404: tatra mahāmate kāyo nāma yaduta yadvastvāśritya nāma kriyate, sa kāyo vastu /
XXbsu021_u:1414: nāma punarmahāmate yaduta akṣarāṇāṃ ca nāmasvabhāvabhedo 'kārādyāvaddhakāraḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1416: tatra padakāyāḥ punarmahāmate ye padavīthīgāmino hastyaśvanaramṛgapaśugomahiṣājaiḍakādyāḥ padakāyasaṃjñāṃ labhante /
XXbsu021_u:1417: nāma ca vyañjanaṃ ca punarmahāmate catvāra arūpiṇaḥ skandhāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1418: nāmnābhilapyanta iti kṛtvā nāma, svalakṣaṇena vyajyate iti kṛtvā vyañjanam /
XXbsu021_u:1422: vyañjane padakāye ca nāmni cāpi viśeṣataḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1423: bālāḥ sajjanti durmedhā mahāpaṅke yathā gajāḥ // Lank_2.170 //
XXbsu021_u:1425: 'nāgate 'dhvani pṛṣṭā vidvadbhirekatvānyatvobhayānubhayadṛṣṭilakṣaṇavinirmuktamantadvayavidhiṃ pṛcchadbhirevaṃ vakṣyanti - apraśnamidaṃ nedaṃ yoniśa iti, yaduta rūpādibhyo 'nityatā anyā ananyeti /
XXbsu021_u:1426: evaṃ nirvāṇaṃ saṃskārebhyo lakṣaṇāllakṣaṇaṃ guṇebhyo guṇī bhūtebhyo bhautikaṃ dṛśyāddarśanaṃ pāṃśubhyo 'ṇavo jñānādyoginaḥ, evamādyenottarottarakramalakṣaṇavidhinā avyākṛtāni pṛṣṭāḥ sthāpanīyaṃ bhagavatā avyākṛtamiti vakṣyanti /
XXbsu021_u:1427: na tu te mohapuruṣā evaṃ jñāsyanti yathā śrotṝṇāṃ buddhivaikalyāt tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā utrāsapadavivarjanārthaṃ sattvānāṃ na vyākurvanti
XXbsu021_u:1428: / avyākṛtānyapi ca mahāmate tīrthakaradṛṣṭivādavyudāsārthaṃ nopadiśyante tathāgataiḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1429: tīrthakarā hi mahāmate evaṃvādinaḥ - yaduta sa jīvastaccharīram, anyo jīvo 'nyaccharīram, ityevamādye 'vyākṛtavādaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1430: tīrthakarāṇāṃ hi mahāmate kāraṇavisaṃmūḍhānāmavyākṛtaṃ na tu matpravacane
XXbsu021_u:1431: / matpravacane tu mahāmate grāhyagrāhakavisaṃyukte vikalpo na pravartate /
XXbsu021_u:1432: teṣāṃ kathaṃ sthāpyaṃ bhavet? ye tu mahāmate grāhyagrāhakābhiniviṣṭāḥ svacittadṛśyamātrānavadhāritamatayasteṣāṃ sthāpyaṃ bhavati /
XXbsu021_u:1433: caturvidhapadapraśnavyākaraṇena mahāmate tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayanti /
XXbsu021_u:1434: sthāpanīyamiti mahāmate kālāntaradeśanaiṣā mayā kṛtā aparipakvendriyāṇām /
XXbsu021_u:1438: niḥsvabhāvāḥ punarmahāmate sarvabhāvāḥ kena kāraṇenaḥ? yasmānmahāmate svabuddhyā vicāryamāṇānāṃ svasāmānyalakṣaṇābhāvā nāvadhāryante, tenocyante niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā iti /
XXbsu021_u:1439: tatra anāyūhāniryūhāḥ punarmahāmate sarvadharmāḥ kena kāraṇena? yasmānmahāmate svasāmānyalakṣaṇamāyūhyamānaṃ nāyuhyate, niryūhyamānaṃ na niryūhyate /
XXbsu021_u:1441: aniruddhāḥ punarmahāmate sarvadharmāḥ kena kāraṇena? yaduta bhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇāsattvātsarvadharmā
XXbsu021_u:1443: tatra (Vaidya 48) anityāḥ punarmahāmate sarvadharmāḥ kena kāraṇenocyante? yaduta lakṣaṇotpattyanityabhāvāt
XXbsu021_u:1445: tatra nityāḥ punarmahāmate sarvadharmāḥ kena kāraṇena? yaduta lakṣaṇotpannānutpannābhāvādanityatayā nityāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1451: avyākṛtāni sarvāṇi taireva hi prakāśitā // Lank_2.172 //
XXbsu021_u:1454: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat
XXbsu021_u:1456: yena srotaāpattigatiprabhedanayalakṣaṇena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ srotaāpannānāṃ srotaāpattigatiprabhedanayalakṣaṇakuśalā uttarottarasakṛdāgāmyanāgāmyarhattvopāyalakṣaṇavidhijñāstathā sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayeyuḥ, yathā nairātmyalakṣaṇadvayamāvaraṇadvayaṃ ca
XXbsu021_u:1459: bhagavānāha - tena hi mahāmate śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru /
XXbsu021_u:1461: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
XXbsu021_u:1464: katame trayaḥ? yaduta hīnamadhyaviśiṣṭāḥ tatra mahāmate hīnaḥ saptajanmabhavaparamaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1467: eṣāṃ tu mahāmate trayāṇāṃ trīṇi saṃyojanāni mṛdumadhyādhimātrāṇyeva bhavanti /
XXbsu021_u:1470: etāni mahāmate trīṇi saṃyojanāni viśeṣottarottareṇa arhatāmarhatphalībhavanti /
XXbsu021_u:1471: tatra mahāmate satkāyadṛṣṭirdvividhā yaduta sahajā ca parikalpitā ca,
XXbsu021_u:1474: sa ca tatra na sannāsanna sadasan, abhūtaparikalpalakṣaṇatvāt /
XXbsu021_u:1475: atha ca bālairvikalpyate vicitrasvabhāvalakṣaṇābhiniveśena mṛgatṛṣṇikeva mṛgaiḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1480: (Vaidya 49) rūpasyāsamudaya iti kṛtvā srotaāpannasya sadasatpakṣadṛṣṭidarśanātsatkāyadṛṣṭiḥ prahīṇā bhavati /
XXbsu021_u:1481: ata eva satkāyadṛṣṭiprahīṇasya rāgo na pravartate /
XXbsu021_u:1483: vicikitsālakṣaṇaṃ punarmahāmate yaduta prāptidharmādhigamasudṛṣṭilakṣaṇatvātpūrvaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭidvayavikalpaprahīṇatvācca vicikitsā dharmeṣu na bhavati /
XXbsu021_u:1486: śīlaṃ punarmahāmate kathaṃ na parāmṛśati srotaāpannaḥ? yaduta duḥkhopapattyāyatanalakṣaṇasaṃdṛṣṭatvānna parāmṛśati /
XXbsu021_u:1487: parāmṛṣṭiḥ punarmahāmate yaduta śīlavratataponiyamairbālapṛthagjanā bhogasukhābhilāṣiṇo bhavotpattiṃ prārthayante, na ca parāmṛśanti /
XXbsu021_u:1491: na tu mahāmate srotaāpannasya trisaṃyojanaprahīṇasya rāgadveṣamohāḥ pravartante //
XXbsu021_u:1493: tatkatamastasyātra rāgaḥ prahīṇo bhavati? bhagavānāha - viṣayakāmendriyaḥ strīsaṃyogarāgaḥ pratyutpannasukhaḥ āyatyāṃ duḥkhajanmahetukaḥ khaṭacapeṭaliṅgitacumbitapariṣvaktāghrātakaṭākṣekṣitaiḥ tasya mahāmate rāgo na pravartate /
XXbsu021_u:1495: ata eṣa prahīṇo bhavati, na nirvāṇādhigamarāgaḥ //
XXbsu021_u:1496: sakṛdāgāmiphalalakṣaṇaṃ punarmahāmate katamat? yaduta sakṛdrūpalakṣaṇābhāsavikalpaḥ pravartate
XXbsu021_u:1499: tatra anāgāmīti mahāmate kathaṃ bhavati? yaduta atītānāgatapratyutpannasya rūpalakṣaṇabhāvābhāvapravṛtterdṛṣṭidoṣānuśayavikalpasya anāgāmitvādanāgāmirūpaprahīṇatvācca saṃyojanānāmanāgāmītyucyate /
XXbsu021_u:1502: tatkatamasyāyaṃ bhagavannarhacchabdo nipātyate? kiṃ bhagavan śamaikāyanamārgapratilambhikasya,
XXbsu021_u:1504: bhagavānāha - śamaikāyanamārgapratilambhikasya mahāmate śrāvakasya, na tvanyeṣām /
XXbsu021_u:1505: anye punarmahāmate bodhisattvacaryācaritāvino buddhanirmitanairmāṇikāśca upāyakuśalamūlapraṇidhānapūrvakatvātparṣanmaṇḍaleṣūpapattiṃ darśayanti buddhaparṣanmaṇḍalopaśobhanārtham /
XXbsu021_u:1509: imāni saṃyojanāni, ahamebhirna saṃyukta iti, taddvitvaprasaṅga ātmadṛṣṭipatitaḥ syādaprahīṇasaṃyojanaśca
XXbsu021_u:1511: saṃjñāveditanirodhasamāpattiśca mahāmate svacittadṛśyagativyatikramastasya na yujyate cittamātratvāt
XXbsu021_u:1517: dhyātā dhyānaṃ ca dhyeyaṃ ca prahāṇaṃ satyadarśanam /
XXbsu021_u:1518: kalpanāmātramevedaṃ yo budhyati sa mucyate // Lank_2.176 //
XXbsu021_u:1519: punaraparaṃ mahāmate dviprakārā buddhiḥ pravicayabuddhiśca vikalpalakṣaṇagrāhābhiniveśapratiṣṭhāpikā ca /
XXbsu021_u:1520: tatra mahāmate pravicayabuddhirnāma yaduta yayā buddhyā bhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇaṃ pravicīyamānaṃ catuṣkoṭikārahitaṃ nopalabhyate, sā pravicayabuddhiḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1521: tatra mahāmate catuṣkoṭikā yaduta ekatvānyatvobhayanobhayāstināstinityānityarahitāṃ catuṣkoṭikāmiti vadāmi /
XXbsu021_u:1522: etayā catuṣkoṭikayā mahāmate rahitāḥ sarvadharmā ityucyate /
XXbsu021_u:1524: tatra mahāmate vikalpalakṣaṇagrāhābhiniveśapratiṣṭhāpikā buddhiḥ katamā? yaduta yena mahāmate cittavikalpalakṣaṇagrāhābhiniveśena uṣṇadravacalakaṭhinānabhūtaparikalpalakṣaṇān mahābhūtān pratijñāhetulakṣaṇadṛṣṭāntābhiniveśādasadbhūtasamāropeṇa samāropayati, sā vikalpalakṣaṇagrāhābhiniveśapratiṣṭhāpikā buddhiḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1525: etanmahāmate buddhidvayasya lakṣaṇaṃ yena buddhidvayalakṣaṇena samanvāgatā bodhisattvā dharmapudgalanairātmyalakṣaṇagatiṃgatā nirābhāsabuddhipravicayacaryābhūmikuśalāḥ prathamāṃ bhūmiṃ pratilabhante,
XXbsu021_u:1527: buddhabodhisattvaśataṃ ca samādhiviśeṣapratilambhena paśyanti, kalpaśataṃ ca pūrvāntāparāntato
XXbsu021_u:1529: kṣetraśataṃ cāvabhāsya uttarottarabhūmilakṣaṇavidhijñāḥ praṇidhānavaiśeṣikatayā vikrīḍanto dharmameghābhiṣekābhiṣiktāstathāgatapratyātmabhūmimadhigamya daśaniṣṭhāpadasunibaddhadharmāṇaḥ sattvaparipākāya vicitrairnirmāṇakiraṇairvirājante pratyātmagatisukhasamāhitāḥ //
XXbsu021_u:1530: punaraparaṃ mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahābhūtabhautikakuśalena bhavitavyam /
XXbsu021_u:1531: kathaṃ ca mahāmate bodhisattvo mahābhūtabhautikakuśalo bhavati? tatra mahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattva itaḥ pratisaṃśikṣate
XXbsu021_u:1532: tatsatyaṃ yatra mahābhūtānāmasaṃbhavo 'saṃbhūtāni cemāni mahāmate bhūtānīti prativipaśyati
XXbsu021_u:1533: evaṃ prativipaśyan nāma vikalpamātraṃ svacittadṛśyamātrāvabodhādbāhyabhāvābhāvānnāma cittadṛśyavikalpamātramidaṃ yaduta traidhātukaṃ mahābhūtabhautikarahitaṃ prativipaśyati cātuṣkoṭikanayaviśuddhimātmātmīyarahitaṃ yathābhūtasvalakṣaṇāvasthānāvasthitamanutpādasvalakṣaṇasiddham /
XXbsu021_u:1535: 51) tatra mahāmate mahābhūteṣu kathaṃ bhautikaṃ bhavati? yaduta snehavikalpamahābhūtaṃ mahāmate abdhātuṃ niṣpādayatyadhyātmabāhyam /
XXbsu021_u:1547: tasmādetanmahāmate mahābhūtabhautikalakṣaṇaṃ tīrthakarairvikalpyate na tu mayā //
XXbsu021_u:1551: tatra mahāmate catvāraḥ skandhā arūpiṇo vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāṃ vijñānaṃ ca /
XXbsu021_u:1552: rūpaṃ mahāmate cāturmahābhautikam, bhūtāni ca parasparavilakṣaṇāni /
XXbsu021_u:1553: na ca mahāmate arūpiṇāṃ catuṣkasaṃkhyā bhavatyākāśavat /
XXbsu021_u:1555: saṃkhyālakṣaṇātītam, atha ca vikalpyate evamākāśamiti, evameva mahāmate skandhāḥ saṃkhyālakṣaṇagaṇanātītā
XXbsu021_u:1560: / sa ca vikalpastvayā vyāvartanīyaḥ, vyāvṛtya viviktadharmopadeśaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1566: yathā mahāmate mahāpṛthivī sarvasattvopajīvyā bhavati, evameva mahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvopajīvyo bhavati //
XXbsu021_u:1570: etanmahāmate caturvidhaṃ tīrthakarāṇāṃ nirvāṇaṃ na tu matpravacane /
XXbsu021_u:1572: mahāmatirāha - nanu bhagavatā aṣṭau vijñānāni vyavasthāpitāni? bhagavānāha
XXbsu021_u:1574: mahāmatirāha - tadyadi bhagavan vyavasthāpitāni, tatkathaṃ manovijñānasyaiva (Vaidya 52) vyāvṛttirbhavati na tu saptānāṃ vijñānānām? bhagavānāha - taddhetvālambanatvānmahāmate saptānāṃ vijñānānāṃ pravṛttirbhavati /
XXbsu021_u:1575: manovijñānaṃ punarmahāmate viṣayaparicchedābhiniveśena pravartamānaṃ vāsanābhirālayavijñānaṃ prapuṣṇāti /
XXbsu021_u:1578: udadhitaraṃgā iva mahāmate svacittadṛśyaviṣayapavaneritāḥ pravartante nivartante ca /
XXbsu021_u:1579: atastena mahāmate manovijñānena vyāvṛttena saptānāṃ vijñānānāṃ vyāvṛttirbhavati //
XXbsu021_u:1581: nāhaṃ nirvāmi bhāvena kriyayā lakṣaṇena ca /
XXbsu021_u:1584: hetuṃ dadāti cittasya vijñānaṃ ca samāśritam // Lank_2.178 //
XXbsu021_u:1586: tathā vijñānavaicitryaṃ niruddhaṃ na pravartate // Lank_2.179 //
XXbsu021_u:1587: punaraparaṃ mahāmate parikalpitasvabhāvaprabhedanayalakṣaṇamupadekṣyāmo yena parikalpitasvabhāvaprabhedanayalakṣaṇena suprativibhāgaviddhena tvaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vikalpakalparahitāḥ pratyātmāryasvagatitīrthyanayagatisudṛṣṭabuddhayo grāhyagrāhakavikalpaprahīṇāḥ paratantravividhavicitralakṣaṇaṃ parikalpitasvabhāvākāraṃ na prativikalpayiṣyanti /
XXbsu021_u:1588: tatra mahāmate katamatparikalpitasvabhāvaprabhedanayalakṣaṇam? yaduta abhilāpavikalpo 'vidheyavikalpo lakṣaṇavikalpo 'rthavikalpaḥ svabhāvavikalpo hetuvikalpo dṛṣṭivikalpo yuktivikalpa utpādavikalpo 'nutpādavikalpaḥ saṃbandhavikalpo bandhābandhavikalpaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1590: tatra mahāmate abhilāpavikalpaḥ katamaḥ? yaduta vicitrasvaragītamādhuryābhiniveśaḥ /
