XXbsu021_u:1592: tatra mahāmate abhidheyavikalpaḥ katamaḥ? yaduta asti tatkiṃcidabhidheyavastu
XXbsu021_u:1594: tatra lakṣaṇavikalpaḥ katamaḥ? yaduta tasminnevābhidheye mṛgatṛṣṇākhye lakṣaṇavaicitryābhiniveśenābhiniveśate
XXbsu021_u:1597: tatra svabhāvavikalpaḥ katamaḥ? yaduta bhāvasvabhāvāvadhāraṇamidamevamidaṃ nānyatheti tīrthyavikalpadṛṣṭyā vikalpayanti /
XXbsu021_u:1599: yaduta yadyena hetupratyayena sadasatorvibhajyate hetulakṣaṇotpattitaḥ sa hetuvikalpaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1602: tatra utpādavikalpaḥ katamaḥ? yaduta pratyayaiḥ sadasatorbhāvasyotpādābhiniveśaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:1603: tatra anutpādavikalpaḥ katamaḥ? yaduta anutpannapūrvāḥ sarvabhāvā abhūtvā pratyayairbhavantyahetuśarīrāḥ
XXbsu021_u:1604: tatra saṃbandhavikalpaḥ katamaḥ? yaduta saha saṃbadhyate suvarṇatantuvat /
XXbsu021_u:1607: yathā puruṣaḥ pāśasaṃyogādrajjugranthiḥ kriyate mucyate ca /
XXbsu021_u:1608: evaṃ mahāmate parikalpitasvabhāvaprabhedanayalakṣaṇam, yasmin parikalpitasvabhāvaprabhedanayalakṣaṇe sarvabālapṛthagjanā abhiniviśante /
XXbsu021_u:1612: yadyanyā syāt, vaicitryaṃ māyāhetukaṃ na syāt /
XXbsu021_u:1616: ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate tvayā anyaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvairmāyā nāstyastitvena nābhiniveṣṭavyā
XXbsu021_u:1619: nirābhāse viśeṣe ca prajñā vai saṃpravartate // Lank_2.180 //
XXbsu021_u:1621: kalpitaṃ gṛhyate bhrāntyā paratantraṃ na kalpyate // Lank_2.181 //
XXbsu021_u:1623: nimittaṃ hi tathā citraṃ kalpyamānaṃ na sidhyati // Lank_2.182 //
XXbsu021_u:1627: kalpitaṃ hi vicitrābhaṃ paratantre vikalpyate // Lank_2.184 //
XXbsu021_u:1630: yathā hi yogināṃ vastu citramekaṃ virājate /
XXbsu021_u:1631: na hyasti citratā tatra tathā kalpitalakṣaṇam // Lank_2.186 //
XXbsu021_u:1633: timiraṃ na rūpaṃ nārūpaṃ paratantraṃ tathābudhaiḥ // Lank_2.187 //
XXbsu021_u:1634: haimaṃ syāttu yathā śuddhaṃ jalaṃ kaluṣavarjitam /
XXbsu021_u:1635: gaganaṃ hi ghanābhāvāttathā śuddhaṃ vikalpitam // Lank_2.188 //
XXbsu021_u:1637: nāsti vai kalpito bhāvaḥ paratantraśca vidyate /
XXbsu021_u:1640: vinā bhāvena vai bhāvo bhāvaścābhāvasaṃbhavaḥ // Lank_2.190 //
XXbsu021_u:1644: tadā prajñāyate śuddhaṃ svabhāvaṃ pāramārthikam // Lank_2.192 //
XXbsu021_u:1647: pañca dharmā bhavettattvaṃ svabhāvā hi trayastathā /
XXbsu021_u:1651: buddhyā vivecyamānaṃ tu na tantraṃ nāpi kalpitam /
XXbsu021_u:1652: niṣpanno nāsti vai bhāvaḥ kathaṃ buddhyā vikalpyate // Lank_2.196 //
XXbsu021_u:1654: bhāvābhāvavinirmukto dvau svabhāvau kathaṃ nu tau // Lank_2.197 //
XXbsu021_u:1656: kalpitaṃ dṛśyate citraṃ viśuddhaṃ cāryagocaram // Lank_2.198 //
XXbsu021_u:1658: anyathā kalpyamānaṃ hi tīrthyavādaṃ samāśrayet // Lank_2.199 //

XXbsu021_u:2186: deśemi yā bālānāṃ siddhāntaṃ yogināmaham // Lank_3.61 //
XXbsu021_u:2187: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat
XXbsu021_u:2188: - uktametadbhagavaṃstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena ekasmin kāle ekasmin samaye yathā lokāyatiko vicitramantrapratibhāno na sevitavyo na
XXbsu021_u:2189: bhaktavyo na paryupāsitavyaḥ, yaṃ ca sevamānasya lokāmiṣasaṃgraho bhavati na dharmasaṃgraha iti /
XXbsu021_u:2191: vicitramantrapratibhānaḥ, yaṃ ca sevamānasya lokāmiṣasaṃgraho bhavati na
XXbsu021_u:2195: etena mahāmate kāraṇena lokāyatiko vicitramantrapratibhāna ityucyate /
XXbsu021_u:2204: tacchiṣyeṇa nāgaveśarūpadhāriṇā svarge indasabhāyāṃ pratijñāṃ kṛtvā tava vā sahasrāro ratho bhajyatāṃ mama vā ekaikanāgabhāvasya phaṇācchedo bhavatviti /
XXbsu021_u:2205: sahadharmeṇa ca nāgaveśadhāriṇā lokāyatikaśiṣyeṇa devānāmindraṃ vijitya sahasrāraṃ rathaṃ bhaṅktvā punarapīmaṃ lokamāgataḥ /
XXbsu021_u:2206: evamidaṃ mahāmate lokāyatikavicitrahetudṛṣṭāntopanibaddhaṃ yena tiryañco 'pyadhītya devāsuralokaṃ vicitrapadavyañjanairvyāmohayati /
XXbsu021_u:2209: duḥkhajanmahetuvāhakatvāt, na sevitavyo na bhajitavyo na paryupāsitavyaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:2210: śarīrabuddhiviṣayopalabdhimātraṃ hi mahāmate lokāyatikairdeśyate vicitraiḥ padavyañjanaiḥ
XXbsu021_u:2212: kiṃ tu paścime loke paścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāṃ bhinnasaṃhitaṃ bhaviṣyati kutarkahetudṛṣṭipraṇītatvāt
XXbsu021_u:2214: evadeva mahāmate lokāyataṃ bhinnasaṃhitaṃ vicitrahetūpanibaddhaṃ tīrthakarairdeśyate svakāraṇābhiniveśābhiniviṣṭaiḥ, na svanayaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:2217: na svanayaṃ ca na prajānanti mohohāllokāyatamidamiti //
XXbsu021_u:2218: mahāmatirāha - yadi bhagavan sarvatīrthakarā lokāyatameva vicitraiḥ padavyañjanairdṛṣṭāntopasaṃhārairdeśayanti, na svanayaṃ svakāraṇābhiniveśābhiniviṣṭāḥ, atha kiṃ bhagavānapi lokāyatameva deśayati āgatāgatānāṃ nānādeśasaṃnipatitānāṃ devāsuramanuṣyāṇāṃ vicitraiḥ
XXbsu021_u:2220: bhagavānāha - nāhaṃ mahāmate lokāyataṃ deśayāmi na cāyavyayam /
XXbsu021_u:2222: tatra āyo nāma mahāmate utpādarāśiḥ samūhāgamādutpadyate /
XXbsu021_u:2230: atha yenāhaṃ tena lokāyatiko brāhmaṇa upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:2231: upasaṃkramya akṛtāvakāśa eva māmevamāha - sarvaṃ bho gautama kṛtakam /
XXbsu021_u:2233: sarvaṃ bho brāhmaṇa yadi kṛtakam, idaṃ prathamaṃ lokāyatam /
XXbsu021_u:2235: yadi brāhmaṇa sarvamakṛtakam , idaṃ dvitīyaṃ lokāyatam
XXbsu021_u:2236: / evaṃ sarvamanityaṃ sarvaṃ nityaṃ sarvamutpādyaṃ sarvamanutpādyam /
XXbsu021_u:2238: punarapi mahāmate māmevamāha brāhmaṇo lokāyatikaḥ - sarvaṃ bho gautama ekatvaṃ sarvamanyatvaṃ sarvamubhayatvaṃ sarvamanubhayatvaṃ sarvaṃ kāraṇādhīnaṃ vicitrahetūipapattidarśanāt /
XXbsu021_u:2240: punarapi bho gautama sarvamavyākṛtaṃ sarvaṃ vyākṛtam, astyātmā nāstyātmā,
XXbsu021_u:2241: astyayaṃ loko nāstyayaṃ lokaḥ,asti paro loko nāsti paro lokaḥ, nāstyasti ca paro lokaḥ, asti mokṣo nāsti mokṣaḥ, sarvaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ sarvamakṣaṇikam,
XXbsu021_u:2244: tasyaitaduktaṃ mahāmate mahā - yadi bho brāhmaṇa evam, idamapi brāhmaṇa lokāyatameva bhavatīti, na madīyam /
XXbsu021_u:2249: ahaṃ bhe brāhmaṇa na hetuvādī nāhetuvādī anyatra vikalpameva grāhyagrāhakabhāvena prajñāpya pratītyasamutpādaṃ deśayāmi /
XXbsu021_u:2250: na ca tvādṛśā anye vā budhyante ātmagrāhapatitayā saṃtatyā /
XXbsu021_u:2251: nirvāṇākāśanirodhānāṃ mahāmate tattvameva nopalabhyate saṃkhyāyām, kutaḥ punaḥ kṛtakatvam
XXbsu021_u:2258: punaraparaṃ mahāmate lokāyatiko brāhmaṇo māmetadavocat - asti bho gautama
XXbsu021_u:2259: kiṃcidyanna lokāyatam? madīyameva bho gautama sarvatīrthakaraiḥ prasiddhaṃ vicitraiḥ padavyañjanairhetudṛṣṭāntopasaṃhārairdeśyate
XXbsu021_u:2260: asti bho brāhmaṇa yanna tvadīyaṃ na ca na prasiddhaṃ deśyate na ca na vicitraiḥ padavyañjanairna ca nārthopasaṃhitameva /
XXbsu021_u:2261: kiṃ tadalokāyataṃ yanna prasiddhaṃ deśyate ca? asti ca bho brāhmaṇa alokāyataṃ yatra
XXbsu021_u:2263: yaduta vikalpasyāpravṛttiḥ sadasataḥ svacittadṛśyamātrāvabodhādvikalpo na pravartate /
XXbsu021_u:2271: saṃkṣepato brāhmaṇa yatra vijñānasyāgatirgatiścyutirupapattiḥ prārthanābhiniveśābhiṣvaṅgo darśanaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ sthānaṃ parāmṛṣṭirvicitralakṣaṇābhiniveśaḥ saṃgatiḥ sattvānāṃ tṛṣṇāyāḥ kāraṇābhiniveśaśca /
XXbsu021_u:2272: etadbho brāhmaṇa tvadīyaṃ lokāyataṃ na madīyam /
XXbsu021_u:2276: atha khalu kṛṣṇapakṣiko nāgarājo brāhmaṇarūpeṇāgatya bhagavantametadavocat
XXbsu021_u:2277: - tena hi gautama paraloka eva na saṃvidyate /
XXbsu021_u:2281: atha māṇavo niṣpratibhāno nigṛhīto 'ntarhito 'pṛṣṭvaiva māṃ svanayapratyavasthānakathāṃ cintayan śākyaputro mannayabahirdhā varāko
XXbsu021_u:2283: tvaṃ caitarhi mahāmate māṃ pṛcchasi - kiṃ kāraṇaṃ lokāyatikavicitramantrapratibhānaṃ sevyamānasyāmiṣasaṃgraho bhavati na dharmasaṃgraha iti /
XXbsu021_u:2286: padārthadvayaṃ prati mīmāṃsā pravṛttā anāgatāṃ janatāṃ samālokya /
XXbsu021_u:2287: tena hi mahāmate śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru /
XXbsu021_u:2289: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt //
XXbsu021_u:2290: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - tatra āmiṣaṃ mahāmate katamat? yaduta āmiṣamāmṛśamākarṣaṇaṃ nirmṛṣaṃ parāmṛṣṭiḥ svādo bāhyaviṣayābhiniveśo
XXbsu021_u:2292: kudṛṣṭyā punaḥ skandhaprādurbhāvo jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsapravṛttistṛṣṇāyāḥ paunarbhavikyā ādiṃ kṛtvā /
XXbsu021_u:2294: eṣa mahāmate āmiṣasaṃgraho na dharmasaṃgraho yaṃ lokāyatikaṃ sevamāno labhate lokāyatam //
XXbsu021_u:2295: tatra mahāmate dharmasaṃgrahaḥ katamaḥ? yaduta svacittadharmanairātmyadvayāva -
XXbsu021_u:2300: prāyeṇa hi mahāmate tīrthakaravādo bālānantadvaye pātayati na tu viduṣām, yaduta ucchede ca
XXbsu021_u:2305: eṣa mahāmate dharmāmiṣanirṇayaḥ, yatra tvayā anyaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ śikṣitavyam
XXbsu021_u:2313: cittamātraṃ na dṛśyo 'sti dvidhā cittaṃ hi dṛśyate /
XXbsu021_u:2322: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat
XXbsu021_u:2324: kasyaitadadhivacanaṃ yaduta nirvāṇamiti yatsarvatīrthakarairvikalpyate? bhagavānāha - tena hi mahāmate
XXbsu021_u:2325: śṛṇu, sādhu va suṣṭhu ca manasikuru /
XXbsu021_u:2327: yathā tīrthakarā nirvāṇaṃ vikalpayanti, na ca bhavati teṣāṃ vikalpānurupaṃ nirvāṇam /
XXbsu021_u:2328: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
XXbsu021_u:2334: anye punardeśāntarasthānagamanaṃ mokṣa iti varṇayanti viṣayavikalpoparamādiṣu pavanavat /
XXbsu021_u:2337: anye punarvarṇayanti vividhanimittavikalpo duḥkhajanmavāhaka iti svacittadṛśyamātrākuśalāḥ
XXbsu021_u:2343: anye punarmahāmate tīrthakarā durvidagdhabuddhayaḥ prakṛtipuruṣāntaradarśanādguṇapariṇāmakartṛtvācca nirvāṇaṃ kalpayanti /
XXbsu021_u:2347: anye anyonyapravṛtto 'yaṃ saṃbhavo jagata iti na kāraṇataḥ /
XXbsu021_u:2348: sa ca kāraṇābhiniveśa eva, na cāvabudhyante mohāt, tadanavabodhānnirvāṇaṃ kalpayanti /
XXbsu021_u:2351: anye svabhāvataḥ pravṛttito mayūravaicitryavividharatnākarakaṇṭakataikṣṇyavadbhāvānāṃ svabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā nirvāṇaṃ vikalpayanti /
XXbsu021_u:2357: / anye punarmahāmate varṇayanti sarvajñasiṃhanādanādino yathā svacittadṛśyamātrāvabodhādbāhyabhāvābhāvānabhiniveśāccātuṣkoṭikarahitād yathābhūtāvasthānadarśanātsvacittadṛśyavikalpasyāntadvayāpatanatayā grāhyagrāhakānupalabdheḥ sarvapramāṇāgrahaṇāpravṛttidarśanāttattvasya vyāmohakatvādagrahaṇaṃ tattvasya,
XXbsu021_u:2359: evamanyānyapi yāni tārkikaiḥ kutīrthyapraṇītāni tānyayuktiyuktāni vidvadbhiḥ parivarjitāni
XXbsu021_u:2360: sarve 'pyete mahāmate antadvayapatitayā saṃtatyā nirvāṇaṃ kalpayanti /
XXbsu021_u:2362: na cātra kaścitpravartate vā nivartate vā /
XXbsu021_u:2363: ekaikasya mahāmate tīrthakarasya nirvāṇaṃ tatsvaśāstramatibuddhyā parīkṣyamāṇaṃ vyabhicarati
XXbsu021_u:2366: atra tvayā mahāmate śikṣitvā anyaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ sarvatīrthakaranirvāṇadṛṣṭirvyāvartanīyā
XXbsu021_u:2371: tīrthyā mokṣaṃ vikalpenti na ca mokṣo hi vidyate // Lank_3.70 //
XXbsu021_u:2376: jalpaprapañcābhiratā hi bālāstattve na kurvanti matiṃ viśālām /
XXbsu021_u:2377: jalpo hi traidhātukaduḥkhayonistattvaṃ hi duḥkhasya vināśahetuḥ //
XXbsu021_u:2378: yathā hi darpaṇe rūpaṃ dṛśyate na ca vidyate /
XXbsu021_u:2379: vāsanādarpaṇe cittaṃ dvidhā dṛśyati bāliśaiḥ // Lank_3.74 //
XXbsu021_u:2384: dṛśyākāraṃ na dṛśyo 'sti yathā bālairvikalpyate // Lank_3.76 //
XXbsu021_u:2386: vikalpaṃ dṛśyate citraṃ na ca bālairvibhāvyate // Lank_3.77 //
XXbsu021_u:2391: yena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstathāgatasvakuśalāḥ svamātmānaṃ parāṃścāvabodhayeyuḥ
XXbsu021_u:2392: bhagavānāha - tena hi mahāmate tvameva paripṛccha /
XXbsu021_u:2394: mahāmatirāha - kiṃ punarbhagavan tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'kṛtakaḥ kṛtakaḥ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇamabhidhānamabhidheyaṃ buddhirboddhavyaḥ, evamādyaiḥ padaniruktaiḥ kiṃ bhagavānanyo 'nanyaḥ?
XXbsu021_u:2395: bhagavānāha - na mahāmate tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha evamādyaiḥ padaniruktairakṛtako na kṛtakaṃ na kāryaṃ na kāraṇam /
XXbsu021_u:2398: yadi hi mahāmate tathāgataḥ kṛtakaḥ syāt,
XXbsu021_u:2401: aniṣṭaṃ caitanmama ca anyeṣāṃ ca tathāgatānām /
XXbsu021_u:2405: yacca mahāmate na kāryaṃ na kāraṇaṃ tanna sannāsat /
XXbsu021_u:2409: vandhyāputro hi mahāmate vāgmātraṃ na cātuṣkoṭikapatitaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:2412: yadapyuktaṃ mayā nirātmānaḥ sarvadharmā iti, tasyāpyarthaṃ niboddhavyaṃ mahāmate /
XXbsu021_u:2414: svātmanā sarvadharmā vidyante na parātmanā gośvavat /
XXbsu021_u:2415: tadyathā mahāmate na gobhāvo 'śvātmako na cāśvabhāvo gavātmakaḥ, na sannāsat, na ca tau svalakṣaṇato na, vidyete eva tau
XXbsu021_u:2416: svalakṣaṇataḥ, evameva mahāmate sarvadharmā na ca svalakṣaṇena na saṃvidyante /
XXbsu021_u:2418: tena ca bālapṛthagjanairnirātmārthatā avabudhyate vikalpamupādāya, na tvavikalpam /
XXbsu021_u:2421: yadyananyaḥ skandhebhyaḥ syāt, anityaḥ syāt kṛtatvātskandhānām /
XXbsu021_u:2422: athānyaḥ syāt, dvaye satyanyathā bhavati goviṣāṇavat
XXbsu021_u:2424: / dakṣiṇaṃ hi mahāmate goviṣāṇaṃ vāmasyānyadbhavati, vāmamapi dakṣiṇasya /
XXbsu021_u:2439: yaddhi mahāmate na nityaṃ nānityaṃ na kāryaṃ na kāraṇaṃ na saṃskṛtaṃ nāsaṃskṛtaṃ na buddhirna boddhavyaṃ na lakṣyaṃ na lakṣaṇaṃ na skandhā na skandhebhyo 'nyat nābhidheyaṃ nābhidhānaṃ naikatvānyatvobhayatvānubhayatvasaṃbaddham,
XXbsu021_u:2445: ākāśaṃ ca mahāmate na kāryaṃ na kāraṇam /
XXbsu021_u:2446: yacca na kāryaṃ na kāraṇaṃ tannirālambyam /
XXbsu021_u:2454: skandhān pratītya saṃbuddho na dṛṣṭaḥ kenacitkvacit /
XXbsu021_u:2455: yo na dṛṣṭaḥ kvacitkenacitkathaṃ tasya vibhāvanā // Lank_3.80 //
XXbsu021_u:2456: na kṛtako nākṛtako na kāryaṃ nāpi kāraṇam /
XXbsu021_u:2457: na ca skandhā na cāskandhā na cāpyanyatra saṃkarāt // Lank_3.81 //
XXbsu021_u:2458: na hi yo yena bhāvena kalpyamāno na dṛśyate /
XXbsu021_u:2459: na taṃ nāstyeva gantavyaṃ dharmāṇāmeva dharmatā // Lank_3.82 //
XXbsu021_u:2461: ato nāsti na gantavyamastitvaṃ na ca kalpayet // Lank_3.83 //
XXbsu021_u:2465: tadā samyakprapaśyanti na te dūṣenti nāyakān // Lank_3.85 //
XXbsu021_u:2466: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat
XXbsu021_u:2467: - deśayatu me bhagavān, deśayatu sugataḥ, yaddeśanāpāṭhe bhagavatā anirodhānutpādagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
XXbsu021_u:2472: yadyanutpannāḥ sarvadharmā iti bhagavan dharmagrahaṇaṃ na prāpnoti, ajātatvātsarvadharmāṇām
XXbsu021_u:2476: tena hi mahāmate śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru /
XXbsu021_u:2478: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
XXbsu021_u:2479: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - na hi mahāmate abhāvastathāgato na ca sarvadharmāṇāmanirodhānutpādagrahaṇam
XXbsu021_u:2480: na pratyayo 'pekṣitavyo na ca nirarthakamanutpādagrahaṇaṃ kriyate mayā /
XXbsu021_u:2481: kiṃ tu mahāmate manomayadharmakāyasya tathāgatasyaitadadhivacanaṃ yatra sarvatīrthakaraśrāvakapratyekabuddhasaptabhūmipratiṣṭhitānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāmaviṣayaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:2484: tadyathā mahāmate indraḥ śakraḥ puraṃdaraḥ, hasyaḥ karaḥ pāṇiḥ, tanurdehaṃ śarīram, pṛthivī bhūmirvasuṃdharā, khamākāśaṃ gaganam /
XXbsu021_u:2485: ityevamādyānāṃ bhāvānāmekaikasya bhāvasya bahavaḥ paryāyavācakāḥ śabdā bhavanti vikalpitāḥ
XXbsu021_u:2488: evaṃ mahāmate ahamapi sahāyāṃ lokadhātau tribhirnāmāsaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrairbālānāṃ śravaṇāvabhāsamāgacchāmi
XXbsu021_u:2489: taiścābhilapanti mām, na ca prajānanti tathāgatasyaite nāmaparyāyā iti /
XXbsu021_u:2492: / nāyakaṃ vināyakaṃ pariṇāyakaṃ buddhamṛṣiṃ vṛṣabhaṃ brahmāṇaṃ
XXbsu021_u:2493: viṣṇumīśvaraṃ pradhānaṃ kapilaṃ bhūtāntamariṣṭaneminaṃ somaṃ bhāskaraṃ rāmaṃ vyāsaṃ śukamindraṃ baliṃ varuṇamiti caike saṃjānanti /
XXbsu021_u:2494: apare anirodhānutpādaṃ śūnyatāṃ tathatāṃ satyatāṃ bhūtatāṃ bhūtakoṭiṃ dharmadhātuṃ nirvāṇaṃ nityaṃ samatāmadvayamanirodhamanimittaṃ pratyayaṃ buddhahetūpadeśaṃ vimokṣaṃ mārgasatyāni sarvajñaṃ jinaṃ manomayamiti caike saṃjānanti /
XXbsu021_u:2495: evamādibhirmahāmate paripūrṇaṃ tribhirnāmāsaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrairanūnairanadhikairihānyeṣu ca lokadhātuṣu māṃ janāḥ saṃjānante udakacandra ivāpraviṣṭanirgatam /
XXbsu021_u:2496: na ca bālā avabudhyante dvayāntapatitayā saṃtatyā /
XXbsu021_u:2497: atha ca satkurvanti gurukurvanti mānayanti pūjayanti ca māṃ padārthaniruktyakuśalā abhinnasaṃjñāḥ, na svanayaṃ prajānantiṃ deśanārutapāṭhābhiniviṣṭāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:2501: evaṃ ca mahāmate vakṣyanti te mohapuruṣāḥ - yathāruta evārthaḥ, ananyo 'rtho rutāditi /
XXbsu021_u:2505: na tvevaṃ jñāsyanti mahāmate yathā rutamutpannapradhvaṃsi, artho 'nutpannapradhvaṃsī /
XXbsu021_u:2508: na ca mahāmate tathāgatā akṣarapatitaṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti /
XXbsu021_u:2510: anyatra akṣarapatitāśayaḥ punarmahāmate yo 'kṣarapatitaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
XXbsu021_u:2512: ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate uktaṃ deśanāpāṭhe mayā anyaiśca buddhabodhisattvaiḥ yathaikamapyakṣaraṃ tathāgatā nodāharanti na pratyāharantīti /
XXbsu021_u:2519: tadabhāvātkiṃ kasya deśyeta? ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena deśanāpāṭharutānabhiniviṣṭena bhavitavyam /
XXbsu021_u:2521: sattvāśayapravṛttatvānnānādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmadeśanā kriyate cittamanomanovijñānavyāvṛttyarthaṃ mayā anyaiśca tathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ, na svapratyātmāryajñānādhigamapratyavasthānāt sarvadharmanirābhāasasvacittadṛśyamātrāvabodhāddvidhāvikalpasya vyāvṛttitaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:2522: arthapratiśaraṇena mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhavitavyaṃ na vyañjanapratiśaraṇena
XXbsu021_u:2523: vyañjanānusārī mahāmate kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā svātmānaṃ ca nāśayati, parārthāṃśca nāvabodhayati
XXbsu021_u:2524: kudṛṣṭipatitayā saṃtatyā svapakṣaṃ vibhrāmyate kutīrthakaiḥ sarvadharmabhūmisvalakṣaṇākuśalaiḥ padaniruktyanabhijñaiḥ //
XXbsu021_u:2528: mahāyāne ca mahāmate samyakparigṛhyamāṇe buddhaśrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ parigrahaḥ kṛto bhavati /
XXbsu021_u:2533: atasteṣu viśiṣṭāyatanapratilambheṣu bodhisattvā mahāsattvā upapattiṃ parigṛhya mahāyāne pratiṣṭhāpanatayā daśavaśitāvicitrarūpaveśadhāriṇo bhūtvā sattvaviśeṣānuśayalakṣaṇagatibhūtāstathātvāya dharmaṃ deśayanti //
XXbsu021_u:2536: tena na mahāmate kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā yathārutārthābhiniveśakuśalena bhavitavyam
XXbsu021_u:2541: evameva mahāmate bālajātīyā iva bālapṛthagjanavargā yathārutāṅgulyagrābhiniveśābhiniviṣṭā eva kālaṃ kariṣyanti, na yathārutāṅgulyagrārthaṃ hitvā paramārthamāgamiṣyanti /
XXbsu021_u:2542: tadyathā mahāmate annaṃ bhojyaṃ bālānāṃ ca kaścidanabhisaṃskṛtaṃ paribhoktum /
XXbsu021_u:2543: atha kaścidanabhisaṃskṛtaṃ paribhuñjīta, sa unmatta iti vikalpyeta
XXbsu021_u:2547: ata etena kāraṇena mahāmate arthābhiyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:2552: bāhuśrutyaṃ ca nāma mahāmate yaduta arthakauśalyaṃ na rutakauśalyam /
XXbsu021_u:2554: yathā svayaṃ ca na patati parāṃśca na pātayati /
XXbsu021_u:2558: punaraparaṃ mahāmatirbuddhādhiṣṭhānādhiṣṭhita evamāha - na bhagavatā anirodhānutpādadarśanena kiṃcidviśiṣyate /
XXbsu021_u:2562: tīrthakarā api bhagavan kāraṇapratyayahetukīṃ jagata utpattiṃ varṇayanti /
XXbsu021_u:2572: yāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ gatvā bhūto bhūtasvabhāvaṃ na vijahāti /
XXbsu021_u:2576: viśeṣo vātra vaktavyo yena tathāgatavādo viśeṣyate, na sarvatīrthakaravādaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:2577: aviśiṣyamāṇe bhagavan svavāde tīrthakarāṇāmapi buddhaprasaṅgaḥ syādanirodhānutpādahetutvāt
XXbsu021_u:2578: asthānamanavakāśaṃ coktaṃ bhagavatā yadekatra lokadhātau bahavastathāgatā utpadyeranniti /
XXbsu021_u:2582: / tatkasya hetoḥ? tīrthakarāṇāṃ hi mahāmate bhāvasvabhāvo vidyata evānutpannāvikaralakṣaṇaprāptaḥ
XXbsu021_u:2584: mama tu mahāmate sadasatpakṣavigata utpādabhaṅgavirahito na bhāvo
XXbsu021_u:2592: tadyathā mahāmate kaścidgandharvanagare bālajātīyo māyāpuruṣasattvasārthavaicitryaṃ praviaśantaṃ vā nirgacchantaṃ vā kalpayet - amī praviṣṭā amī nirgatāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:2593: na ca tatra kaścitpraviṣṭo vā nirgato vā /
XXbsu021_u:2595: eṣaḥ, teṣāmevameva mahāmate utpādānutpādavibhrama eṣa bālānām /
XXbsu021_u:2597: na ca māyāpuruṣa utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā bhāvābhāvākiṃcitkaratvāt /
XXbsu021_u:2599: anyatra vitathapatitayā saṃjñayā bālā utpādanirodhaṃ kalpayanti na tvāryāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:2600: tatra vitathamiti mahāmate na tathā yathā bhāvasvabhāvaḥ kalpyate /
XXbsu021_u:2604: ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate animittadarśanameva śreyo na nimittadarśanam /
XXbsu021_u:2607: tatra nirvāṇamiti mahāmate yathābhūtārthasthānadarśanaṃ vikalpacittacaittakalāpasya parāvṛttipūrvakam
XXbsu021_u:2611: ahetuvādaṃ deśemi na ca bālairvibhāvyate // Lank_3.86 //
XXbsu021_u:2612: anutpannamidaṃ sarvaṃ na ca bhāvā na santi ca /
XXbsu021_u:2622: anutpāde prasādhyante mama netrī na naśyati /
XXbsu021_u:2623: ahetuvāde deśyante tīrthyānāṃ jāyate bhayam // Lank_3.91 //
XXbsu021_u:2624: kathaṃ kena kutaḥ kutra saṃbhavo 'hetuko bhavet /
XXbsu021_u:2625: nāhetuko na hetubhyo yadā paśyanti saṃskṛtam /
XXbsu021_u:2628: atha bhāvasya nāmedaṃ nirarthaṃ vā bravīhi me // Lank_3.93 //
XXbsu021_u:2629: na cābhāvo hyanutpādo na ca pratyayavīkṣaṇam /
XXbsu021_u:2630: na ca bhāvasya nāmedaṃ na ca nāma nirarthakam // Lank_3.94 //
XXbsu021_u:2644: na jātu śūnyayā śūnyā kiṃ tvanutpādaśūnyayā // Lank_3.100 //
XXbsu021_u:2646: kalāpācca pṛthagbhūtaṃ na jātaṃ na nirudhyate // Lank_3.101 //
XXbsu021_u:2647: bhāvo na vidyate 'nyo 'nyaḥ kalāpācca pṛthak kvacit /
XXbsu021_u:2650: anyatra hi kalāpo 'yaṃ pravartate nivartate // Lank_3.103 //
XXbsu021_u:2654: deśemi saṃkalāmātraṃ na ca bālairvibhāvyate // Lank_3.105 //
XXbsu021_u:2655: yasya janyo bhavedbhāvaḥ saṃkalāyāḥ pṛthak kvacit /
XXbsu021_u:2658: yasya bhāvo bhavetkaścitsaṃkalāyāḥ pṛthak kvacit // Lank_3.107 //
XXbsu021_u:2660: saṃkalāyāḥ pṛthagbhūtā ye dharmāḥ kalpitābudhaiḥ // Lank_3.108 //
XXbsu021_u:2662: yasya jātinamutpādaṃ tadanutpāde kṣāntiḥ syāt // Lank_3.109 //
XXbsu021_u:2668: parato yasya vai bhāvaḥ pratyayairjāyate kvacit /
XXbsu021_u:2669: na saṃkalāmātramevedaṃ na te yuktyāgame sthitāḥ // Lank_3.112 //
XXbsu021_u:2670: yadi janyo na bhāvo 'sti syādbuddhiḥ kasya pratyayāt /
XXbsu021_u:2671: anyonyajanakā hyete tenaite pratyayāḥ smṛtāḥ // Lank_3.113 //
XXbsu021_u:2673: kalāpo 'yaṃ na dharmo 'sti ato vai niḥsvabhāvatā // Lank_3.114 //
XXbsu021_u:2675: na tu śāstrasya bhedo 'sti doṣabhedāttu bhidyate // Lank_3.115 //
XXbsu021_u:2677: indriyāṇāṃ balaṃ jñātvā nayaṃ deśemi prāṇinām // Lank_3.116 //
XXbsu021_u:2680: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat
XXbsu021_u:2682: tvayā ca sarvadeśanāpāṭhe deśyate - anityā bata saṃskārā utpādavyayadharmiṇa iti /
XXbsu021_u:2683: tatkimiyaṃ bhagavaṃstathyā mithyeti? katiprakārā bhagavan anityatā?
XXbsu021_u:2684: bhagavānāha - aṣṭaprakārā hi mahāmate sarvatīrthakarairanityatā kalpyate,
XXbsu021_u:2693: nairantaryaprabandhena svarasabhaṅgabhedaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ kṣīradadhipariṇāmavikārāntaravadadṛṣṭanaṣṭā sarvabhāveṣu pravartate na nityateti /
XXbsu021_u:2698: tatra anutpādānityatā nāma yaduta nityamanityaṃ sadasatorapravṛttiḥ sarvadharmāṇāmadarśanaṃ paramāṇupravicayādadarśanam /
XXbsu021_u:2700: etaddhi mahāmate anutpādānityatāyā lakṣaṇaṃ yasyānavabodhātsarvatīrthakarā utpādānityatāvāde prapatanti //
XXbsu021_u:2701: punaraparaṃ mahāmate yasya bhāvo nityatā, tasya svamativikalpenaiva nityatā nānityatā bhāvaḥ
XXbsu021_u:2714: na ca kāraṇaṃ visadṛśaṃ kāryaṃ janayati /
XXbsu021_u:2715: atha janayet, teṣāmanityatā sarvabhāvānāṃ visadṛśaṃ kāryaṃ
XXbsu021_u:2718: yadi vā anityatā abhāvaḥ syāt, kriyāhetubhāvalakṣaṇapatitaśca syāt,
XXbsu021_u:2721: anityatvādayaḥ sarvabhāvā nityāḥ syurnityā eva bhaveyuḥ //
XXbsu021_u:2722: atha sarvabhāvāntargatā anityatā, tena tryadhvapatitā syāt /
XXbsu021_u:2723: tatra yadatītaṃ rūpaṃ tattena saha vinaṣṭam /
XXbsu021_u:2728: sarvatīrthakarāṇāmavināśātsarvabhūtānāṃ sarvaṃ tribhavaṃ bhūtabhautikaṃ yatrotpādasthitivikāraḥ prajñapyate /
XXbsu021_u:2730: tīrthakaraiḥ? bhūtāni ca na pravartante na nivartante
XXbsu021_u:2732: tatra prārambhavinivṛttirnāma anityatā - na punarbhūtāni bhūtāntaramārabhante parasparavilakṣaṇasvalakṣaṇānna viśeṣaḥ prārabhyate /
XXbsu021_u:2734: tatra saṃsthānavinivṛttirnāma anityatā - yaduta na bhūtabhautikaṃ
XXbsu021_u:2736: pralayo nāma mahāmate ā paramāṇoḥ pravicayaparīkṣā vināśo bhūtabhautikasya saṃsthānasyānyathābhūtadarśanāddīrghahrasvānulabdhiḥ
XXbsu021_u:2738: tatra saṃsthānānityatā nāma - yaduta yasya rūpamevānityaṃ tasya saṃsthānasyānityatā na bhūtānām
XXbsu021_u:2744: tatra vikārānityatā nāma - yaduta rūpasyānyathābhūtadarśanaṃ na bhūtānāṃ suvarṇasaṃsthānabhūṣaṇavikāradarśanavat
XXbsu021_u:2745: na suvarṇaṃ bhāvādvinaśyati kiṃ tu bhūṣaṇasaṃsthānavināśo bhavati //
XXbsu021_u:2749: mama tu mahāmate na nityā nānityā /
XXbsu021_u:2750: tatkasya hetoḥ? yaduta bāhyabhāvānabhyupagamātribhavacittamātropadeśādvicitralakṣaṇānupadeśānna pravartate na nivartate mahābhūtasaṃniveśaviśeṣaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:2755: trividhaṃ ca mahāmate sarvatīrthakaralauikikalokottaratamānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vāgvikalpaviniḥsṛtānām
XXbsu021_u:2759: bhāvamanityatāṃ rūpaṃ tīrthyāḥ kalpenti mohitāḥ // Lank_3.118 //
XXbsu021_u:2760: bhāvānāṃ nāsti vai nāśaṃ bhūtā bhūtātmanā sthitāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:2762: kasyacinna hi tīrthyasya vināśo na ca saṃbhavaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:2763: bhūtā bhūtātmanā nityāḥ kasya kalpentyanityatām // Lank_3.120 //
XXbsu021_u:2772: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat
XXbsu021_u:2774: sarvabodhisattvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhanirodhakramānusaṃdhilakṣaṇakauśalyaṃ yena kramānusaṃdhilakṣaṇakauśalyena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā nirodhasukhasamāpattimukhena na pratimuhyema, na ca śrāvakapratyekabuddhatīrthyakaravyāmohe prapatema /
XXbsu021_u:2775: bhagavānāha - tena mahāmate śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru /
XXbsu021_u:2777: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt //
XXbsu021_u:2778: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - ṣaṣṭhīṃ mahāmate bhūmimupādāya bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhāśca nirodhaṃ samāpadyante /
XXbsu021_u:2779: saptamyāṃ bhūmau punaścittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ
XXbsu021_u:2781: teṣāṃ hi śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāmābhisaṃskārikī grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇapatitā ca nirodhasamāpattiḥ
XXbsu021_u:2782: ataste saptamyāṃ bhūmau cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe samāpadyante - mā sarvadharmāṇāmaviśeṣalakṣaṇaprāptiḥ syāditi /
XXbsu021_u:2785: ataḥ saptamyāṃ bhūmau cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe samāpattikauśalyaṃ nāsti yena samāpadyeran //
XXbsu021_u:2786: aṣṭamyāṃ mahāmate bhūmau bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ ca cittamanomanovijñānavikalpasaṃjñāvyāvṛttirbhavati
XXbsu021_u:2787: prathamaṣaṣṭhyāṃ bhūmau cittamanomanovijñānamātraṃ traidhātukaṃ samanupaśyati ātmātmīyavigataṃ svacittavikalpodbhavam, na ca bāhyabhāvalakṣaṇavaicitryapatitamanyatra svacittameva /
XXbsu021_u:2788: dvidhā bālānāṃ grāhyagrāhakabhāvena pariṇāmya svajñānaṃ na cāvabodhyante anādikāladauṣṭhulyavikalpaprapañcavāsanāvāsitāḥ
XXbsu021_u:2790: bodhisattvāśca samādhibuddhairvidhāryante tasmātsamādhisukhād, yena na parinirvānti aparipūrṇatvāttathāgatabhūmeḥ
XXbsu021_u:2791: sarvakāryapratiprasrambhaṇaṃ ca syāt, yadi na saṃghārayet, tathāgatakulavaṃśocchedaśca syāt
XXbsu021_u:2792: acintyabuddhamāhātmyaṃ ca deśayanti te buddhā bhagavantaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:2801: na tu mahāmate atra kaścitpravartate vā nivartate vā anyatra svacitadṛśyamātramidaṃ yaduta bhūmikramānusaṃdhistraidhātukavicitropacāraśca /
XXbsu021_u:2803: anavabodhādbālānāṃ bhūmikramānusaṃdhivyapadeśaṃ traidhātukavicitropacāraśca vyavasthāpyate buddhadharmālayā ca //
XXbsu021_u:2805: punaraparaṃ mahāmate śrāvakapratyekabuddhā aṣṭamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau nirodhasamāpattisukhamadamattāḥ svacittadṛśyamātrākuśalāḥ svasāmānyalakṣaṇāvaraṇavāsanāpudgaladharmanairātmyagrāhakadṛṣṭipatitā vikalpanirvāṇamatibuddhayo bhavanti, na viviktadharmamatibuddhayaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:2806: bodhisattvāḥ punarmahāmate nirodhasamādhisukhamukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā pūrvapraṇidhānakṛpākaruṇopetā niṣṭhapadagativibhāgajñā na parinirvānti /
XXbsu021_u:2811: tena punarbuddhadharmaheturna pravartate, jñānapūrvakaḥ pravartate tathāgatasvapratyātmabhūmyadhigamanatayā
XXbsu021_u:2813: tadyathā punarmahāmate kaścicchayitaḥ svapnāntare mahāvyāyāmautsukyena mahaughādātmānamuttārayet
XXbsu021_u:2816: sa evaṃ samanupaśyet - nedaṃ satyaṃ na mithyā anyatra dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñātānubhūtavikalpavāsanāvicitrarūpasaṃsthānānādikālavikalpapatitā nāstyastidṛṣṭivikalpaparivarjitā manovijñānānubhūtāḥ svapne dṛśyante /
XXbsu021_u:2817: evameva mahāmate bodhisattvā mahāsattvā aṣṭamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau vikalpasyāpravṛttiṃ dṛṣṭvā prathamasaptamībhūmisaṃcārātsarvadharmābhisamayānmāyādidharmasamatayā sarvadharmautsukyagrāhyagrāhakavikalpoparataṃ cittacaitasikavikalpaprasaraṃ dṛṣṭvā buddhadharmeṣu prayujyante /
XXbsu021_u:2818: anadhigatānāmadhigamāya prayoga eṣa mahāmate nirvāṇaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ na vināśaḥ cittamanomanovijñānavikalpasaṃjñāvigamācca anutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilambho bhavati /
XXbsu021_u:2819: na cātra mahāmate paramārthe kramo na kramānusaṃdhirnirābhāsavikalpaviviktadharmopadeśāt //
XXbsu021_u:2822: etaddhi bhāṣitaṃ buddhairbhāṣante bhāṣayanti ca // Lank_4.1 //
XXbsu021_u:2823: cittaṃ hi bhūmayaḥ sapta nirābhāsā tvihāṣṭamī /
XXbsu021_u:2824: dve hi bhūmī vihāro 'tra śeṣā bhūmirmamātmikā // Lank_4.2 //
XXbsu021_u:2828: citrā manoharāḥ saumyāstribhavaṃ nirmiṇanti te // Lank_4.4 //
XXbsu021_u:2830: tatra deśemi yānāni eṣā bhūmirmamātmikā // Lank_4.5 //
XXbsu021_u:2831: daśamī tu bhavetprathamā prathamā cāṣṭamī bhavet /
XXbsu021_u:2832: navamī saptamī cāpi saptamī cāṣṭamī bhavet // Lank_4.6 //
XXbsu021_u:2833: dvitīyā ca tṛtīyā syāccaturthī pañcamī bhavet /
XXbsu021_u:2834: tṛtīyā ca bhavetṣaṣṭhī nirābhāse kramaḥ kutaḥ // Lank_4.7 //
XXbsu021_u:2839: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat
XXbsu021_u:2841: bhagavānāha - na mahāmate tathāgato nityo nānityaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:2846: nityāni hi mahāmate sarvatīrthakarāṇāṃ kāraṇānyakṛtakāni ca /
XXbsu021_u:2858: tadyathā mahāmate ākāśaṃ na nityaṃ nānityaṃ nityānityavyudāsādekatvānyatvobhayatvānubhayatvanityānityatvadoṣairavacanīyaḥ punaraparaṃ mahāmate śaśahayakharoṣṭramaṇḍūkasarpamakṣikāmīnaviṣāṇatulyaḥ syādanutpādanityatvāt
XXbsu021_u:2860: punaraparaṃ mahāmate astyasau paryāyo yena nityastathāgataḥ /
XXbsu021_u:2863: abhisamayādhigamajñānaṃ hi mahāmate nityaṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām /
XXbsu021_u:2864: utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā sthitaivaiṣā dharmatā dharmaniyāmatā dharmasthititā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhatīrthakarābhisamayeṣu
XXbsu021_u:2868: na mahāmate tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāścittamanomanovijñānaskandhadhātvāyatanāvidyāvāsanāprabhāvitāḥ sarvaṃ hi mahāmate tribhavamabhūtavikalpaprabhavam /
XXbsu021_u:2870: dvaye hi sati mahāmate nityatā cānityatā ca
XXbsu021_u:2873: ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā na nityā nānityāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:2875: vikalpabuddhikṣayānmahāmate nityānityagrāho nivāryate bālānāṃ na tu viviktadṛṣṭibuddhikṣayāt
XXbsu021_u:2878: ye paśyanti sadā buddhān na te dṛṣṭivaśaṃ gatāḥ // Lank_5.1 //
XXbsu021_u:2883: svacittamātraṃ saṃpaśyan na vivādaṃ samārabhet // Lank_5.3 //

XXbsu021_u:2889: asatyātmani kasya pravṛttirvā nirvṛttirvā? bālāśca pravṛttinivṛttyāśritā duḥkhakṣayānavabodhānnirvāṇaṃ na prajānanti /
XXbsu021_u:2890: bhagavānāha - tena hi mahāmate śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru /
XXbsu021_u:2892: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt //
XXbsu021_u:2900: saptāpyabhūtaparikalpahetujanitasaṃsthānākṛtiviśeṣasamavāyāvalambīni nāmanimittābhiniviṣṭāni svacittadṛśyarūpalakṣaṇāavabodhakāni sukhaduḥkhāpratisaṃvedakāni amokṣakāraṇāni nāmanimittaparyutthānarāgajanitajanakataddhetvālambāni teṣāṃ copāttānāmindriyākhyānāṃ parikṣayanirodhe samantarānutpatteranyeṣāṃ svamativikalpasukhaduḥkhāpratisaṃvedināṃ saṃjñāveditanirodhasamāpattisamāpannānāṃ caturdhyānasatyavimokṣakuśalānāṃ yogināṃ vimokṣabuddhirbhavatyapravṛtteḥ aparāvṛtte ca tathāgatagarbhaśabdasaṃśabdite ālayavijñāne nāsti saptānāṃ pravṛttivijñānānāṃ nirodhaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:2910: tasmāttarhi mahāmate tathāgatagarbhaḥ ālayavijñānasaṃśabdito viśodhayitavyo viśeṣārthibhirbodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ
XXbsu021_u:2911: yadi hi mahāmate ālayavijñānasaṃśabditastathāgatagarbho 'tra na syāditi asati mahāmate tathāgatagarbhe ālayavijñānasaṃśabdite na pravṛttirna
XXbsu021_u:2917: prakṛtipariśuddho 'pi san aśuddha ivāgantukleśopakliṣṭatayā teṣāmābhāti na tu tathāgatānām
XXbsu021_u:2919: etadeva mahāmate mayā śrīmālāṃ devīmadhikṛtya deśanāpāṭhe anyāṃśca sūkṣmanipuṇaviśuddhabuddhīn bodhisattvānadhiṣṭhāya tathāgatagarbha ālayavijñānasaṃśabditaḥ saptabhirvijñānaiḥ saha pravṛttyabhiniviṣṭānāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmanairātmyapradarśanārthaṃ śrīmālāṃ devīmadhiṣṭhāya tathāgataviṣayo deśito na śrāvakapratyekabuddhānyatīrthakaratarkaviṣayo 'nyatra mahāmate tathāgataviṣaya eva tathāgatagarbha ālayavijñānaviṣayastvatsadṛśānāṃ ca
XXbsu021_u:2920: sūkṣmanipuṇamatibuddhiprabhedakānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmarthapratiśaraṇānāṃ no tu yathārutadeśanāpāṭhābhiniviṣṭānāṃ sarvānyatīrthyaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām /
XXbsu021_u:2921: tasmāttarhi mahāmate tvayā anyaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ sarvatathāgataviṣaye
XXbsu021_u:2928: arthākāro na cārtho 'sti yathābhūtaṃ vipaśyataḥ // Lank_6.2 //
XXbsu021_u:2929: aṅgulyagraṃ yathā bālo na gṛhṇāti niśākaram /
XXbsu021_u:2930: tathā hyakṣarasaṃsaktastattvaṃ vetti na māmakam // Lank_6.3 //
XXbsu021_u:2932: vijñānaṃ pañcabhiḥ sārdhaṃ dṛśyaṃ kalpeti raṅgavat // Lank_6.4 //
XXbsu021_u:2933: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma - deśayatu me bhagavān, deśayatu me sugataḥ
XXbsu021_u:2934: pañcadharmasvabhāvavijñānanairātmyadvayaprabhedagatilakṣaṇam, yena nairātmyadvayaprabhedagatilakṣaṇena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvabhūmikramānusaṃdhiṣvetān dharmān vibhāvayema, yathā tairdharmaiḥ sarvabuddhadharmānupraveśo bhavet /
XXbsu021_u:2936: bhagavānāha - tena hi mahāmate śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru /
XXbsu021_u:2938: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
XXbsu021_u:2941: yaduta nāma nimittaṃ vikalpaḥ samyagjñānaṃ tathatā ca tathāgatapratyātmāryagatipraveśaḥ śāśvatocchedasadasaddṛṣṭivivarjito dṛṣṭadharmasukhasamāpattisukhavihāra āmukhībhavati yogayoginām /
XXbsu021_u:2942: tatra mahāmate pañcadharmasvabhāvavijñānanairātmyadvayasvacittadṛśyabāhyabhāvābhāvānavabodhādvikalpaḥ pravartate bālānāṃ na tvāryāṇām //
XXbsu021_u:2944: mahāmatirāha - kathaṃ punarbhagavan bālānāṃ vikalpaḥ pravartate, na
XXbsu021_u:2949: abhisaṃskṛtya punaḥ punaḥ kośakārakīṭakā iva svavikalpapariveṣṭitamatayo gatisamudrakāntāraprapatitā ghaṭiyantravannātipravartante /
XXbsu021_u:2950: na ca prajānanti mohānmāyāmarīcyudakacandrasvabhāvakalpanātmātmīyarahitān sarvadharmānabhūtavikalpoditāṃllakṣyalakṣaṇāpagatān bhaṅgotpādasthitigativinivṛttān svacittadṛśyavikalpaprabhavānīśvarakālāṇupradhānaprabhavān nāmanimittānuplavena mahāmate bālā nimittamanusaranti //
XXbsu021_u:2953: tatra vikalpaḥ punarmahāmate yena nāma samudīrayati /
XXbsu021_u:2958: / punaraparaṃ mahāmate yena samyagjñānena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na nāma bhāvīkaroti, na ca nimittamabhāvīkaroti /
XXbsu021_u:2961: tathatāvyavasthitaśca mahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nirābhāsagocarapratilābhitvātpramuditāṃ bodhisattvabhūmiṃ pratilabhate //
XXbsu021_u:2962: sa pratilabhya pramuditāṃ bodhisattvabhūmiṃ vyāvṛttaḥ sarvatīrthyāpāyagatibhyo bhavati lokottaradharmagatisamavasṛtaḥ lakṣaṇaparicayānmāyādipūrvakāṃ sarvadharmagatiṃ vibhāvayan svapratyātmāryadharmagatilakṣaṇaṃ tarkadṛṣṭivinivṛttakautuko 'nupūrveṇa
XXbsu021_u:2971: atraiva mahāmate trayaḥ svabhāvā antargatāḥ, aṣṭau ca vijñānāni, dve ca nairātmye /
XXbsu021_u:2972: tatra nāma ca nimittaṃ ca parikalpitaḥ svabhāvo veditavyaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:2973: yaḥ punarmahāmate tadāśrayapravṛtto vikalpaścittacaittasaṃśabdito yugapatkālodita āditya iva raśmisahito vicitralakṣaṇasvabhāvo
XXbsu021_u:2974: vikalpādhārakaḥ, sa mahāmate svabhāvaḥ paratantra ityucyate /
XXbsu021_u:2975: samyagjñānaṃ tathatā ca mahāmate avināśatvātsvabhāvaḥ pariniṣpanno veditavyaḥ //
XXbsu021_u:2980: / eṣu mahāmate pañcasu dharmeṣu sarvabuddhadharmā antargatāḥ,
XXbsu021_u:2982: punaraparaṃ mahāmate pañcadharmāḥ - nimittaṃ nāma vikalpastathatā
XXbsu021_u:2984: tatra mahāmate nimittaṃ yatsaṃsthānākṛtiviśeṣākārarūpādilakṣaṇaṃ dṛśyate tannimittam /
XXbsu021_u:2986: yena tannāma samudīrayati nimittābhivyañjakaṃ samadharmeti vā, sa mahāmate cittacaittasaṃśabdito vikalpaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:2988: tattvaṃ bhūtaṃ niścato niṣṭhā prakṛtiḥ svabhāvo
XXbsu021_u:2990: mayā anyaiśca tathāgatairanugamya yathāvaddeśitaṃ prajñaptaṃ vivṛtamuttānīkṛtam, yatrānugamya samyagavabodhānucchedāśāśvatato vikalpasyāpravṛttiḥ
XXbsu021_u:2993: eteṣveva trayaḥ svabhāvāḥ, aṣṭau ca vijñānāni, dve ca nairātmye, sarvabuddhadharmāścāntargatāḥ
XXbsu021_u:2994: atra te mahāmate svamatikauśalaṃ karaṇīyam, anyaiśca kārayitavyam /
XXbsu021_u:2997: pañca dharmāḥ svabhāvaśca vijñānānyaṣṭa eva ca /
XXbsu021_u:3001: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat
XXbsu021_u:3002: - yatpunaretaduktaṃ bhagavatā deśanāpāṭhe yathā gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāstathāgatā atītā anāgatā vartamānāśca /
XXbsu021_u:3003: tatkimidaṃ bhagavan yathārutārthagrahaṇaṃ kartavyam, āhosvidanyaḥ kaścidarthāntaraviśeṣo 'stīti? taducyatāṃ bhagavan /
XXbsu021_u:3005: na ca mahāmate gaṅgānadīvālukāpramāṇatayā tryadhvakabuddhapramāṇatā bhavati /
XXbsu021_u:3009: na ca mahāmate tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sadṛśāsadṛśaṃ lokātiśayātikrāntaṃ dṛṣṭāntaṃ prāviṣkurvanti /
XXbsu021_u:3011: yathā gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā iti nityānityābhiniveśābhiniviṣṭānāṃ bālapṛthagjanānāṃ tīrthakarāśayakudṛṣṭiyuktānāṃ saṃsārabhavacakrānusāriṇāmudvejanārtham kathamete udvignā bhavagaticakrasaṃkaṭādviśeṣārthino viśeṣamārabheranniti sulabhabuddhatvapradarśanārthaṃ na nodumbarapuṣpatulyastathāgatānāmutpāda
XXbsu021_u:3013: deśanāpāṭhe tu mayā vaineyajanatāpekṣayā udumbarapuṣpasudurlabhaprādurbhāvāstathāgatā iti deśitam /
XXbsu021_u:3014: na ca mahāmate udumbarapuṣpaṃ kenaciddṛṣṭapūrvaṃ na drakṣyate /
XXbsu021_u:3015: tathāgatāḥ punarmahāmate loke dṛṣṭāḥ, dṛśyante caitarhi /
XXbsu021_u:3017: svanayapratyavasthānakathāyāṃ mahāmate nirdiśyamānāyāṃ lokātiśayātikrāntā dṛṣṭāntā yuktāḥ kriyante 'śraddheyatvāt /
XXbsu021_u:3022: kiṃ tu upamāmātrametanmahāmate kṛtaṃ yaduta gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāstathāgatāḥ samā na viṣamā akalpāvikalpanataḥ /
XXbsu021_u:3023: tadyathā mahāmate gaṅgāyāṃ nadyāṃ vālukā mīnakacchapaśiśumāranakramahiṣasiṃhahastyādibhiḥ saṃkṣobhyamāṇā na kalpayanti na vikalpayanti - saṃkṣobhyāmahe na veti nirvikalpāḥ svacchā malavyapetāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:3024: evameva mahāmate tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ svapratyātmāryajñānagaṅgāmahānadībalābhijñāvaśitāvālukāḥ sarvatīrthakarabālamīnaparapravādibhiḥ saṃkṣobhyamāṇā na kalpayanti na vikalpayanti /
XXbsu021_u:3027: tadyathā mahāmate gaṅgāyāṃ nadyāṃ vālukā pṛthivīlakṣaṇasvabhāvatvātpṛthivī, kalpoddāhe dahyamānāpi na
XXbsu021_u:3029: na ca mahāmate pṛthivī dahyate tejodhātupratibaddhatvādanyatra bālapṛthagjanā vitathatāpatitayā saṃtatyā dahyamānāṃ kalpayanti, na ca dahyate tadagnihetubhūtatvāt /
XXbsu021_u:3031: tadyathā mahāmate nadyāṃ gaṅgāyāṃ vālukā apramāṇāḥ, evameva mahāmate tathāgatānāṃ
XXbsu021_u:3033: tadyathā mahāmate gaṅgāyāṃ nadyāṃ vālukā na vālukāsvabhāvāntaramārabhante, vālukāvasthā eva vālukāḥ, evameva mahāmate tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saṃsāre na pravṛttirna nivṛttiḥ, bhavapravṛttyucchinnahetutvāt /
XXbsu021_u:3034: tadyathā mahāmate gaṅgāyāṃ nadyāṃ vālukā apakṛṣṭā api na prajñāyante, prakṣiptā api na
XXbsu021_u:3035: prajñāyante, mahāmate evameva tathāgatānāṃ jñānaṃ sattvaparipākayogena na
XXbsu021_u:3037: śarīravatāṃ hi mahāmate nāśo bhavati nāśarīravatām /
XXbsu021_u:3039: tadyathā mahāmate gaṅgāyāṃ nadyāṃ vālukā niṣpīḍyamānā ghṛtatailārthibhirghṛtatailādivirahitāḥ,
XXbsu021_u:3040: evameva mahāmate tathāgatāḥ sattvaduḥkhairniṣpīḍyamānā dharmadhātvīśvarapraṇidhānasukhaṃ na vijahati mahāmate mahākaruṇopetatvāt,
XXbsu021_u:3042: tadyathā mahāmate gaṅgāyāṃ nadyāṃ vālukāḥ pravāhānukūlāḥ pravahanti nānudake, evameva mahāmate tathāgatānāṃ sarvabuddhadharmadeśanā nirvāṇapravāhānukūlā saṃvartate /
XXbsu021_u:3046: na ca mahāmate saṃsārasya pūrvā koṭiḥ prajñāyate /
XXbsu021_u:3047: aprajñāyamānā kathaṃ gatyarthena nirdekṣyāmi? gatyartho mahāmate ucchedaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:3049: mahāmatirāha - tadyadi bhagavan pūrvā koṭirna prajñāyate sattvānāṃ
XXbsu021_u:3050: saṃsaratām, tatkathaṃ mokṣaḥ prajñāyate prāṇinām? bhagavānāha -
XXbsu021_u:3054: na cātra vikalpādanyatkiṃcitsattvāntaramasti, adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā parīkṣyamāṇaṃ buddhyā
XXbsu021_u:3060: anāśagatiniṣṭhān vai te paśyanti tathāgatān // Lank_6.7 //
XXbsu021_u:3062: vāhānukūlā nityāśca tathā buddhasya buddhatā // Lank_6.8 //
XXbsu021_u:3063: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat
XXbsu021_u:3064: - deśayatu bhagavān, deśayatu me sugatastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgaṃ bhedalakṣaṇaṃ caiṣām /
XXbsu021_u:3065: tatkathaṃ bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ kṣaṇikāḥ? bhagavānāha - tena hi mahāmate śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru /
XXbsu021_u:3067: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
XXbsu021_u:3068: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmā iti mahāmate yaduta kuśalākuśalāḥ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtā laukikalokottarāḥ sāvadyānavadyāḥ sāsravānāsravā upāttānupāttāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:3070: samādhisukhasamāpattayo mahāmate dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārabhāvena āryāṇāṃ kuśalānāsravā ityucyante
XXbsu021_u:3072: katamānyaṣṭau? yaduta tathāgatagarbha ālayavijñānasaṃśabdito mano manovijñānaṃ ca pañca ca vijñānakāyāstīrthyānuvarṇitāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:3073: tatra mahāmate pañca vijñānakāyā manovijñānasahitā kuśalākuśalakṣaṇaparaṃparābhedabhinnāḥ saṃtatiprabandhanābhinnaśarīrāḥ pravartamānāḥ pravartante /
XXbsu021_u:3077: saṃsthānākṛtiviśeṣagrāhakaṃ manovijñānaṃ pañcabhirvijñānakāyaiḥ saha saṃprayuktaṃ pravartate kṣaṇakālānavasthāyi /
XXbsu021_u:3079: kṣaṇikaṃ punarmahāmate ālayavijñānaṃ tathāgatagarbhasaṃśabditaṃ manaḥsahitaṃ pravṛttivijñānavāsanābhiḥ kṣaṇikamanāsravavāsanābhirakṣaṇikam /
XXbsu021_u:3080: na ca bālapṛthagjanā avabudhyante kṣaṇikavādābhiniviṣṭā kṣaṇikākṣaṇikatāmimāṃ sarvadharmāṇām
XXbsu021_u:3083: 96) asaṃsāriṇo mahāmate pañca vijñānakāyā ananubhūtasukhaduḥkhā anirvāṇahetavaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:3084: tathāgatagarbhaḥ punarmahāmate anubhūtasukhaduḥkhahetusahitaḥ pravartate nivartate ca catasṛbhirvāsanābhiḥ saṃmūrcchitaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:3086: punaraparaṃ mahāmate samadhāraṇaṃ kalpasthitāḥ suvarṇavajrajinadhātuprāptiviśeṣā abhaṅginaḥ
XXbsu021_u:3087: yadi punarmahāmate abhisamayaprāptiḥ kṣaṇikā syāt, anāryatvamāryāṇāṃ syāt /
XXbsu021_u:3089: suvarṇaṃ vajraṃ ca mahāmate samadhāraṇaṃ kalpasthitā api tulyamānā na hīyante na vardhante
XXbsu021_u:3092: punarapi mahāmatirāha - yatpunaretaduktaṃ bhagavatā - ṣaṭpāramitāṃ paripūrya buddhatvamavāpyata iti /
XXbsu021_u:3093: tatkatamāstāḥ ṣaṭpāramitāḥ? kathaṃ ca paripūriṃ gacchanti? bhagavānāha - traya ete mahāmate pāramitābhedāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:3099: tatra lokottarābhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhā nirvāṇagrāhapatitāśayā dānādiṣu prayujyante yathaiva bālā ātmasukhanirvāṇābhilāṣiṇaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:3106: yena vīryeṇa pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ ghaṭate yogānukūladarśanādvikalpasya vyāvṛtteḥ, sā vīryapāramitā
XXbsu021_u:3119: utpattyanantaraṃ bhaṅgaṃ na vai deśemi bāliśān /
XXbsu021_u:3120: nairantaryeṇa bhāvānāṃ vikalpaḥ spandate gatau // Lank_6.11 //
XXbsu021_u:3121: sā vidyā kāraṇaṃ teṣāṃ cittānāṃ saṃpravartikam /
XXbsu021_u:3122: antarā kimavasthāsau yāvadrūpaṃ na jāyate // Lank_6.12 //
XXbsu021_u:3124: rūpaṃ na tiṣṭhate kāle kimālambya pravartsyate // Lank_6.13 //
XXbsu021_u:3126: na prasiddhaṃ kathaṃ tasya kṣaṇabhaṅgo 'vadhāryate // Lank_6.14 //
XXbsu021_u:3130: bhikṣutvaṃ samayaprāptirdṛṣṭā vai kṣaṇikāḥ katham // Lank_6.16 //
XXbsu021_u:3131: gandharvapuramāyādyā rūpā vai kṣaṇikā na kim /
XXbsu021_u:3137: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat
XXbsu021_u:3142: etasminnantare bhagavatā ekamapyakṣaraṃ nodāhṛtaṃ na pravyāhṛtam /
XXbsu021_u:3143: sadā samāhitāśca tathāgatā na vitarkayanti na vyavacārayanti /
XXbsu021_u:3145: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ca vijñānānāṃ kṣaṇaparaṃparābhedalakṣaṇaṃ nirdiśyate? vajrapāṇiśca satatasamitaṃ nityānubaddhaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:3149: cañcāmāṇavikā sundarikā pravrājikā yathā dhautapātrādīni ca bhagavan karmāvaraṇāni dṛśyante
XXbsu021_u:3150: tatkathaṃ bhagavatā sarvākārajñatā prāptā aprahīṇairdoṣaiḥ? bhagavānāha -
XXbsu021_u:3151: tena hi mahāmate śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru /
XXbsu021_u:3153: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
XXbsu021_u:3154: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - nirupadhiśeṣaṃ nirvāṇadhātuṃ saṃdhāya bodhisattvacaryāṃ ca caritavatāṃ protsāhanārtham /
XXbsu021_u:3155: santi hi mahāmate bodhisattvacaryācāriṇaḥ iha anyeṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu /
XXbsu021_u:3156: yeṣāṃ śrāvakayānanirvāṇābhilāṣasteṣāṃ śrāvakayānarucivyāvartanārthaṃ mahāyānagatiprotsāhanārthaṃ ca tannirmitaśrāvakānnirmāṇakāyairvyākaroti,
XXbsu021_u:3159: / na hi mahāmate śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ kleśāvaraṇaprahāṇaviśeṣo vimuktyekarasatayā /
XXbsu021_u:3164: pūrvadharmasthititāṃ saṃdhāya apūrvacaramasya cābhāvātpūrvaprahiṇairevākṣaraistathāgato na vitarkya na vicārya dharmaṃ deśayati /
XXbsu021_u:3168: sapta mahāmate manomanovijñānacakṣurvijñānādayaḥ kṣaṇikāḥ vāsanāhetutvātkuśalānāsravapakṣarahitāḥ na saṃsāriṇaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:3171: nirmitanairmāṇikānāṃ mahāmate tathāgatānāṃ vajrapāṇiḥ pārśvānugato na maulānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām /
XXbsu021_u:3172: maulo hi mahāmate tathāgataḥ sarvapramāṇendriyavinivṛttaḥ sarvabālaśrāvakapratyekabuddhatīrthyānām
XXbsu021_u:3176: na teṣu tathāgato na cānyatra tebhyastathāgataḥ /
XXbsu021_u:3177: kumbhakārālambanādiprayogeṇeva sattvakṛtyāni karoti, lakṣaṇopetaṃ ca deśayati, na tu svanayapratyavasthānakathāṃ svapratyātmāryagatigocaram /
XXbsu021_u:3178: punaraparaṃ mahāmate ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃ nirodhāducchedadṛṣṭimāśrayanti (Vaidya 99) bālapṛthagjanāḥ, ālayānavabodhācchāśvatadṛṣṭayo bhavanti /
XXbsu021_u:3183: trīṇi yānānyayānaṃ ca buddhānāṃ nāsti nirvṛtiḥ /
XXbsu021_u:3184: buddhatve vyākṛtāḥ sarve vītadeṣāśca deśitāḥ // Lank_7.1 //
XXbsu021_u:3188: yānti tenaiva nānyena atasteṣāṃ na nirvṛtiḥ // Lank_7.3 //
XXbsu021_u:3197: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantaṃ gāthābhiḥ paripṛcchaya punarapyadhyeṣate sma - deśayatu me bhagavāṃstathāgato 'rhan
XXbsu021_u:3198: samyaksaṃbuddho māṃsabhakṣaṇe guṇadoṣam, yena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā
XXbsu021_u:3199: mahāsattvā anāgatapratyutpannakāle sattvānāṃ kravyādasattvagativāsanāvāsitānāṃ māṃsabhojagṛddhāṇāṃ rasatṛṣṇāprahāṇāya dharmaṃ deśayāma, yathā ca te kravyādabhojinaḥ sattvā virāgya rasatṛṣṇāṃ dharmarasāhārakāṅkṣayā sarvasattvaikaputrakapremānugatāḥ parasparaṃ mahāmaitrīṃ pratilabheran pratilabhya sarvabodhisattvabhūmiṣu kṛtayogyāḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeran
XXbsu021_u:3200: śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmyā vā viśramya anuttarāṃ tāthāgatīṃ bhūmimupasarpayeyuḥ /
XXbsu021_u:3202: svayaṃ ca na bhakṣyate, prāgeva kṛpaikarase samyaksaṃbuddhe praṇīte lokanāthe /
XXbsu021_u:3203: tava śāsane māṃsaṃ svayaṃ ca bhakṣyate, bhakṣyamāṇaṃ ca na nivāryate /
XXbsu021_u:3204: tatsādhu bhagavān sarvalokānukampakaḥ sarvasattvaiputrakasamadarśī mahākāruṇiko 'nukampāmupādāya māṃsabhakṣaṇe guṇadeṣān deśayatu me, yathā ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvāstathatvāya sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayema /
XXbsu021_u:3205: bhagavānāha - tena hi mahāmate śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru /
XXbsu021_u:3207: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt //
XXbsu021_u:3208: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - aparimitairmahāmate kāraṇairmāṃsaṃ sarvamabhakṣyaṃ kṛpātmano bodhisattvasya /
XXbsu021_u:3210: iha mahāmate anena dīrgheṇādhvanā saṃsaratāṃ prāṇināṃ nāstyasau kaścitsattvaḥ sulabharūpo yo na mātābhūtpitā vā bhrātā vā bhaginī vā putro vā duhitā vā anyatarānyataro vā svajanabandhubandhūbhūto vā /
XXbsu021_u:3211: tasya anyajanmaparivṛttāśrayasya mṛgapaśupakṣiyonyantarbhūtasya bandhorbandhubhūtasya vā sarvabhūtātmabhūtānupāgantukāmena sarvajantuprāṇibhūtasaṃbhūtaṃ māṃsaṃ kathamiva bhakṣyaṃ syādbuddhadharmakāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena? rākṣasasyāpi mahāmate tathāgatānāmimāṃ dharmasudharmatāmupaśrutya upagatarakṣabhāvāḥ kṛpālavā bhavanti māṃsabhakṣaṇavinivṛttāḥ, kimuta dharmakāmā janāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:3212: evaṃ tāvanmahāmate teṣu teṣu jātiparivarteṣu sarvasattvāḥ svajanabandhubhāvasaṃjñāḥ sarvasattvaikaputrakasaṃjñābhāvanārthaṃ māṃsaṃ sarvamabhakṣyam /
XXbsu021_u:3214: vyabhicārādapi mahāmate māṃsaṃ sarvamabhakṣyaṃ cāritravato bodhisattvasya /
XXbsu021_u:3216: tāni ca mahāmate vīthyantareṣvaurabhrikā bhakṣyāṇīti kṛtvā mūlyahetorvikrīyante yataḥ, tato 'pi mahāmate māṃsamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya //
XXbsu021_u:3218: udvejanakaratvādapi mahāmate bhūtānāṃ maitrīmicchato yogino māṃsaṃ sarvamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya
XXbsu021_u:3219: (Vaidya 101) tadyathāpi mahāmate ḍombacāṇḍālakaivartādīn piśitāśinaḥ sattvān dūrata eva dṛṣṭvā śvānaḥ prabhayanti bhayena, maraṇaprāptāścaike bhavanti - asmānapi mārayiṣyantīti /
XXbsu021_u:3220: evameva mahāmate anye 'pi khabhūjalasaṃniśritān sūkṣmajantavo ye māṃsāśino darśanāddūrādeva paṭunā ghrāṇenāghrāya gandhaṃ rākṣasasyeva mānuṣā drutamapasarpanti, maraṇasaṃdehāścaike bhavanti /
XXbsu021_u:3221: tasmādapi ca mahāmate udvejanakaratvānmahāmaitrīvihāriṇo yogino māṃsamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya anāryajanajuṣṭaṃ durgandham /
XXbsu021_u:3223: ṛṣibhojanāhāro hi mahāmate āryajano na māṃsarudhirāhāraḥ,
XXbsu021_u:3225: bahujanacittānurakṣaṇatayāpi apavādaparihāraṃ cecchataḥ śāsanasya mahāmate māṃsamabhakṣyaṃ kṛpātmano bodhisattvasya /
XXbsu021_u:3228: yannāmaite pūrvarṣibhojanānyapāsya kravyādā ivāmiṣāhārāḥ paripūrṇakukṣayaḥ khabhūmijalasaṃniśritān sūkṣmāṃstrāsayanto jantūn samutrāsayanta imaṃ lokaṃ samantataḥ paryaṭanti /
XXbsu021_u:3230: brāhmaṇyam, nāstyeṣāṃ dharmo na vinayaḥ, ityanekaprakārapratihatacetasaḥ śāsanamevāpavadanti
XXbsu021_u:3231: tasmādbahujanacittānurakṣaṇatayāpi apavādaparihāraṃ cecchataḥ śāsanasya mahāmate māṃsaṃṃ sarvamabhakṣyaṃ kṛpātmano bodhisattvasya //
XXbsu021_u:3233: mṛtasyāpi hi mahāmate manuṣyasya māṃse dahyamāne tadanyaprāṇimāṃse ca, na kaścidgandhaviśeṣaḥ
XXbsu021_u:3235: ato 'pi mahāmate śucikāmasya yoginaḥ sarvaṃ māṃsamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya //
XXbsu021_u:3236: śmaśānikānāṃ ca mahāmate araṇyavanaprasthānyamanuṣyāvacarāṇi prāntāni śayanāsanānyadhyāvasatāṃ yogināṃ yogācārāṇāṃ maitrīvihāriṇāṃ vidyādharāṇāṃ vidyāṃ sādhayitukāmānāṃ vidyāsādhanamokṣavighnakaratvānmahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca sarvayogasādhanāntarāyakaramityapi samanupaśyatāṃ mahāmate svaparātmahitakāmasya māṃsaṃ sarvamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya /
XXbsu021_u:3238: devatā api cainaṃ parivarjayantīti kṛtvā mahāmate kṛpātmanaḥ sarvaṃ māṃsamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya
XXbsu021_u:3239: mukhaṃ cāsya paramadurgandhi ihaiva tāvajjanmani, ityapi kṛtvā mahāmate kṛpātmanaḥ sarvaṃ māṃsamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya /
XXbsu021_u:3246: saṃtrāsamakasmāccāpadyante, āhāre ca mātrāṃ na jānāti nāpyaśitapītakhāditākhāditasya samyagrasapariṇāmapuṣṭyādi
XXbsu021_u:3247: krimijantupracurakuṣṭhanidānakoṣṭhaśca bhavati vyādhibahulam, na ca pratikūlasaṃjñāṃ pratilabhate
XXbsu021_u:3248: (Vaidya 102) putramāṃsabhaiṣajyavadāhāraṃ deśayaṃścāhaṃ mahāmate kathamiva anāryajanasevitamāryajanavivarjitamevamanekadoṣāvahamanekaguṇavivarjitamanṛṣibhojanapraṇītamakalpyaṃ māṃsarudhirāhāraṃ śiṣyebhyo 'nujñāpyāmi?
XXbsu021_u:3249: anujñātavān punarahaṃ mahāmate sarvāryajanasevitamanāryajanavivarjitamanekaguṇavāhakamanekadoṣavivarjitaṃ sarvapūrvarṣipraṇītaṃ bhojanam, yaduta śāliyavagodhūmamudgamāṣamasūrādisarpistailamadhuphāṇitaguḍakhaṇḍamatsyaṇḍikādiṣu samupapadyamānaṃ bhojanaṃ kalpyamiti kṛtvā /
XXbsu021_u:3253: na tu mahāmate pūrvajinakṛtādhikārāṇāmavaropitakuśalamūlānāṃ śrāddhānāmavikalpānāṃ bahulānāṃ śākyakulakulīnānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ kāyajīvitabhogānadhyavasitānāmarasagṛdhrāṇāmalolupānāṃ kṛpālūnāṃ sarvabhūtātmabhūtatāmupagantukāmānāṃ sarvasattvaikaputrakapriyadarśināṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānamiti vadāmi //
XXbsu021_u:3255: sa māṃsabhojanāhārātiprasaṅgena pratisevamāno rasatṛṣṇādhyavasānaparamatayā māṃsāni mānuṣyāṇyapi bhakṣitavān /
XXbsu021_u:3256: tannidānaṃ ca mitrāmātyajñātibandhuvargeṇāpi parityaktaḥ, prāgeva paurajānapadaiḥ /
XXbsu021_u:3261: yasmādrājā anaparādhibhūtānukampakaḥ śibī duḥkhena mahatā lambhitaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:3262: tadevamanekajanmābhyastamapi mahāmate devendrabhūtasya śakrasyāpi sataḥ svaparadoṣāvahanamabhūt, prāgeva tadanyeṣām //
XXbsu021_u:3263: anyeṣāṃ ca mahāmate narendrabhūtānāṃ satāmaśvenāpahṛtānāmaṭavyāṃ paryaṭamānānāṃ siṃhyā saha maithunaṃ gatavatāṃ jīvitabhayādapatyāni cotpāditavantaḥ siṃhasaṃvāsānvayātkalmāṣapādaprabhṛtayo nṛpaputrāḥ pūrvajanmamāṃsādadoṣavāsanatayā manuṣyendrabhūtā api santo māṃsādā abhūvan
XXbsu021_u:3264: / ihaiva ca mahāmate janmani saptakuṭīrake 'pi grāme pracuramāṃsalaulyādatiprasaṅgena niṣevamānā mānuṣamāṃsādā ghorā ḍākā vā ḍākinyaśca saṃjāyante /
XXbsu021_u:3265: jātiparivarte ca mahāmate tathaiva māṃsarasādhyavasānatayā siṃhavyāghradvīpivṛkatarakṣumārjārajambukolūkādipracuramāṃsādayoniṣu pracuratarapiśitāśanā rākṣasādighoratarayoniṣu vinipātyante /
XXbsu021_u:3266: yatra vinipatitānāṃ duḥkhena mānuṣyayonirapi samāpadyate, prāgave nirvṛtiḥ /
XXbsu021_u:3267: ityevamādayo mahāmate māṃsādadoṣāḥ prāgeva niṣevamānānāṃ samupajāyante,
XXbsu021_u:3271: evamādiguṇadoṣadarśanānmahāmate māṃsaṃ sarvamabhakṣyaṃ kṛpātmano bodhisattvasyeti vadāmi //
XXbsu021_u:3272: yadi ca mahāmate māṃsaṃ na kathaṃcana kecana bhakṣayeyuḥ, na tannidānaṃ ghāteran /
XXbsu021_u:3273: mūlyahetorhi mahāmate prāyaḥ prāṇino niraparādhino vadhyante svalpādanyahetoḥ /
XXbsu021_u:3274: kaṣṭaṃ mahāmate rasatṛṣṇāyāmatisevatāṃ māṃsāni mānuṣānyapi mānuṣairbhakṣyante, kiṃ punaritaramṛgapakṣiprāṇisaṃbhūtamāṃsāni
XXbsu021_u:3275: prāyo mahāmate māṃsarasatṛṣṇārtairidaṃ tathā tathā jālayantramāviddhaṃ mohapuruṣaiḥ,
XXbsu021_u:3278: na caiṣāṃ mahāmate kiṃkanīkṛtarūkṣacetasāṃ rākṣasānāmiva gataghṛṇānāṃ kadācidapi prāṇiṣu prāṇisaṃjñayā ghātayatāṃ bhakṣayatāṃ na ghṛṇotpadyate //
XXbsu021_u:3279: na ca mahāmate akṛtakamakāritamasaṃkalpitaṃ nāma māṃsaṃ kalpyamasti yadupādāya anujānīyāṃ śrāvakebhyaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:3281: 'dhvani mamaiva śāsane pravrajitvā śākyaputrīyatvaṃ pratijānānāḥ kāṣāyadhvajadhāriṇo mohapuruṣā
XXbsu021_u:3282: vividhavinayavikalpavādinaḥ satkāyadṛṣṭiyuktā rasatṛṣṇādhyavasitāstāṃ tāṃ māṃsabhakṣaṇahetvābhāsāṃ granthayiṣyanti /
XXbsu021_u:3286: praṇītabhojaneṣu coktam, svayaṃ ca kila tathāgatena paribhuktamiti /
XXbsu021_u:3287: na ca mahāmate kutracitsūtre pratisevitavyamityanujñātam, praṇītabhojaneṣu vā deśitaṃ kalpyamiti
XXbsu021_u:3288: yadi tu mahāmate anujñātukāmatā me syāt, kalpyaṃ vā me śrāvakāṇāṃ pratisevituṃ syāt, nāhaṃ maitrīvihāriṇāṃ yogināṃ yogācārāṇāṃ śmaśānikānāṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca sarvasattvaikaputrakasaṃjñābhāvanārthaṃ sarvāmāṃsabhakṣaṇapratiṣedhaṃ
XXbsu021_u:3290: asmin mahāmate dharmakāmānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca sarvayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ śmaśānikānāṃ maitrīvihāriṇāmāraṇyakānāṃ yogināṃ yogācārāṇāṃ sarvayogasādhanāya sarvasattvaikaputrakasaṃjñābhāvanārthaṃ sarvamāṃsapratiṣedham //
XXbsu021_u:3291: tatra tatra deśanāpāṭhe śikṣāpadānāmanupūrvībandhaṃ niḥśreṇīpadavinyāsayogena trikoṭiṃ baddhvā na taduddiśya kṛtāni pratiṣiddhāni /
XXbsu021_u:3293: iha tu sūtre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ nirupāyena sarvaṃ pratiṣiddham /
XXbsu021_u:3298: yadapi ca mahāmate mamābhyākhyānaṃ dātavyaṃ maṃsyante tathāgatenāpi
XXbsu021_u:3303: dharmāhārā hi mahāmate mama śrāvakāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvāśca nāmiṣāhārāḥ, prāgeva tathāgatāḥ
XXbsu021_u:3304: dharmakāyā hi mahāmate tathāgatā dharmāhārasthitayo nāmiṣakāyā na sarvāmiṣāhārasthitayo vāntasarvabhavopakaraṇatṛṣṇaiṣaṇāvāsanāḥ sarvakleśadoṣavāsanāpagatāḥ suvimuktacittaprajñāḥ sarvajñāḥ sarvadarśinaḥ sarvasattvaikaputrakasamadarśino mahākāruṇikāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:3305: so 'haṃ mahāmate sarvasattvaikaputrakasaṃjñī san kathamiva svaputramāṃsamanujñāsyāmi paribhoktuṃ śrāvakebhyaḥ, kuta eva svayaṃ paribhoktum? anujñātavānasmi śrāvakebhyaḥ svayaṃ vā paribhuktavāniti mahāmate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate //
XXbsu021_u:3307: madyaṃ māṃsaṃ palāṇḍuṃ na bhakṣayeyaṃ mahāmune /
XXbsu021_u:3311: bhakṣyamāṇe ca ye deṣā abhakṣye tu guṇāśca ye /
XXbsu021_u:3312: mahāmate nibodha tvaṃ ye doṣā māṃsabhakṣaṇe // Lank_8.3 //
XXbsu021_u:3314: udvejanīyaṃ bhūtānāṃ yogī māṃsaṃ vivarjayet // Lank_8.4 //
XXbsu021_u:3315: māṃsāni ca palāṇḍūṃśca madyāni vividhāni ca /
XXbsu021_u:3316: gṛñjanaṃ laśunaṃ caiva yogī nityaṃ vivarjayet // Lank_8.5 //
XXbsu021_u:3318: chidrācchidreṣu sattvānāṃ yacca sthānaṃ mahadbhayam // Lank_8.6 //
XXbsu021_u:3322: mūḍhasya saṃgatirbhavati jāyate na ca mucyate // Lank_8.8 //
XXbsu021_u:3323: lābhārthaṃ hanyate sattvo māṃsārthaṃ dīyate dhanam /
XXbsu021_u:3324: ubhau tau pāpakarmāṇau pacyete rauravādiṣu // Lank_8.9 //
XXbsu021_u:3327: te yānti paramaṃ ghoraṃ narakaṃ pāpakarmiṇaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:3331: acoditaṃ ca naivāsti tasmānmāṃsaṃ na bhakṣayet // Lank_8.12 //
XXbsu021_u:3332: māṃsaṃ na bhakṣayedyogī mayā buddhaiśca garhitam /
XXbsu021_u:3335: caṇḍālapukkasakule ḍombeṣu ca punaḥ punaḥ // Lank_8.14 //
XXbsu021_u:3339: laṅkāvatārasūtre ca mayā māṃsaṃ vivarjitam // Lank_8.16 //
XXbsu021_u:3341: khādate yadi nairlajjyādunmatto jāyate sadā // Lank_8.17 //
XXbsu021_u:3342: brāhmaṇeṣu ca jāyeta atha vā yogināṃ kule /
XXbsu021_u:3349: kalpikaṃ niravadyaṃ ca māṃsaṃ buddhānuvarṇitam // Lank_8.21 //
XXbsu021_u:3351: mātrayā pratikūlaṃ ca yogī piṇḍaṃ samācaret // Lank_8.22 //
XXbsu021_u:3360: atha khalu bhagavān mahāmatiṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayate sma -
XXbsu021_u:3399: yaḥ kaścinmahāmate kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāni mantrapadānyudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati, na tasya kaścidavatāraṃ lapsyate devo vā devī vā nāgo vā nāgī vā yakṣo vā yakṣī vā asuro vā asurī vā garuḍo vā garuḍī vā
XXbsu021_u:3400: kinnaro vā kinnarī vā mahorago vā mahoragī vā gandharvo vā gandharvī vā bhūto vā bhūtī vā kumbhāṇḍo vā kumbhāṇḍī vā piśāco vā piśācī vā ostārako vā austārakī vā apasmāro vā apasmārī vā rākṣaso vā rākṣasī vā ḍāko vā ḍākinī vā ojohāro vā ojohārī vā kaṭapūtano vā kaṭapūtanī vā amanuṣyo vā amanuṣyī vā, sarve te 'vatāraṃ na lapsyate /
XXbsu021_u:3402: so 'syāṣṭottaraśatābhimantritena rodan krandanto kaṃ diśaṃ dṛṣṭvā yāsyati
XXbsu021_u:3412: chinde bhinde bhañje marde pramarde dinakare svāhā //
XXbsu021_u:3413: imāni mahāmate mantrapadāni yaḥ kaścitkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati, tasya na kaścidavatāraṃ lapsyate devo vā devī vā nāgo vā nāgī vā yakṣo vā yakṣī vā asuro vā asurī vā garuḍo vā garuḍī vā kinnaro vā kinnarī vā mahorago vā mahoragī vā gandharvo vā gandharvī vā bhūto vā bhūtī vā kumbhāṇḍo vā
XXbsu021_u:3414: kumbhāṇḍī vā piśāco vā piśācī vā ostārako vā ostārakī vā, apasmāro vā apasmārī vā, rākṣaso vā rākṣasī vā, ḍāko vā ḍākinī vā, ojoharo vā ojoharī
XXbsu021_u:3415: vā, kaṭapūtano vā kaṭapūtanī vā, manuṣyo vā manuṣyī vā, sarve te 'vatāraṃ
XXbsu021_u:3417: ya imāni mantrapadāni paṭhiṣyati, tena laṅkāvatārasūtraṃ paṭhitaṃ bhaviṣyati /
XXbsu021_u:3418: imāni bhagavatā mantrapadāni bhāṣitāni rākṣasānāṃ nivāraṇārtham //
XXbsu021_u:3425: sadasannopalabdho 'yaṃ prajñayā kṛpayā ca te // Lank_10.1 //
XXbsu021_u:3427: sadasannopalabdho 'yaṃ prajñayā kṛpayā ca te // Lank_10.2 //
XXbsu021_u:3429: sadasannopalabdhāste prajñayā kṛpayā ca te // Lank_10.3 //
XXbsu021_u:3431: viśuddhamanimittena prajñayā kṛpayā ca te // Lank_10.4 //
XXbsu021_u:3432: na nirvāsi na nirvāṇe na nirvāṇaṃ tvayi sthitam /
XXbsu021_u:3437: mṛgā gṛhṇanti pānīyaṃ vastu tasya na vidyate // Lank_10.7 //
XXbsu021_u:3439: bālā gṛhṇanti jāyantaṃ timiraṃ taimirā yathā // Lank_10.8 //
XXbsu021_u:3440: dhyātā dhyānaṃ ca dhyeyaṃ ca prahāṇaṃ satyadarśanam /
XXbsu021_u:3441: kalpanāmātramevedaṃ yo budhyati sa mucyati // Lank_10.9 //
XXbsu021_u:3443: sāpyatra manyanā śūnyā yayā śūnyeti manyate // Lank_10.10 //
XXbsu021_u:3445: māyāsvapnopamaṃ dṛśyaṃ vijñaptyā na vikalpayet // Lank_10.11 //
XXbsu021_u:3449: aṣṭaghā navadhā citraṃ taraṃgāṇi mahodadhau // Lank_10.13 //
XXbsu021_u:3457: parāvṛttaṃ yadā cittaṃ tadā tiṣṭhati śāśvatam /
XXbsu021_u:3462: bālā gṛhṇanti dhiṅbhūḍhā vandhyāḥ svapne yathā sutam // Lank_10.19 //
XXbsu021_u:3464: pratyayā dhātavo jñeyā śūnyatā ca bhavābhavam // Lank_10.20 //
XXbsu021_u:3466: bālā gṛhṇanti bhāvena lakṣaṇaṃ lakṣyameva ca // Lank_10.21 //
XXbsu021_u:3467: sarvasya vettā na ca sarvavettā sarvasya madhye na ca sarvamasti /
XXbsu021_u:3468: bālā vikalpenti budhaśca loko na cāpi budhyāmi na ca bodhayāmi //
XXbsu021_u:3473: tadā grāhaśca grāhyaṃ ca bhrāntiṃ dṛṣṭvā nivartate // Lank_10.24 //
XXbsu021_u:3474: nāhaṃ nirvāmi bhāvena kriyayā lakṣaṇena ca /
XXbsu021_u:3478: tathā vijñānavaicitryaṃ niruddhaṃ na pravartate // Lank_10.26 //
XXbsu021_u:3481: sadasanto na vidyante bhāvāḥ svapnopamā ime // Lank_10.27 //
XXbsu021_u:3484: khadyotā iva mattasya yathā citrā na santi ca /
XXbsu021_u:3487: na cāsau vidyate māyā evaṃ dharmāḥ svabhāvataḥ // Lank_10.30 //
XXbsu021_u:3488: na grāhako na ca grāhyaṃ na bandhyo na ca bandhanam /
XXbsu021_u:3491: tadā yogaṃ samāpanno drakṣyate māṃ na saṃśayaḥ // Lank_10.32 //
XXbsu021_u:3493: evaṃ dharmān vijānanto na kiṃcitpratijānati // Lank_10.33 //
XXbsu021_u:3495: bhrāntaṃ traidhātuke cittaṃ vicitraṃ khyāyate yataḥ // Lank_10.34 //
XXbsu021_u:3496: svapnaṃ ca lokaṃ ca samasvabhāvaṃ rūpāṇi citrāṇi hi tatra cāpi /
XXbsu021_u:3497: dṛśyanti bhogaṃ spariśaṃ samānaṃ dehāntagaṃ lokaguruṃ kriyāṃ ca //
XXbsu021_u:3498: cittaṃ hi traidhātukayoniretadbhrāntaṃ hi cittamihamutra dṛśyate /
XXbsu021_u:3499: na kalpayellokamasatta eṣāmetādṛśīṃ lokagatiṃ viditvā // Lank_10.36 //
XXbsu021_u:3501: na saṃbhavaṃ na vibhavaṃ prajñāyukto vipaśyati // Lank_10.37 //
XXbsu021_u:3505: tatra budhyanti saṃbuddhā nirmitastviha budhyate // Lank_10.39 //
XXbsu021_u:3508: sarvatra bālāḥ śṛṇvanti dharmaṃ tebhyaḥ pratiśrutvā (?) // Lank_10.40 //
XXbsu021_u:3512: bhrānteśca vidyate māyā na māyā bhrāntikāraṇam // Lank_10.42 //
XXbsu021_u:3515: lokaṃ vijñaptimātraṃ ca dṛṣṭyaughaṃ dharmapudgalam // Lank_10.43 //
XXbsu021_u:3516: vibhāvya lokamevaṃ tu parāvṛtto yadā bhavet /
XXbsu021_u:3519: asadbhūtasamāropo nāsti lakṣyaṃ na lakṣaṇam // Lank_10.45 //
XXbsu021_u:3521: rūpaṃ kalpanti vai bālā bhrāntāḥ saṃsārapañjare // Lank_10.46 //
XXbsu021_u:3528: khyātau kalpanti utpattiṃ bālāḥ kalpadvaye ratāḥ // Lank_10.49 //
XXbsu021_u:3529: ajñāna tṛṣṇā karmaṃ ca cittacaittā na mārakam /
XXbsu021_u:3530: pravartati tato yasmātpāratantryaṃ hi tanmatam // Lank_10.50 //
XXbsu021_u:3534: pratyayebhyo vinirmuktaṃ na paśyāmi vadāmyaham // Lank_10.52 //
XXbsu021_u:3536: na tiṣṭhati yadā dehe tena mahyamagocaram // Lank_10.53 //
XXbsu021_u:3539: pralobhya krīḍati gṛhe vane mṛgasamāgamam // Lank_10.54 //
XXbsu021_u:3541: pratyātmavedyāṃ hi sutāṃ bhūtakoṭiṃ vadāmyaham // Lank_10.55 //
XXbsu021_u:3543: nṛtyamānāḥ pravartante vyucchedaścaḥ na vidyate // Lank_10.56 //
XXbsu021_u:3547: dṛśyasya lakṣaṇaṃ nāsti yathā bālairvikalpyate // Lank_10.58 //
XXbsu021_u:3550: nāsti skandheṣvātmā na sattvo na ca pudgalaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:3551: utpadyate ca vijñānaṃ vijñānaṃ ca nirudhyate // Lank_10.60 //
XXbsu021_u:3552: nimnonnataṃ yathā citre dṛśyate na ca vidyate /
XXbsu021_u:3553: tathā bhāveṣu bhāvatvaṃ dṛśyate na ca vidyate // Lank_10.61 //
XXbsu021_u:3555: dṛśyaṃ khyāti tathā nityaṃ prajñayā ca na vidyate // Lank_10.62 //
XXbsu021_u:3558: skandhān pratītya saṃbuddho na dṛṣṭaḥ kenacitkvacit /
XXbsu021_u:3559: yo na dṛṣṭaḥ kvacitkena kutastasya vibhāvanā // Lank_10.64 //
XXbsu021_u:3563: svapnavibhramamāyākhyaṃ śūnyaṃ vai kalpitaṃ jagat // Lank_10.66 //
XXbsu021_u:3565: anutpannaṃ bhavaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣāntyanutpatti jāyate // Lank_10.67 //
XXbsu021_u:3567: abhijñā vaśitā tasya balā cittasya citritā // Lank_10.68 //
XXbsu021_u:3568: bhāvā yeṣāṃ hyanutpannāḥ śūnyā vai asvabhāvakāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:3571: cittaṃ hi khyāti cittasya bahirdhā khyāti rūpiṇaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:3572: anyanna vidyate dṛśyaṃ yathā bālairvikalpyate // Lank_10.70 //
XXbsu021_u:3573: saṃkalā buddhabimbaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ ca vidāraṇam /
XXbsu021_u:3574: adhiṣṭhanti jagaccitraṃ prajñaptyā vai suśikṣitāḥ // Lank_10.71 //
XXbsu021_u:3579: naiḥsvabhāvyaṃ hi bhāvānāṃ yadā budhyanti prajñayā /
XXbsu021_u:3589: nirvikalpāḥ pravartante tathā buddhasya buddhatā // Lank_10.78 //
XXbsu021_u:3595: na hyasti kanakaṃ tatra bhūmiśca kanakāyate // Lank_10.81 //
XXbsu021_u:3605: utpadyante nirudhyante pratyayā eva kalpitāḥ // Lank_10.85 //
XXbsu021_u:3612: na cotpadyā na cotpannāḥ pratyayo 'pi na kecana /
XXbsu021_u:3613: saṃvidyante kvacittena vyavahāraṃ tu kathyate // Lank_10.89 //
XXbsu021_u:3615: yattu bālā vikalpenti pratyayaiḥ saṃnivāryate // Lank_10.90 //
XXbsu021_u:3616: na svabhāvo na vijñaptirna vastu na ca ālayaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:3620: labhante te balābhijñāvaśitaiḥ saha saṃyutam // Lank_10.92 //
XXbsu021_u:3622: nātra cittaṃ na rūpāṇi bhrāntaṃ cittamanādikam // Lank_10.93 //
XXbsu021_u:3623: tadā yogī hyanābhāsaṃ prajñayā paśyate jagat /
XXbsu021_u:3625: atikramya tu putrā me nirvikalpāścaranti te // Lank_10.94 //
XXbsu021_u:3627: asatyāḥ satyataḥ khyānti tathā bhāveṣu bhāvanā // Lank_10.95 //
XXbsu021_u:3629: bhrāntiṃ kalpenti utpannāṃ bālāṃ kalpadvaye ratāḥ // Lank_10.96 //
XXbsu021_u:3633: tathākāśe ca kuḍye ca kasmānnābhipravartate // Lank_10.98 //
XXbsu021_u:3635: pratyayairjanitaṃ cittaṃ cittamātraṃ na yujyate // Lank_10.99 //
XXbsu021_u:3638: cittasya dharmatā śuddhā gagane nāsti vāsanā // Lank_10.100 //
XXbsu021_u:3640: bahirdhā nāsti vai dṛśyamato vai cittamātrakam // Lank_10.101 //
XXbsu021_u:3642: gṛhṇāti viṣayān yena vijñānaṃ hi taducyate // Lank_10.102 //
XXbsu021_u:3644: vartamānaṃ hi vijñānaṃ kuśalākuśalaṃ hi tat // Lank_10.103 //
XXbsu021_u:3648: etaddhi bhāṣitaṃ buddhairbhāṣante bhāṣayanti ca // Lank_10.105 //
XXbsu021_u:3649: cittaṃ hi bhūmayaḥ sapta nirābhāsā ca aṣṭamī /
XXbsu021_u:3650: dve bhūmayo vihāraśca śeṣā bhūmirmamātmikā // Lank_10.106 //
XXbsu021_u:3654: citrā manoharāḥ saumyāstribhavaṃ nirmiṇanti ye // Lank_10.108 //
XXbsu021_u:3656: tatra deśanti yānāni eṣā bhūmirmamātmikā // Lank_10.109 //
XXbsu021_u:3659: asattā caiva sattā ca dṛśyate ca vicitratā /
XXbsu021_u:3660: bālā grāhaviparyastā viparyāso hi citratā // Lank_10.111 //
XXbsu021_u:3661: nirvikalpaṃ yadi jñānaṃ vastvastīti na yujyate /
XXbsu021_u:3662: yasmāccittaṃ na rūpāṇi nirvikalpaṃ hi tena tat // Lank_10.112 //
XXbsu021_u:3664: kartā karma kriyā caiva sarvathāpi na vidyate // Lank_10.113 //
XXbsu021_u:3673: anutpattiṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ kṣaṇikārthaṃ vadāmyahyam // Lank_10.117 //
XXbsu021_u:3675: avyākṛtāni sarvāṇi taireva hi prakāśitam // Lank_10.118 //
XXbsu021_u:3678: sarvaṃ vidyati saṃvṛtyāṃ paramārthe na vidyate /
XXbsu021_u:3682: abhilāpasaṃbhavo bhāvo nāstīti ca na vidyate // Lank_10.121 //
XXbsu021_u:3687: niḥsvabhāvaṃ bhavettaddhi sarvathāpi na vidyate // Lank_10.123 //
XXbsu021_u:3692: māyāhastī yathā citraṃ patrāṇi kanakā yathā /
XXbsu021_u:3693: tathā dṛśyaṃ nṛṇāṃ khyāti citte ajñānavāsite // Lank_10.126 //
XXbsu021_u:3694: āryo na paśyate bhrāntiṃ nāpi tattvaṃ tadantare /
XXbsu021_u:3696: bhrāntiṃ vidhūya sarvāṃ tu nimittaṃ yadi jāyate /
XXbsu021_u:3697: saiva cāsya bhavedbhrāntiraśuddhaṃ timiraṃ yathā // Lank_10.128 //
XXbsu021_u:3704: bandho bandhyaśca baddhaśca ṣaḍete mokṣahetavaḥ // Lank_10.131 //
XXbsu021_u:3705: na bhūmayo na satyāni na kṣetrā na ca nirmitāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:3709: cittaṃ hi sarvaṃ sarvatra sarvadeheṣu vartate /
XXbsu021_u:3711: na hyātmā vidyate skandhe skandhāścaiva hi nātmani /
XXbsu021_u:3712: na te yathā vikalpyante na ca te vai na santi ca // Lank_10.135 //
XXbsu021_u:3714: yadi te bhavedyathādṛṣṭāḥ sarve syustattvadarśinaḥ // Lank_10.136 //
XXbsu021_u:3716: na ca te tathā yathādṛṣṭā na ca te vai na santi ca // Lank_10.137 //
XXbsu021_u:3721: vaipākikāśca ye buddhā jinā nairmāṇikāśca ye /
XXbsu021_u:3722: sattvāśca bodhisattvāśca kṣetrāṇi ca diśe diśe // Lank_10.140 //
XXbsu021_u:3724: sarve te hyamitābhasya sukhāvatyā vinirgatāḥ // Lank_10.141 //
XXbsu021_u:3728: yaddhi nairmāṇikābhāṣṭaṃ na tu vaipākikairjinaiḥ // Lank_10.143 //
XXbsu021_u:3729: anutpannā hyamī dharmā na caivaite na santi ca /
XXbsu021_u:3733: cittaṃ hi jāyate nānyaccittameva nirudhyate // Lank_10.145 //
XXbsu021_u:3734: arthābhāsaṃ nṛṇāṃ cittaṃ cittaṃ vai khyāti kalpitam /
XXbsu021_u:3741: tathatārambaṇaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyānaṃ tāthāgataṃ śubham // Lank_10.149 //
XXbsu021_u:3743: paratantraṃ samāśritya vikalpo bhramate nṛṇām // Lank_10.150 //
XXbsu021_u:3745: parāvṛttaṃ hi tathatā vihāraḥ kalpavarjitaḥ // Lank_10.151 //
XXbsu021_u:3746: mā vikalpaṃ vikalpetha vikalpo nāsti satyataḥ /
XXbsu021_u:3750: bāhyārthadarśanaṃ mithyā nāstyarthaṃ cittameva tu // Lank_10.153 //
XXbsu021_u:3752: bāhyo na vidyate hyartho yathā bālairvikalpyate // Lank_10.154 //
XXbsu021_u:3759: ghṛtakumbhe mūṣikā yadvatsaha śukreṇa vardhate // Lank_10.157 //
XXbsu021_u:3766: cakṣuṣā sphurate rūpaṃ vivṛddhiṃ yāti kalpanāt // Lank_10.160 //
XXbsu021_u:3768: vācā pravartate nṝṇāṃ śukasyeva vikalpanā // Lank_10.161 //
XXbsu021_u:3772: paścātkāle gate nāthe brūhi ko 'yaṃ dhariṣyati // Lank_10.163 //
XXbsu021_u:3774: mahāmate nibodha tvaṃ yo netrīṃ dhārayiṣyati // Lank_10.164 //
XXbsu021_u:3776: nāgāhvayaḥ sa nāmnā tu sadasatpakṣadārakaḥ // Lank_10.165 //
XXbsu021_u:3778: āsādya bhūmiṃ muditāṃ yāsyate 'sau sukhāvatīm // Lank_10.166 //
XXbsu021_u:3782: pratyayāntargataṃ bhāvaṃ ye kalpentyasti nāsti ca /
XXbsu021_u:3791: abhāvasvabhāvā ye tu te vikalpitalakṣaṇāḥ // Lank_10.172 //
XXbsu021_u:3796: nirvikalpaśca deśemi ye te niṣpannalakṣaṇāḥ // Lank_10.174 //
XXbsu021_u:3798: dvayāntapatitaṃ cittaṃ tasmātprajñā na kalpitā // Lank_10.175 //
XXbsu021_u:3799: asti nāsti ca dvāvantau yāvaccittasya gocaraḥ /
XXbsu021_u:3802: vidyate tathatāvasthā āryāṇāṃ gocaro yathā // Lank_10.177 //
XXbsu021_u:3803: bālānāṃ na tathā khyāti yathā khyāti manīṣiṇām /
XXbsu021_u:3804: manīṣiṇāṃ tathā khyāti sarvadharmā alakṣaṇāḥ // Lank_10.178 //
XXbsu021_u:3806: asuvarṇaṃ suvarṇābhaṃ tathā dharmāḥ kutārkikaiḥ // Lank_10.179 //
XXbsu021_u:3807: abhūtvā yasya cotpādo bhūtvā cāpi vinaśyati /
XXbsu021_u:3808: pratyayaiḥ sadasaccāpi na te me śāsane sthitāḥ // Lank_10.180 //
XXbsu021_u:3810: kāraṇakaravalloke na ca budhyanti tārkikāḥ // Lank_10.181 //
XXbsu021_u:3811: atīto vidyate bhāvo vidyate ca anāgataḥ /
XXbsu021_u:3814: antarābhavasaṃgrāhaṃ ye kalpanti na te budhāḥ // Lank_10.183 //
XXbsu021_u:3815: na pratītyasamutpannaṃ lokaṃ varṇanti vai jināḥ /
XXbsu021_u:3816: kiṃ tu pratyayamevāyaṃ loko gandharvasaṃnibhaḥ // Lank_10.184 //
XXbsu021_u:3818: saṃketācca pṛthagbhūto na jāto na nirudhyate // Lank_10.185 //
XXbsu021_u:3819: darpaṇe udake netre bhāṇḍeṣu ca maṇīṣu ca /
XXbsu021_u:3820: bimbaṃ hi dṛśyate teṣu na ca bimbo 'sti kutracit // Lank_10.186 //
XXbsu021_u:3821: bhāvābhāsaṃ tathā cittaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇā yathā nabhe /
XXbsu021_u:3822: dṛśyate citrarūpeṇa svapne vandhyauraso yathā // Lank_10.187 //
XXbsu021_u:3823: na me yānaṃ mahāyānaṃ na ghoṣo na ca akṣarāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:3824: na satyā na vimokṣā vai na nirābhāsagocaram // Lank_10.188 //
XXbsu021_u:3828: ekatvena pṛthaktvena bhāvo vai pratyaye na tu /
XXbsu021_u:3829: janma samāsamevoktaṃ nirodho nāśa eva hi // Lank_10.190 //
XXbsu021_u:3833: kāyo manomayaṃ citraṃ paryāyairdeśitaṃ mayā // Lank_10.192 //
XXbsu021_u:3835: granthato na tu arthena na te nairātmyamāśritāḥ // Lank_10.193 //
XXbsu021_u:3836: na tīrthikairna buddhaiśca na mayā na ca kenacit /
XXbsu021_u:3841: tasyāstināsti nopaiti viviktaṃ paśyato jagat // Lank_10.196 //
XXbsu021_u:3843: ye tu kalpenti te bhrāntā mṛgatṛṣṇāṃ yathā mṛgāḥ // Lank_10.197 //
XXbsu021_u:3845: nirhetukaṃ vikalpaṃ hi vikalpo 'pi na yujyate // Lank_10.198 //
XXbsu021_u:3846: ajale ca jalagrāho mṛgatṛṣṇā yathā nabhe /
XXbsu021_u:3847: dṛśyate 'rtho hi bālānāmāryāṇāṃ na viśeṣataḥ // Lank_10.199 //
XXbsu021_u:3853: śrāvakāṇāṃ ca deśemi tathā sāmānyalakṣaṇam // Lank_10.202 //
XXbsu021_u:3859: daśamī tu bhavetprathamī prathamī cāṣṭamī bhavet /
XXbsu021_u:3860: navamī saptamī cāpi saptamī cāṣṭamī bhavet // Lank_10.205 //
XXbsu021_u:3861: dvitīyā tu tṛtīyā syāccaturthī pañcamī bhavet /
XXbsu021_u:3862: tṛtīyā tu bhavetṣaṣṭhī nirābhāse kramaḥ kutaḥ // Lank_10.206 //
XXbsu021_u:3865: kathaṃ hyabhāvo bhāvānāṃ kurute samatāṃ katham /
XXbsu021_u:3866: yadā cittaṃ na jānāti bāhyamadhyātmikaṃ calam /
XXbsu021_u:3867: tadā tu kurute nāśaṃ samatācittadarśanāt // Lank_10.208 //
XXbsu021_u:3869: bālaiḥ kīla yathā kīlaṃ pralobhya vinivartate // Lank_10.209 //
XXbsu021_u:3871: hetuṃ dadāti cittasya vijñānaṃ ca samāśritam // Lank_10.210 //
XXbsu021_u:3873: labhyante yena vai svapne abhijñāśca caturvidhāḥ // Lank_10.211 //
XXbsu021_u:3874: svapne ca labhyate yacca yacca buddhaprasādataḥ /
XXbsu021_u:3877: bālā yadā na budhyante utpādaṃ deśayettadā // Lank_10.213 //
XXbsu021_u:3881: adṛśyaṃ dṛśyamānaṃ hi kasya kiṃ varṇyate kutaḥ // Lank_10.215 //
XXbsu021_u:3884: ālayo muñcate kāyaṃ manaḥ prārthayate gatim /
XXbsu021_u:3885: vijñānaṃ viṣayābhāsaṃ bhrāntiṃ dṛṣṭvā pralabhyate // Lank_10.217 //
XXbsu021_u:3886: madīyaṃ dṛśyate cittaṃ bāhyamarthaṃ na vidyate /
XXbsu021_u:3894: cittamātre visaṃmūḍhā bhāvaṃ kalpenti bāhiram // Lank_10.221 //
XXbsu021_u:3896: gūḍhabījaṃ bhavedbodhau svapne vai sidhyate tu yaḥ // Lank_10.222 //
XXbsu021_u:3897: kutra keṣāṃ kathaṃ kasmātkimarthaṃ ca vadāhi me /
XXbsu021_u:3901: vikalpo mano nāma vijñānaiḥ pañcabhiḥ saha /
XXbsu021_u:3903: yadā cittaṃ manaścāpi vijñānaṃ na pravartate /
XXbsu021_u:3904: tadā manomayaṃ kāyaṃ labhate buddhabhūmi ca // Lank_10.226 //
XXbsu021_u:3905: pratyayā dhātavaḥ skandhā dharmāṇāṃ ca svalakṣaṇam /
XXbsu021_u:3913: naiḥsvabhāvyaṃ ca bhāvaṃ ca śūnyā vai nityānityatā /
XXbsu021_u:3918: kuḍye sati yathā citraṃ parijñānānnirudhyate // Lank_10.233 //
XXbsu021_u:3924: na vāsanairbhidyate cittaṃ na cittaṃ vāsanaiḥ saha /
XXbsu021_u:3928: yathā na bhāvo nābhāvo gaganaṃ kathyate mayā /
XXbsu021_u:3929: ālayaṃ hi tathā kāye bhāvābhāvavivarjitam // Lank_10.238 //
XXbsu021_u:3933: cātuṣkoṭikayā muktaṃ bhavaṃ māyopamaṃ sadā // Lank_10.240 //
XXbsu021_u:3935: śeṣā bhaveyurniṣpannā bhūmayo buddhabhūmi ca // Lank_10.241 //
XXbsu021_u:3937: asmin kalevare sarvaṃ kathitaṃ cittagocaram // Lank_10.242 //
XXbsu021_u:3939: bhrāntiḥ svacittasaṃbodhānna pravartate na nivartate // Lank_10.243 //
XXbsu021_u:3941: māyādisadṛśaṃ paśyan lakṣaṇaṃ na vikalpayet // Lank_10.244 //
XXbsu021_u:3950: nityaṃ ca śāśvataṃ tattvaṃ gotraṃ vastusvabhāvakam /
XXbsu021_u:3952: yadyadvastu na śuddhiḥ syātsaṃkleśo nāpi kasyacit /
XXbsu021_u:3959: bahirdhā dṛśyate nṝṇāṃ na hi cittasya dharmatā // Lank_10.252 //
XXbsu021_u:3960: cittasya dharmatā śuddhā na cittaṃ bhrāntisaṃbhavam /
XXbsu021_u:3961: bhrāntiśca dauṣṭhulyamayī tena cittaṃ na dṛśyate // Lank_10.253 //
XXbsu021_u:3963: na saṃskāre na cānyatra kiṃ tu saṃskāradarśanāt // Lank_10.254 //
XXbsu021_u:3965: vidhūtaṃ hi bhavettena svacittaṃ paśyato jagat // Lank_10.255 //
XXbsu021_u:3969: nirābhāsasthito yogī mahāyānaṃ sa paśyati // Lank_10.257 //
XXbsu021_u:3971: jñānamanātmakaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ nirābhāse na paśyati // Lank_10.258 //
XXbsu021_u:3973: prajñāyā gocaraṃ paśyellakṣaṇe na pramuhyate // Lank_10.259 //
XXbsu021_u:3975: dve satye buddhabhūmiśca prajñā yatra pravartate // Lank_10.260 //
XXbsu021_u:3980: grāhyaṃ grāho grahītā ca nāsti nāma hyavastukam /
XXbsu021_u:3981: nirhetukaṃ vikalpaṃ ye manyanti hi na te budhāḥ // Lank_10.263 //
XXbsu021_u:3982: arthe nāma hyasaṃbhūtamartho nāmni tathaiva ca /
XXbsu021_u:3985: śūnyatāṃ śūnyatārthaṃ vā bālo 'paśyan vidhāvati // Lank_10.265 //
XXbsu021_u:3992: satyaṃ paraṃ hyavaktavyaṃ nirodhe dharmadarśanam // Lank_10.268 //
XXbsu021_u:3993: ālayaṃ hi samāśritya mano vai saṃpravartate /
XXbsu021_u:3994: cittaṃ manaśca saṃśritya vijñānaṃ saṃpravartate // Lank_10.269 //
XXbsu021_u:3997: manaśca lakṣaṇaṃ vastu nityānitye na manyate /
XXbsu021_u:3998: utpādaṃ cāpyanutpādaṃ yogī yoge na manyate // Lank_10.271 //
XXbsu021_u:4000: ekamarthaṃ dvicittena na jānīte tadudbhavam // Lank_10.272 //
XXbsu021_u:4001: na vaktā na ca vācyo 'sti na śūnyaṃ cittadarśanāt /
XXbsu021_u:4004: na dhātavo na ca skandhā na rāgo na ca saṃskṛtam // Lank_10.274 //
XXbsu021_u:4005: karmaṇo 'gniṃ na vai pūrvaṃ na kṛtaṃ na ca saṃskṛtam /
XXbsu021_u:4006: na koṭi na ca vai śaktirna mokṣo na ca bandhanam // Lank_10.275 //
XXbsu021_u:4007: avyākṛto na bhāvo 'sti dharmādharmaṃ na caiva hi /
XXbsu021_u:4008: na kālaṃ na ca nirvāṇaṃ dharmatāpi na vidyate // Lank_10.276 //
XXbsu021_u:4009: na ca buddho na satyāni na phalaṃ na ca hetavaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:4010: viparyayo na nirvāṇaṃ vibhavo nāsti saṃbhavaḥ // Lank_10.277 //
XXbsu021_u:4011: dvādaśāṅgaṃ na caivāsti antānantaṃ na caiva hi /
XXbsu021_u:4013: kleśāḥ karmapathā dehaḥ kartāraśca phalaṃ ca vai /
XXbsu021_u:4018: skandhā na santi nirvāṇe na caivātmā na lakṣaṇam /
XXbsu021_u:4021: cittaṃ hyadṛśyasaṃbhūtaṃ tena cittaṃ na dṛśyate // Lank_10.282 //
XXbsu021_u:4023: cittaṃ na bhāvo nābhāvo vāsane na virājate // Lank_10.283 //
XXbsu021_u:4024: malo vai khyāyate śukle na śukle khyāyate malaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:4025: ghane hi gaganaṃ yadvattathā cittaṃ na dṛśyate // Lank_10.284 //
XXbsu021_u:4026: cittena cīyate karma jñānena ca vicīyate /
XXbsu021_u:4027: prajñayā ca nirābhāsaṃ prabhāvaṃ cādhigacchati // Lank_10.285 //
XXbsu021_u:4029: nirābhāse viśeṣe ca jñānaṃ vai saṃpravartate // Lank_10.286 //
XXbsu021_u:4030: cittaṃ manaśca vijñānaṃ saṃjñā vai kalpavarjitā /
XXbsu021_u:4031: avikalpadharmatāṃ prāptāḥ śrāvakā na jinātmajāḥ // Lank_10.287 //
XXbsu021_u:4032: kṣānte kṣānte viśeṣe vai jñānaṃ tāthāgataṃ śubham /
XXbsu021_u:4035: kalpitaṃ gṛhyate bhrāntyā paratantraṃ na kalpyate // Lank_10.289 //
XXbsu021_u:4036: cittaṃ hyabhūtasaṃbhūtaṃ na cittaṃ dṛśyate kvacit /
XXbsu021_u:4040: prajñā hi trividhā mahyamāryaṃ yena prabhāvitam /
XXbsu021_u:4041: cittaṃ hyadṛśyasaṃbhūtaṃ tena cittaṃ na dṛśyate // Lank_10.292 //
XXbsu021_u:4043: lakṣaṇaṃ kalpate yena yaḥ svabhāvān vṛṇoti ca // Lank_10.293 //
XXbsu021_u:4050: vividhāgatirhi nirvṛttā yathā māyā na sidhyati /
XXbsu021_u:4051: nimittaṃ hi tathā citraṃ kalpyamānaṃ na sidhyati // Lank_10.296 //
XXbsu021_u:4054: ya eva kalpito bhāvaḥ paratantraṃ tadeva hi /
XXbsu021_u:4055: kalpitaṃ hi vicitrābhaṃ paratantraṃ vikalpyate // Lank_10.298 //
XXbsu021_u:4058: yathā hi yogināṃ vastu citramekaṃ virājate /
XXbsu021_u:4059: na hyasti citratā tatra tathā kalpitalakṣaṇam // Lank_10.300 //
XXbsu021_u:4061: timiraṃ na rūpaṃ nārūpaṃ paratantraṃ tathā budhaiḥ // Lank_10.301 //
XXbsu021_u:4062: hemaṃ syāttu yathā śuddhaṃ jalaṃ kaluṣavarjitam /
XXbsu021_u:4063: gaganaṃ hi ghanābhāvāttathā śuddhaṃ vikalpitam // Lank_10.302 //
XXbsu021_u:4067: citte citte tu sattvānāṃ buddhabimbaṃ vidṛśyate // Lank_10.304 //
XXbsu021_u:4068: nāsti vai kalpito bhāvaḥ paratantraṃ ca vidyate /
XXbsu021_u:4069: samāropāpavādaṃ ca vikalpaṃ no vinaśyati // Lank_10.305 //
XXbsu021_u:4075: tadā prajñāyate śuddhaḥ svabhāavaḥ pāramārthikaḥ // Lank_10.308 //
XXbsu021_u:4077: tathatā ca pratyātmagatimato nāsti viśeṣaṇam // Lank_10.309 //
XXbsu021_u:4078: pañca dharmā bhavettatvaṃ svabhāvā hi trayastathā /
XXbsu021_u:4081: cittaṃ saṃdṛśyate nṝṇāṃ dṛśyābhaṃ vāsanoditam // Lank_10.311 //
XXbsu021_u:4083: bhūtālabdhātmakā hyete na lakṣyaṃ na ca lakṣaṇam /
XXbsu021_u:4084: sarve bhūtamayā bhūtā yadi rūpaṃ hi bhautikam // Lank_10.312 //
XXbsu021_u:4086: kāraṇaṃ hi mahābhūtāḥ kāryaṃ bhūsalilādayaḥ // Lank_10.313 //
XXbsu021_u:4088: svapnagandharvarūpaṃ ca mṛgatṛṣṇā ca pañcamam // Lank_10.314 //
XXbsu021_u:4089: icchantikaṃ pañcavidhaṃ gotrāḥ pañca tathā bhavet /
XXbsu021_u:4090: pañca yānānyayānaṃ ca nirvāṇaṃ ṣaḍvidhaṃ bhavet // Lank_10.315 //
XXbsu021_u:4094: kṣetramekaṃ hi buddhānāṃ buddhaścaikastathā bhavet // Lank_10.317 //
XXbsu021_u:4096: nairātmyaṃ ṣaḍvidhaṃ mahyaṃ jñeyaṃ cāpi caturvidham // Lank_10.318 //
XXbsu021_u:4103: adhvatrayaṃ na caivāsti nityānityaṃ ca nāsti vai /
XXbsu021_u:4104: kriyā karma phalaṃ caiva svapnakāryaṃ tathā bhavet // Lank_10.322 //
XXbsu021_u:4108: sarvakṣetragatāścāpi dṛśyante na ca yonijāḥ // Lank_10.324 //
XXbsu021_u:4119: gavaiḍakāśca dāsā vai tathā hayagajādayaḥ // Lank_10.329 //
XXbsu021_u:4120: talpaviddhe na svaptavyaṃ bhūmiścāpi na lepayet /
XXbsu021_u:4121: sauvarṇarājataṃ pātraṃ kāṃsaṃ tāmraṃ na kārayet // Lank_10.330 //
XXbsu021_u:4123: kardamaiḥ phalapatraiśca śuklān yogī rajetsadā // Lank_10.331 //
XXbsu021_u:4124: śailīkaṃ mṛnmayaṃ lohaṃ śāṅkhaṃ vai sphaṭikamayam /
XXbsu021_u:4125: pātrārthaṃ dhārayedyogī paripūrṇaṃ ca māgadham // Lank_10.332 //
XXbsu021_u:4127: śilpavidyāṃ na śikṣeta yogī yogaparāyaṇaḥ // Lank_10.333 //
XXbsu021_u:4131: gṛhasthairna ca saṃsṛṣṭaṃ yoginaṃ taṃ vadāmyaham // Lank_10.335 //
XXbsu021_u:4132: śūnyāgāre śmaśāne vā vṛkṣamūle guhāsu vā /
XXbsu021_u:4133: palāle 'bhyavakāśe ca yogī vāsaṃ prakalpayet // Lank_10.336 //
XXbsu021_u:4137: kusumebhyo yathā bhramarāstathā piṇḍaṃ samācaret // Lank_10.338 //
XXbsu021_u:4138: gaṇe ca gaṇasaṃsṛṣṭe bhikṣuṇīṣu ca yadbhavet /
XXbsu021_u:4139: taddhi ājīvasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ na tatkalpati yoginām // Lank_10.339 //
XXbsu021_u:4144: vihāre yatra vai dhūmaḥ pacyate vidhivatsadā /
