XXbsu021_u:4145: uddiśya yatkṛtaṃ cāpi na tatkalpati yoginām // Lank_10.342 //
XXbsu021_u:4150: nacirāttu bhavedyogī yadyutpādaṃ na kalpayet // Lank_10.344 //
XXbsu021_u:4152: hetupratyayasaṃbhūtaṃ yogī lokaṃ na kalpayet // Lank_10.345 //
XXbsu021_u:4158: buddhāṃśca bodhisattvāṃśca namaskṛtya punaḥ punaḥ // Lank_10.348 //
XXbsu021_u:4160: pañcadharmasvacittaṃ ca nairātmyaṃ ca vibhāvayet // Lank_10.349 //
XXbsu021_u:4164: yogānārabhate citrāṃ gatvā śivapathīṃ śubhām // Lank_10.351 //
XXbsu021_u:4167: nimittāni ca citrāṇi tīrthyamārgaṃ nayanti te /
XXbsu021_u:4171: śiro hi tasya mārjanti nimittaṃ tathatānugāḥ // Lank_10.354 //
XXbsu021_u:4182: pratipanmadhyamā caiṣā mayā cānyaiśca deśitā // Lank_10.359 //
XXbsu021_u:4184: naiḥsvabhāvyaṃ ca bhāvānāṃ dvayametanna kalpayet // Lank_10.360 //
XXbsu021_u:4185: vikalpavṛttyā bhāvo na mokṣaṃ kalpenti bāliśāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:4194: anyathā kalpyamānaṃ hi tīrthyavādaḥ prasajyate // Lank_10.365 //
XXbsu021_u:4195: ajāḥ prasūtajanmā vai acyutāśca cyavanti ca /
XXbsu021_u:4197: ekadhā bahudhā bhūtvā varṣanti ca jvalanti vai /
XXbsu021_u:4198: citte cintamayā bhūtvā cittamātraṃ vadanti te // Lank_10.367 //
XXbsu021_u:4202: anyaiśca vividhai rūpaiścittamātraṃ vadanti te // Lank_10.369 //
XXbsu021_u:4204: rūpaṃ darśyanti sattvānāṃ cittamātrasya kāraṇam // Lank_10.370 //
XXbsu021_u:4205: māyopamaṃ samādhiṃ ca kāyaṃ cāpi manomayam /
XXbsu021_u:4206: daśa bhūmīśca vaśitāḥ parāvṛttā labhanti te // Lank_10.371 //
XXbsu021_u:4210: nimittaṃ paratantraṃ hi yannāma tatra kalpitam /
XXbsu021_u:4212: buddhyā vivecyamānaṃ hi na tantraṃ nāpi kalpitam /
XXbsu021_u:4213: niṣpanno nāsti vai bhāvaḥ kathaṃ buddhyā prakalpyate // Lank_10.374 //
XXbsu021_u:4215: bhāvābhāvavinirmuktau dvau svabhāvau kathaṃ bhavet // Lank_10.375 //
XXbsu021_u:4216: parikalpite svabhāve ca svabhāvau dvau pratiṣṭhitau /
XXbsu021_u:4219: anyathā kalpyamānaṃ hi tīrthyavādaṃ samāśrayet // Lank_10.377 //
XXbsu021_u:4222: kṣetraṃ buddhāśca nirmāṇā ekaṃ yānaṃ trayaṃ tathā /
XXbsu021_u:4223: na nirvāṇamahaṃ sarve śūnyā utpattivarjitāḥ // Lank_10.379 //
XXbsu021_u:4226: yathā hi kalpitaṃ bhāvaṃ khyāyate citradarśanam /
XXbsu021_u:4227: na hyasti citratā tatra buddhadharmaṃ tathā jagat // Lank_10.381 //
XXbsu021_u:4228: dharmabuddho bhavedbuddhaḥ śeṣā vai tasya nirmitāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:4231: vikalpā tathatā nānyā na nimittā vikalpanā // Lank_10.383 //
XXbsu021_u:4233: ṣaṭtriṃśakaṃ buddhagaṇaṃ buddhaḥ svābhāviko bhavet // Lank_10.384 //
XXbsu021_u:4234: nīle rakte 'tha lavaṇe śaṅkhe kṣīre ca śārkare /
XXbsu021_u:4235: kaṣāyaiḥ phalapuṣpādyaiḥ kiraṇā yatha bhāskare // Lank_10.385 //
XXbsu021_u:4236: na cānye na ca nānanye taraṃgā hyudadhāviva /
XXbsu021_u:4237: vijñānāni tathā sapta cittena saha saṃyutā // Lank_10.386 //
XXbsu021_u:4239: ālayaṃ hi tathā citraṃ vijñānākhyaṃ pravartate // Lank_10.387 //
XXbsu021_u:4242: abhinnalakṣaṇānyaṣṭau na ca lakṣyaṃ na lakṣaṇam // Lank_10.388 //
XXbsu021_u:4244: vijñānānāṃ tathā citte pariṇāmo na labhyate // Lank_10.389 //
XXbsu021_u:4245: cittena cīyate karma manasā ca vicīyate /
XXbsu021_u:4246: vijñānena vijānāti dṛśyaṃ kalpeti pañcabhiḥ // Lank_10.390 //
XXbsu021_u:4250: vṛttiśca varṇyate citte lakṣaṇārthaṃ hi bāliśāḥ // Lank_10.392 //
XXbsu021_u:4251: na tasya vidyate vṛttiḥ svacittaṃ grāhyavarjitam /
XXbsu021_u:4252: grāhye sati hi vai grāhastaraṃgaiḥ saha sādhyate // Lank_10.393 //
XXbsu021_u:4256: ālayasya tathā vṛttiḥ kasmādbuddhyā na gṛhyate // Lank_10.395 //
XXbsu021_u:4260: tathā tvaṃ lokapradyota tattvaṃ deśesi bāliśān // Lank_10.397 //
XXbsu021_u:4262: bhāṣase yadi tattvaṃ vai tattvaṃ citte na vidyate // Lank_10.398 //
XXbsu021_u:4267: pañcānāṃ khyāyate dṛśyaṃ kramo nāsti samāhite // Lank_10.400 //
XXbsu021_u:4269: citrārthe nāmayedraṅgaṃ deśanāpi tathā mama // Lank_10.401 //
XXbsu021_u:4270: raṅge na vidyate citraṃ na kuḍye na ca bhājane /
XXbsu021_u:4274: kṛtvā dharme vyavasthānaṃ tattvaṃ deśemi yoginām // Lank_10.403 //
XXbsu021_u:4277: vicitrā hi yathā māyā dṛśyate na ca vidyate /
XXbsu021_u:4278: deśanā hi tathā citrā dṛśyate 'vyabhicāriṇī // Lank_10.405 //
XXbsu021_u:4281: buddhā hi tadvatsattvānāṃ cittamātraṃ vadanti te // Lank_10.406 //
XXbsu021_u:4283: tantraṃ hi yena gṛhṇāti yadgṛhṇāti sa kalpitam // Lank_10.407 //
XXbsu021_u:4285: dvidhā pravartate bhrāntistṛtīyaṃ nāsti kāraṇam // Lank_10.408 //
XXbsu021_u:4293: saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtaṃ nityaṃ kalpyate na ca vidyate // Lank_10.412 //
XXbsu021_u:4295: asanto vā vidṛśyante paratantraṃ tathā bhavet // Lank_10.413 //
XXbsu021_u:4298: cittaṃ manaśca vijñānaṃ nairātmyaṃ syāddvayaṃ tathā /
XXbsu021_u:4299: pañca dharmāḥ svabhāvā hi buddhānāṃ gocaro hyayam // Lank_10.415 //
XXbsu021_u:4301: raṅgaṃ hi yathāpyekaṃ kuḍye citraṃ vidṛśyate // Lank_10.416 //
XXbsu021_u:4303: pañca dharmāḥ svabhāvā hi mama gotre na santi te // Lank_10.417 //
XXbsu021_u:4307: kāyena vācā manasā na tatra kriyate śubham /
XXbsu021_u:4310: kāyaṃ manomayaṃ cittaṃ gotraṃ tāthāgataṃ śubham // Lank_10.420 //
XXbsu021_u:4312: aṣṭamī buddhabhūmiśca gotraṃ tāthāgataṃ bhavet // Lank_10.421 //
XXbsu021_u:4314: etaddhi gotraṃ buddhānāṃ śeṣā yānadvayāvahā // Lank_10.422 //
XXbsu021_u:4316: deśyante bhūmayaḥ sapta buddhaiścittavaśaṃ gatāḥ // Lank_10.423 //
XXbsu021_u:4320: kurvanti jinaputrā vai nṛpatvaṃ ca bhavālaye // Lank_10.425 //
XXbsu021_u:4324: pratyekaśrāvakāṇāṃ ca deśanā na jinaurasām // Lank_10.427 //
XXbsu021_u:4325: saccāsacca sato naiva kṣaṇikaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ na vai /
XXbsu021_u:4327: bhāvā vidyanti saṃvṛtyā paramārthe na bhāvakāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:4332: abhilāpasaṃbhavo bhāvo dṛṣṭvā vai nāsti vidyate // Lank_10.431 //
XXbsu021_u:4334: ālayaṃ tu tathā śuddhaṃ taraṃge na virājate // Lank_10.432 //
XXbsu021_u:4336: vijñānapañcakaiḥ sārdhaṃ dṛśyaṃ kalpati raṅgavat // Lank_10.433 //
XXbsu021_u:4339: buddhā hyete bhavetpaurāḥ śeṣā nirmāṇavigrahāḥ // Lank_10.434 //
XXbsu021_u:4340: dṛśyaṃ na vidyate cittaṃ cittaṃ dṛśyātpramuhyate /
XXbsu021_u:4343: nairātmyaṃ dvitayaṃ śuddhaṃ prabhāṣante vināyakāḥ // Lank_10.436 //
XXbsu021_u:4345: yaṃ deśayanti vai nāthā pratyātmagatigocaram // Lank_10.437 //
XXbsu021_u:4348: aṇuśo vibhajya dravyaṃ na vai rūpaṃ vikalpayet /
XXbsu021_u:4350: mā śūnyatāṃ vikalpetha māśūnyamiti vā punaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:4351: nāstyasti kalpanaiveyaṃ kalpyamarthaṃ na vidyate // Lank_10.440 //
XXbsu021_u:4353: ekaikamaṇuśo nāsti ato 'pyarthaṃ na vidyate // Lank_10.441 //
XXbsu021_u:4355: bāhyaṃ na vidyate dṛśyamato 'pyarthaṃ na vidyate // Lank_10.442 //
XXbsu021_u:4356: citraṃ keśoṇḍukaṃ māyāṃ svapna gandharvameva ca /
XXbsu021_u:4357: alātaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇā ca asantaṃ khyāyate nṛṇām // Lank_10.443 //
XXbsu021_u:4365: tathā ca śrāvako mūḍho lakṣaṇena pravāhyate // Lank_10.447 //
XXbsu021_u:4366: niṣṭhāgatirna tattasyā na ca bhūyo nivartate /
XXbsu021_u:4367: samādhikāyaṃ saṃprāpya ā kalpānna prabudhyate // Lank_10.448 //
XXbsu021_u:4372: tathā te buddhadharmākhyaṃ kāyaṃ prāpsyanti māmakam // Lank_10.450 //
XXbsu021_u:4373: paṅkamagno yathā hastī itastato na dhāvati /
XXbsu021_u:4374: samādhimadamagnā vai tathā tiṣṭhanti śrāvakāḥ // Lank_10.451 //
XXbsu021_u:4376: abhiṣekasamādhyādyaṃ prathamā daśamī ca vai // Lank_10.452 //
XXbsu021_u:4377: ākāśaṃ śaśaśṛṅgaṃ ca vandhyāyāḥ putra eva ca /
XXbsu021_u:4382: niṣpannaṃ tathatetyuktaṃ sūtre sūtre sadā mayā // Lank_10.455 //
XXbsu021_u:4383: vyañjanaṃ padakāyaṃ ca nāma cāpi viśeṣataḥ /
XXbsu021_u:4384: bālāḥ sajanti durmedhā yathā paṅke mahāgajāḥ // Lank_10.456 //
XXbsu021_u:4386: tāthāgataṃ ca pratyekaṃ yānānyetān vadāmyaham // Lank_10.457 //
XXbsu021_u:4387: yānānāṃ nāsti vai niṣṭhā yāvaccittaṃ pravartate /
XXbsu021_u:4388: citte tu vai parāvṛtte na yānaṃ na ca yāyinaḥ // Lank_10.458 //
XXbsu021_u:4390: ālayaṃ tribhavaśceṣṭā ete cittasya paryayāḥ // Lank_10.459 //
XXbsu021_u:4393: cittena dhāryate kāyo mano manyati vai sadā /
XXbsu021_u:4394: vijñānaṃ cittaviṣayaṃ vijñānaiḥ saha chindati // Lank_10.461 //
XXbsu021_u:4395: tṛṣṇā hi mātā ityuktā avidyā ca tathā pitā /
XXbsu021_u:4402: siddhāntaśca nayaścāpi pratyātmaṃ śāsanaṃ ca vai /
XXbsu021_u:4403: ye paśyanti vibhāgajñā na te tarkavaśaṃ gatāḥ // Lank_10.465 //
XXbsu021_u:4404: na bhāvo vidyate satyaṃ yathā bālairvikalpyate /
XXbsu021_u:4405: abhāvena tu vai mokṣaṃ kathaṃ necchanti tārkikāḥ // Lank_10.466 //
XXbsu021_u:4407: dṛṣṭidvayaṃ prapuṣṇanti na ca jānanti pratyayān // Lank_10.467 //
XXbsu021_u:4410: rāgo na vidyate dveṣo mohaścāpi na pudgalaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:4411: tṛṣṇāyā hyuditāḥ skandhā vidyante svapnasādṛśāḥ // Lank_10.469 //
XXbsu021_u:4412: yasyāṃ ca rātryāṃ dhigamo yasyāṃ ca parinirvṛtaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:4415: taiśca buddhairmayā caiva na ca kiṃcidviśeṣitam // Lank_10.471 //
XXbsu021_u:4417: skandhā vidyanti bhāvena ātmā teṣu na vidyate // Lank_10.472 //
XXbsu021_u:4419: mucyate sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ svacittaṃ paśyato jagat // Lank_10.473 //
XXbsu021_u:4421: cātuṣkoṭikayā yukto na te mannayakovidāḥ // Lank_10.474 //
XXbsu021_u:4425: tadā vyāvartate cittaṃ nairātmyaṃ cādhigacchati // Lank_10.476 //
XXbsu021_u:4427: kāryaṃ hi pratyayāḥ sarve na kāryājjāyate bhavaḥ // Lank_10.477 //
XXbsu021_u:4428: kāryaṃ na jāyate kāryaṃ dvitvaṃ kārye prasajyate /
XXbsu021_u:4431: nimittaṃ cittamātraṃ hi cittamātraṃ vadāmyaham // Lank_10.479 //
XXbsu021_u:4434: niṣṭhābhāvaparaṃ brahma etāṃ mātrāṃ vadāmyaham // Lank_10.480 //
XXbsu021_u:4435: prajñaptisatyato hyātmā dravyaḥ sa hi na vidyate /
XXbsu021_u:4436: skandhānāṃ skandhatā tadvatprajñaptyā na tu dravyataḥ // Lank_10.481 //
XXbsu021_u:4444: kāyaṃ manomayaṃ cittaṃ cittamātraṃ vadāmyaham // Lank_10.485 //
XXbsu021_u:4446: bahirdhā jāyate nṝṇāṃ cittamātraṃ hi laukikam // Lank_10.486 //
XXbsu021_u:4447: dṛśyaṃ na vidyate bāhyaṃ cittacitraṃ vidṛśyate /
XXbsu021_u:4451: bahirdhā nāsti vai rūpaṃ svacittaṃ dṛśyate bahiḥ /
XXbsu021_u:4455: na hetavo na koṭyo vai dṛṣṭāntāvayavāni ca /
XXbsu021_u:4456: svacittaṃ hyarthasaṃkrāntaṃ yadi jānanti paṇḍitāḥ // Lank_10.491 //
XXbsu021_u:4458: kalpitaṃ ca samāśritya vikalpaḥ saṃpravartate // Lank_10.492 //
XXbsu021_u:4462: yadarthābhāḥ pravartante svabhāvakalpito hi saḥ // Lank_10.494 //
XXbsu021_u:4466: yathā hi darpaṇe bimbaṃ keśoṇḍustimirasya vā /
XXbsu021_u:4467: tathā hi vāsanaiśchannaṃ cittaṃ paśyanti bāliśāḥ // Lank_10.496 //
XXbsu021_u:4469: artho na vidyate bāhyo yathā tīrthyairvikalpyate // Lank_10.497 //
XXbsu021_u:4470: rajjuṃ yathā hyajānānāḥ sarpaṃ gṛhṇanti bāliśāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:4473: kiṃ tu svacittadoṣo 'yaṃ yena rajjurvikalpyate // Lank_10.499 //
XXbsu021_u:4474: na hi yo yena bhāvena kalpyamāno na lakṣyate /
XXbsu021_u:4477: ato nāsti na gantavyaṃ astitvaṃ na ca kalpayet // Lank_10.501 //
XXbsu021_u:4478: kalpitaṃ kalpyamānaṃ hi yadidaṃ na tadātmakam /
XXbsu021_u:4479: anātmakaṃ kathaṃ dṛṣṭvā vikalpaḥ saṃpravartate // Lank_10.502 //
XXbsu021_u:4481: avidyamāne dṛśye tu vikalpastena jāyate // Lank_10.503 //
XXbsu021_u:4483: bhāvānāṃ bhāvatā kena bhrāmitā brūhi me mune // Lank_10.504 //
XXbsu021_u:4484: bhāvānāṃ bhāvatā nāsti cittamātraṃ ca dṛśyate /
XXbsu021_u:4486: kalpitaṃ yadi vai nāsti yathā kalpati bāliśaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:4487: anyathā vidyate cāsau na ca buddhyāvagamyate // Lank_10.506 //
XXbsu021_u:4488: āryāṇāṃ yadi vā so 'sti nāsau bālairvikalpitaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:4489: āryāṇāmatha mithyāsau āryā bālaiḥ samaṃ gatāḥ // Lank_10.507 //
XXbsu021_u:4493: etaddhi putra mā kranda gṛhṇa citramidaṃ phalam // Lank_10.509 //
XXbsu021_u:4496: abhūtvā yasya vai bhāvaḥ pratyayairna ca saṃkulaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:4499: alabdhātmakaṃ hyajātaṃ ca pratyayairna vinā kvacit /
XXbsu021_u:4500: utpannamapi te bhāvo pratyayairna vinā kvacit // Lank_10.512 //
XXbsu021_u:4504: pratyayairna ca jānanti māyāsvapnopamaṃ jagat // Lank_10.514 //
XXbsu021_u:4506: arthaṃ sunītaṃ hi mayā na ca budhyanti bāliśāḥ // Lank_10.515 //
XXbsu021_u:4508: vyabhicaranti te hyarthaṃ yasmāttarkeṇa deśitāḥ // Lank_10.516 //
XXbsu021_u:4509: lakṣaṇaṃ bhāva saṃsthānaṃ nāma caiva caturvidham /
XXbsu021_u:4512: somabhāskarayorbhāvā ye nāśenti na te sutāḥ // Lank_10.518 //
XXbsu021_u:4515: eṣā hi mudrā muktānāṃ putrāṇāṃ mama śāsane /
XXbsu021_u:4518: nityānityaṃ na prāpnoti saṃsāraśca na vidyate // Lank_10.521 //
XXbsu021_u:4521: pradhvaṃsi patitaṃ rūpaṃ vijñānaṃ ca bhavālaye /
XXbsu021_u:4522: rūpavijñānasaṃbaddhaṃ na ca karma vinaśyati // Lank_10.523 //
XXbsu021_u:4523: atha taiḥ saha saṃbaddhaṃ karma vai dhvasyate nṛṇām /
XXbsu021_u:4524: dhvaste tu karmasaṃbandhe na saṃsṛtirna nirvṛtiḥ // Lank_10.524 //
XXbsu021_u:4525: atha dhvastamapi taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃsāre yadi jāyate /
XXbsu021_u:4527: nābhinnaṃ na ca vai bhinnaṃ cittaṃ rūpaṃ vikalpanāt /
XXbsu021_u:4533: nāstyasti kathaṃ bhavati rūpe cānityatā yathā // Lank_10.528 //
XXbsu021_u:4536: kalpitaṃ hi vināśete mama netrī vinaśyate /
XXbsu021_u:4537: samāropāpavādaṃ ca kurvate mama śāsane // Lank_10.530 //
XXbsu021_u:4539: sarve ca te hyasaṃkathyā mama netrīvināśakāḥ // Lank_10.531 //
XXbsu021_u:4544: nāsau śikṣati buddhānāṃ yasteṣāṃ saṃgrahe caret /
XXbsu021_u:4545: dvayāntapatitā hyete anyeṣāṃ ca vināśakāḥ // Lank_10.534 //
XXbsu021_u:4546: viviktaṃ kalpitaṃ bhāvaṃ ye tu paśyanti yoginaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:4547: bhāvābhāvavinirmuktaṃ teṣāṃ vai saṃgrahe caret // Lank_10.535 //
XXbsu021_u:4550: tathā hi sattvagotrāṇi citrā vai karmavarjitā /
XXbsu021_u:4551: dṛśyābhāvānna karmāsti na ca vai karmajā gatiḥ // Lank_10.537 //
XXbsu021_u:4553: kiṃ tu vidyanti vai bhāvā yathā bālairvikalpitāḥ // Lank_10.538 //
XXbsu021_u:4554: yadi bhāvā va vidyante yathā bālairvikalpitāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:4555: asatsu sattvabhāveṣu saṃkleśo nāsti kasyacit // Lank_10.539 //
XXbsu021_u:4558: yeṣāṃ tu bhāvo vai nāsti yathā bālairvikalpitaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:4559: teṣāṃ na vidyate vṛttirindriyāṇāṃ na yoginaḥ // Lank_10.541 //
XXbsu021_u:4562: ayaṃ tena bhavenmokṣo bālānāṃ kriyavarjitaḥ // Lank_10.542 //
XXbsu021_u:4564: āryāṇāṃ nāsti vai bhāvo vimokṣatrayacāriṇām // Lank_10.543 //
XXbsu021_u:4572: kalpito nāsti vai bhāvaḥ kalpayiṣyanti tārkikāḥ // Lank_10.547 //
XXbsu021_u:4576: nava dravyāṇi nityāni kudṛṣṭyā deśayiṣyati // Lank_10.549 //
XXbsu021_u:4578: bhāvānāṃ bhāvatāmanyāṃ satīṃ vai nāśayiṣyati // Lank_10.550 //
XXbsu021_u:4580: pūrvā ca koṭirnaivāsti saṃsārasya vadāmyaham // Lank_10.551 //
XXbsu021_u:4585: paṭaiśca vai kaṭo nāsti paṭo vai vīraṇaistathā /
XXbsu021_u:4586: eka ekatrā saṃbhūtaḥ pratyayaiḥ kiṃ na jāyate // Lank_10.554 //
XXbsu021_u:4588: paravādā hyamī sarve mayā ca samudāhṛtāḥ // Lank_10.555 //
XXbsu021_u:4590: nivārya tu matisteṣāṃ svapakṣaṃ deśayāmyaham // Lank_10.556 //
XXbsu021_u:4592: mā me śiṣyagaṇo mūḍhaḥ sadasatpakṣamāśrayet // Lank_10.557 //
XXbsu021_u:4595: śiṣyebhyaḥ saṃprakāśeti guṇānāṃ ca vikāritā // Lank_10.558 //
XXbsu021_u:4596: na bhūtaṃ nāpi cābhūtaṃ pratyayairna ca pratyayāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:4601: ahetukaṃ sadā paśyan vikalpo na pravartate // Lank_10.561 //
XXbsu021_u:4605: vastu na vidyate paśyaṃścittamātraṃ na vidyate /
XXbsu021_u:4606: avastukaṃ kathaṃ cittaṃ cittamātraṃ na yujyate // Lank_10.563 //
XXbsu021_u:4608: ahetukaṃ kathaṃ cittaṃ cittamātraṃ na yujyate // Lank_10.564 //
XXbsu021_u:4610: vidyante na ca vidyante na te mannayakovidāḥ // Lank_10.565 //
XXbsu021_u:4612: etaddhi laukikaṃ cittaṃ cittamātraṃ na yujyate // Lank_10.566 //
XXbsu021_u:4614: dvicittatā prasajyeta na ca cittaṃ dvilakṣaṇam // Lank_10.567 //
XXbsu021_u:4615: svadhāraṃ hi yathā khaḍgaṃ svāgraṃ vai aṅguliryathā /
XXbsu021_u:4616: na chindate na spṛśate tathā cittaṃ svadarśane // Lank_10.568 //
XXbsu021_u:4617: na paraṃ na ca vai tantraṃ kalpitaṃ vastumeva ca /
XXbsu021_u:4618: pañca dharmā dvicittaṃ ca nirābhāse na santi vai // Lank_10.569 //
XXbsu021_u:4620: utpādakaṃ hi saṃdhāya naiḥsvabhāvyaṃ vadāmyaham // Lank_10.570 //
XXbsu021_u:4621: atha vaicitryasaṃsthāne kalpā ca yadi jāyate /
XXbsu021_u:4622: ākāśe śaśaśṛṅge ca arthābhāsaṃ bhaviṣyati // Lank_10.571 //
XXbsu021_u:4624: na ca vai kalpito hyarthaścittādanyo 'bhilapyate // Lank_10.572 //
XXbsu021_u:4626: anādimati saṃsāre artho vai nāsti kutracit /
XXbsu021_u:4627: apuṣṭaṃ hi kathaṃ cittamarthābhāsaṃ pravartate // Lank_10.573 //
XXbsu021_u:4629: na cābhāvena vai puṣṭo vikalpaḥ saṃpravartate // Lank_10.574 //
XXbsu021_u:4630: yathāpi dānīṃ naivāsti tathā pūrve 'pi nāstyasau /
XXbsu021_u:4631: anarthe arthasaṃbaddhaṃ kathaṃ cittaṃ pravartate // Lank_10.575 //
XXbsu021_u:4637: anādāvapi nāstyartho viśeṣaḥ kena jāyate // Lank_10.578 //
XXbsu021_u:4639: arthābhāve kathaṃ cittaṃ jāyate brūhi me mune // Lank_10.579 //
XXbsu021_u:4640: ahetukamidaṃ sarvaṃ na cittaṃ na ca gocaraḥ /
XXbsu021_u:4641: na ca vai puṣyate cittaṃ tribhavaṃ kriyavarjitam // Lank_10.580 //
XXbsu021_u:4644: anutpannamidaṃ sarvaṃ na ca bhāvā na santi ca // Lank_10.581 //
XXbsu021_u:4646: anutpannān svabhāvāṃśca śūnyāḥ kena vadāsi me // Lank_10.582 //
XXbsu021_u:4650: ahetukā pi dṛśyante tathā lokavicitratā // Lank_10.584 //
XXbsu021_u:4652: na tu tīrthyadṛṣṭyā pralayo samavāyo na vidyate // Lank_10.585 //
XXbsu021_u:4654: anutpādaiḥ prasādhyante mama netrī na naśyati // Lank_10.586 //
XXbsu021_u:4656: kathaṃ kena kutaḥ kutra saṃbhavo 'hetuko bhavet // Lank_10.587 //
XXbsu021_u:4661: atha bhāvasya nāmedaṃ nirarthaṃ vā bravīhi me // Lank_10.589 //
XXbsu021_u:4662: na ca bhāvo hyanutpādo na ca pratyayalakṣaṇam /
XXbsu021_u:4663: na ca bhāvasya nāmedaṃ na ca nāma nirarthakam // Lank_10.590 //
XXbsu021_u:4672: na bāhyabhāvaṃ bhāvānāṃ na ca cittaparigraham /
XXbsu021_u:4675: na jātu śūnyayā śūnyā kiṃ tvanutpādaśūnyayā // Lank_10.596 //
XXbsu021_u:4677: kalapācca pṛthagbhūtaṃ na jātaṃ na nirudhyate // Lank_10.597 //
XXbsu021_u:4678: bhāvo na vidyate hyanyaḥ kalāpācca pṛthak kvacit /
XXbsu021_u:4681: anyatra hi kalāpo 'yaṃ pravartate nivartate // Lank_10.599 //
XXbsu021_u:4685: deśemi saṃkalāmātraṃ na ca bālairvibhāvyate // Lank_10.601 //
XXbsu021_u:4686: yasya janyo hi bhāvo 'sti saṃkalāyāḥ pṛthak kvacit /
XXbsu021_u:4689: yasya bhāvo bhavetkaścitsaṃkalāyāḥ pṛthak kvacit // Lank_10.603 //
XXbsu021_u:4692: saṃkalāyāḥ pṛthagbhūto yo dharmaḥ kalpito 'budhaiḥ // Lank_10.604 //
XXbsu021_u:4694: yaśca tasya anutpādaṃ tadanutpādakṣāntiḥ syāt // Lank_10.605 //
XXbsu021_u:4699: parato yasya vai bhāvaḥ pratyayairjāyate kvacit /
XXbsu021_u:4700: na saṃkalāmātramevedaṃ na te yuktyāgame sthitāḥ // Lank_10.608 //
XXbsu021_u:4701: yadi janyo na bhāvo 'sti syādbuddhiḥ kasya pratyayāt /
XXbsu021_u:4702: anyonyapratyayā hyete te tena pratyayāḥ smṛtāḥ // Lank_10.609 //
XXbsu021_u:4704: kalāpo 'yaṃ na dharmo 'sti ato vai niḥsvabhāvatā // Lank_10.610 //
XXbsu021_u:4706: na tu śāstrasya bhedo 'sti doṣabhedastu vidyate // Lank_10.611 //
XXbsu021_u:4708: indriyāṇāṃ balaṃ jñātvā nayaṃ deśemi bāliśān // Lank_10.612 //
XXbsu021_u:4712: yaddhetusamutpannaṃ sa ca nāsti te 'vagantavyam // Lank_10.614 //
XXbsu021_u:4713: astitvasādhakaṃ nāsti nāsti nāsti na yujyate /
XXbsu021_u:4715: kiṃcidāśritya punaḥ kiṃcitkhyāyate yasya vai matam /
XXbsu021_u:4716: ahetukaṃ yadāśritya kiṃciccāhetukaṃ na tu // Lank_10.616 //
XXbsu021_u:4718: anavasthā prasajyeta kiṃcicca kiṃ ca no bhavet // Lank_10.617 //
XXbsu021_u:4720: vastu tadvatsamāśritya vaicitryaṃ khyāyate nṛṇām // Lank_10.618 //
XXbsu021_u:4722: māyājālaṃ na parṇāni na kāṣṭhaṃ na ca śarkarā /
XXbsu021_u:4725: dṛśyakāle dvayaṃ nāsti kathaṃ kiṃcidvikalpyate // Lank_10.620 //
XXbsu021_u:4727: vikalpe hyavidyamāne tu na saṃsṛtirna nirvṛtiḥ // Lank_10.621 //
XXbsu021_u:4728: vikalpe hyavidyamāne tu vikalpo na pravartate /
XXbsu021_u:4729: apravṛttiṃ kathaṃ cittaṃ cittamātraṃ na yujyate // Lank_10.622 //
XXbsu021_u:4731: sārābhāvānna mokṣo 'sti na ca lokavicitratā // Lank_10.623 //
XXbsu021_u:4732: bāhyaṃ na vidyate dṛśyaṃ yathā bālairvikalpyate /
XXbsu021_u:4741: kasyaite deśitā buddhaistvayā ca prativarṇitāḥ // Lank_10.628 //
XXbsu021_u:4743: buddhā deśenti vai yogaṃ mayā ca prativarṇitāḥ // Lank_10.629 //
XXbsu021_u:4745: gamanāgamanaṃ kena dṛśyate bhūtale nṛṇām // Lank_10.630 //
XXbsu021_u:4748: tathā hi dehinaḥ sarve vikalpena samīritāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:4749: svacitte caṃkramante te gagane śukaniryathā // Lank_10.632 //
XXbsu021_u:4751: ābhā vṛttiḥ kathaṃ kena cittamātraṃ vadāhi me // Lank_10.633 //
XXbsu021_u:4757: nāma nāmni visaṃyuktaṃ yadā paśyati kalpitam /
XXbsu021_u:4760: ye tvanyathāvabudhyante na te buddhā na bodhakāḥ // Lank_10.637 //
XXbsu021_u:4761: pañca dharmāḥ svabhāvāśca vijñānānyaṣṭa eva ca /
XXbsu021_u:4763: yadā buddhiśca boddhavyaṃ viviktaṃ paśyate jagat /
XXbsu021_u:4764: nāsti nāma vikalpaśca tadā nābhipravartate // Lank_10.639 //
XXbsu021_u:4767: catvāro 'rūpiṇaḥ skandhāḥ saṃkhyā teṣāṃ na vidyate /
XXbsu021_u:4769: lakṣaṇasya parityāgānna bhūtaṃ na ca bhautikam /
XXbsu021_u:4775: ālayaṃ hi manasyātmā ātmīyaṃ jñānameva ca /
XXbsu021_u:4778: tadā dvayaṃ na kalpanti ātmā cātmīyameva ca // Lank_10.646 //
XXbsu021_u:4779: apravṛttaṃ na puṣṇāti na ca vijñānakāraṇam /
XXbsu021_u:4781: vikalpaṃ cittamātraṃ ca lokaṃ kena vadāhi me /
XXbsu021_u:4787: astitvaṃ hi kathaṃ tasya cittagrāhānna jāyate // Lank_10.650 //
XXbsu021_u:4788: vikalpo na bhāvo nābhāvo ato 'stitvaṃ na jāyate /
XXbsu021_u:4791: nivārya pakṣāṃścatvāro yadi bhāvā sahetukāḥ // Lank_10.652 //
XXbsu021_u:4795: nityadoṣo nivāryate anityā yadi pratyayāḥ // Lank_10.654 //
XXbsu021_u:4796: na saṃbhavo na vibhavo anityatvāddhi bāliśām /
XXbsu021_u:4797: na hi naśyamānaṃ kiṃcidvai kāraṇatvena dṛśyate // Lank_10.655 //
XXbsu021_u:4798: adṛṣṭaṃ hi kathaṃ kena nānityo jāyate bhavaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:4799: saṃgrahaiśca dametsattvān śīlena ca vaśīkaret // Lank_10.656 //
XXbsu021_u:4805: cittamātraṃ na dṛśyo 'sti dvidhā cittaṃ vidṛśyate /
XXbsu021_u:4814: gatayaḥ ṣaṭ samākhyātā yatra jāyanti dehinaḥ // Lank_10.663 //
XXbsu021_u:4816: saraṃkṣya kuśalān sarvān viśeṣo mokṣa eva vā // Lank_10.664 //
XXbsu021_u:4818: kṣaṇe kṣaṇe tvayā yanmaraṇaṃ upapattiṃ ca /
XXbsu021_u:4819: deśyate bhikṣuvargasya abhiprāyaṃ vadāhi me // Lank_10.665 //
XXbsu021_u:4823: vikalpo hi bhavejjanturvikalpo 'nyo na vidyate // Lank_10.667 //
XXbsu021_u:4825: rūpagrāhavinirmuktaṃ na janma na ca bhajyate // Lank_10.668 //
XXbsu021_u:4827: dharmadvayena vartante advayā tathatā bhavet // Lank_10.669 //
XXbsu021_u:4829: nityādayo bhavetkāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ pratyayo bhavet // Lank_10.670 //
XXbsu021_u:4831: vādastava ca buddhānāṃ tasmānnāryo mahāmune // Lank_10.671 //
XXbsu021_u:4832: śarīre vyāmamātre ca lokaṃ vai lokasamudayam /
XXbsu021_u:4837: nivārārthaṃ tu dṛṣṭīnāṃ svabhāvaṃ na vikalpayet // Lank_10.674 //
XXbsu021_u:4838: chidradoṣānna niyamo na vā cittaṃ pravartate /
XXbsu021_u:4840: ajñāna tṛṣṇā karma ca vijñānādyā ayonijāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:4841: anavasthākṛtakatvaṃ ca na kṛtvā jāyate bhavaḥ // Lank_10.676 //
XXbsu021_u:4848: yuktiṃ vadāhi me nātha dvidhādṛṣṭinivāraṇāt // Lank_10.679 //
XXbsu021_u:4850: yathāhamanye ca sadā nāstyasti na visaṃkaret /
XXbsu021_u:4856: bhāvā hi sarve svavikalpasaṃbhavāstīrthyā vikalpenti jagatsvakāraṇaiḥ //
XXbsu021_u:4858: rūpasya nāmānyetāni abhāvaṃ na vikalpayet // Lank_10.683 //
XXbsu021_u:4859: hastaḥ karo yathā loke indraḥ śakraḥ puraṃdaraḥ /
XXbsu021_u:4860: tathā hi sarvabhāvānāmabhāvaṃ na vikalpayet // Lank_10.684 //
XXbsu021_u:4861: rūpācca śūnyatā nānyā anutpādaṃ tathaiva ca /
XXbsu021_u:4870: ye vai jānanti yuktijñāste 'bhibudhyanti mannayam // Lank_10.689 //
XXbsu021_u:4873: bhāvā vidyantyanutpannā na vā brūhi mahāmune /
XXbsu021_u:4884: bhāvādbhāvāntaraṃ dṛṣṭiṃ cittaṃ vai tatsamutthitam // Lank_10.695 //
XXbsu021_u:4894: maṇḍalaṃ hi na me kiṃcinna ca deśemi dharmatām // Lank_10.700 //
XXbsu021_u:4895: dvaye sati hi doṣaḥ syāddvayaṃ buddhairviśodhitam /
XXbsu021_u:4896: śūnyāśca kṣaṇikā bhāvā niḥsvabhāvā hyajātikāḥ // Lank_10.701 //
XXbsu021_u:4898: pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca vikalpasya vadāhi me // Lank_10.702 //
XXbsu021_u:4899: yathā yena prakāreṇa jāyate viṣayo mukham /
XXbsu021_u:4901: rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā bahirdhā vai vikalpaḥ saṃpravartate /
XXbsu021_u:4906: mā vikalpaṃ vikalpetha nirvikalpā hi paṇḍitāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:4907: vikalpaṃ vikalpayaṃstasya dvayameva na nirvṛtiḥ // Lank_10.706 //
XXbsu021_u:4912: arthākāraṃ na cārtho 'sti yathābhūtaṃ vibhāvayet // Lank_10.708 //
XXbsu021_u:4914: dṛśyate na ca tannāsti tathā cotpādalakṣaṇam // Lank_10.709 //
XXbsu021_u:4916: tathā hi sarvabhāvānāṃ saṃbhavo na hyasaṃbhavaḥ // Lank_10.710 //
XXbsu021_u:4920: svabalādhīnaṃ jinādhīnaṃ pañcamaṃ śrāvakaṃ nayet // Lank_10.712 //
XXbsu021_u:4928: bhūtānāṃ saṃniveśo 'yaṃ na bhūtairbhautikaṃ kṛtam // Lank_10.716 //
XXbsu021_u:4930: vāyunā kīryate rūpaṃ kathaṃ bhūtaiḥ pravartate // Lank_10.717 //
XXbsu021_u:4934: vyatibhinnāni rūpāṇi cittaṃ rūpaṃ na bhautikam // Lank_10.719 //
XXbsu021_u:4936: kāryakāraṇamutpādya śūnyatā asti nāsti ca // Lank_10.720 //
XXbsu021_u:4945: tīrthyā vadanti janma bhūtānāṃ bhautikasya ca // Lank_10.724 //
XXbsu021_u:4946: anutpannā yato ye 'nye tīrthyāḥ kalpanti kāraṇaiḥ /
XXbsu021_u:4947: na ca budhyanti mohena sadasatpakṣamāśritāḥ // Lank_10.725 //
XXbsu021_u:4949: viśuddhalakṣaṇaṃ sattvaṃ jñānena saha tiṣṭhati // Lank_10.726 //
XXbsu021_u:4957: tathārūpyopapannasya bhavo 'rūpo na cāsti kim // Lank_10.730 //
XXbsu021_u:4959: tīrthyavādo na saṃdeho na ca budhyanti tārkikāḥ // Lank_10.731 //
XXbsu021_u:4960: rūpaṃ ca vidyate tatra ārūpye nāsti darśanam /
XXbsu021_u:4961: tadabhāvo na siddhānto na yānaṃ na ca yāyinam // Lank_10.732 //
XXbsu021_u:4963: aṣṭavidhaikadeśaṃ hi kṣaṇe kāle na gṛhṇanti // Lank_10.733 //
XXbsu021_u:4964: na pravartati yadā rūpaṃ indriyā na ca indriyaiḥ /
XXbsu021_u:4965: ato hi deśeti bhagavān kṣaṇikā indriyādayaḥ // Lank_10.734 //
XXbsu021_u:4967: apravṛttaṃ kathaṃ jñānaṃ saṃsāraṃ janayiṣyati // Lank_10.735 //
XXbsu021_u:4969: nairantaryaṃ na bhāvānāṃ vikalpaspandite gatau // Lank_10.736 //
XXbsu021_u:4970: indriyā indriyārthāśca mūḍhānāṃ na tu paṇḍitāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:4971: bālā gṛhṇanti nāmena āryā vai arthakovidāḥ // Lank_10.737 //
XXbsu021_u:4972: ṣaṣṭhaṃ hi nirupādānaḥ sopādāno na gṛhyate /
XXbsu021_u:4978: cittena saha caikatvamanyatvaṃ vai manādibhiḥ // Lank_10.740 //
XXbsu021_u:4984: sopādānastathā hyātmā tārkikaiḥ kiṃ na gṛhyate // Lank_10.743 //
XXbsu021_u:4986: dṛṣṭāntaṃ kiṃ na kurvanti tārkikā ātmasādhakāḥ // Lank_10.744 //
XXbsu021_u:4992: lakṣaṇaṃ yadi jānāti jñānaṃ saṃjāyate nayam // Lank_10.747 //
XXbsu021_u:4994: ātmanā saha saṃyuktaṃ na ca dharmāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // Lank_10.748 //
XXbsu021_u:5001: na pudgalo na ca skandhā buddho jñānamanāsravam /
XXbsu021_u:5002: sadāśāntiṃ vibhāvitvā gacchāmi śaraṇaṃ hyaham // Lank_10.752 //
XXbsu021_u:5004: ātmanā saha saṃyuktaṃ deśeti vadatāṃvaraḥ // Lank_10.753 //
XXbsu021_u:5006: tairācitāni karmāṇi yataḥ kliśyanti tāvubhau // Lank_10.754 //
XXbsu021_u:5011: tiṣṭhanti na ca naśyante ātmā doṣaistathā vinā // Lank_10.756 //
XXbsu021_u:5015: vidyamānā na dṛśyanti tathā skandheṣu pudgalam // Lank_10.758 //
XXbsu021_u:5017: akovidā na gṛhṇanti tathā skandheṣu pudgalam // Lank_10.759 //
XXbsu021_u:5018: yathā hi garbho garbhiṇyāṃ vidyate na ca dṛśyate /
XXbsu021_u:5019: ātmā hi tadvatskandheṣu ayuktijño na paśyati // Lank_10.760 //
XXbsu021_u:5021: na paśyanti ayuktijñāstathā skandheṣu pudgalam // Lank_10.761 //
XXbsu021_u:5023: vidyamānāṃ na paśyanti tathā skandheṣu pudgalam // Lank_10.762 //
XXbsu021_u:5025: samādhayo viśeṣāśca asatyātmani nāsti vai // Lank_10.763 //
XXbsu021_u:5027: sa vaktavyo bhavedvijñaḥ svavikalpaṃ pradarśaya // Lank_10.764 //
XXbsu021_u:5033: svarasaṃ vidyate teṣu anāsvādyaṃ na gṛhyate // Lank_10.767 //
XXbsu021_u:5035: na ca paśyantyavidvāṃso vidvān dṛṣṭvā vimucyate // Lank_10.768 //
XXbsu021_u:5037: yatra yasmādyadarthaṃ ca samūhaṃ nāvadhāryate // Lank_10.769 //
XXbsu021_u:5038: vilakṣaṇā hi vai dharmāścittamekaṃ na gṛhyate /
XXbsu021_u:5041: cittānupaśyī ca yogī cittaṃ citte na paśyati /
XXbsu021_u:5042: paśyako dṛśyanirjāto dṛśyaṃ kiṃ hetusaṃbhavam // Lank_10.771 //
XXbsu021_u:5045: paurāṇikamidaṃ vartma ahaṃ te ca tathāgatāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:5047: kāmadhātau tathārūpye na vai buddho vibudhyate /
XXbsu021_u:5051: asatyātmani māyādyā dharmā nāstyasti vai katham /
XXbsu021_u:5052: bālānāṃ khyāti tathatā kathaṃ nāsti nirātmikā // Lank_10.776 //
XXbsu021_u:5054: anutpannamidaṃ sarvaṃ na ca bālairvibhāvyate // Lank_10.777 //
XXbsu021_u:5056: dvāvapyetau na janakau kāraṇaiḥ kalpyate katham // Lank_10.778 //
XXbsu021_u:5064: bālānāṃ ca viśeṣeṇa brahmacaryaṃ na vidyate // Lank_10.782 //
XXbsu021_u:5066: vyañjitaiḥ pravrajantyeke na cānye ca pravādinaḥ // Lank_10.783 //
XXbsu021_u:5069: mayi nirvṛte varṣaśate vyāso vai bhāratastathā /
XXbsu021_u:5070: pāṇḍavāḥ kauravā rāmaḥ paścānmaurī bhaviṣyati // Lank_10.785 //
XXbsu021_u:5071: mauryā nandāśca guptāśca tato mlecchā nṛpādhamāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:5073: kaliyugānte lokaiśca saddharmo hi na bhāvitaḥ // Lank_10.786 //
XXbsu021_u:5078: cātuṃ rvarṇā nṛpendrāśca ṛṣayo dharmameva ca // Lank_10.788 //
XXbsu021_u:5079: vedāśca yajñaṃ dānaṃ ca dharmasthā vartsyate punaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:5081: evaṃ mayā śrutādibhyo loko vai vibhramiṣyati // Lank_10.789 //
XXbsu021_u:5086: vastrapūtaṃ jalaṃ peyaṃ kaṭisūtraṃ ca dhārayet /
XXbsu021_u:5087: upapadyamānaṃ kālena bhaikṣyaṃ vā nīcavarjitam // Lank_10.791 //
XXbsu021_u:5091: bhuktvā tu suciraṃ dvīpāṃstṛṣṇayā vipraṇaśyati // Lank_10.793 //
XXbsu021_u:5093: ahaṃ cānye kṛtayuge śākyasiṃhaḥ kalau yuge // Lank_10.794 //
XXbsu021_u:5095: evamādyāni tīrthyāni nirvṛte me bhaviṣyati // Lank_10.795 //
XXbsu021_u:5099: evaṃ me nirvṛte paścādevamādyaṃ bhaviṣyati // Lank_10.797 //
XXbsu021_u:5100: mātā ca me vasumatiḥ pitā vipraḥ prajāpatiḥ /
XXbsu021_u:5101: kātyāyanasagotro 'haṃ nāmnā vai virajo jinaḥ // Lank_10.798 //
XXbsu021_u:5102: campāyāṃ haṃ samutpannaḥ pitāpi ca pitāmahaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:5110: ahaṃ ca virajo 'nye vai sarve te kṛtino jināḥ // Lank_10.802 //
XXbsu021_u:5113: na dvāpare na tretāyāṃ na paścācca kalau yuge /
XXbsu021_u:5114: saṃbhavo lokanāthānāṃ saṃbudhyante kṛte yuge // Lank_10.804 //
XXbsu021_u:5117: dvayaṅgulaṃ tryaṅgulaṃ vāpi candraṃ candrāntaraṃ bhavet /
XXbsu021_u:5118: anyathā citryamānaṃ hi lobhanīyaṃ hi bāliśān // Lank_10.806 //
XXbsu021_u:5123: ekaṃ ca bahudhā nāsti vailakṣaṇyānna kutracit /
XXbsu021_u:5124: vāyubhā grāhakāḥ sarve kṣetravaddāyakā bhavet // Lank_10.809 //
XXbsu021_u:5125: yadyekaṃ bahudhā vai syātsarve hyakṛtakā bhavet /
XXbsu021_u:5128: ekaṃ hi bahudhā bhavati tārkikāṇāmayaṃ nayaḥ // Lank_10.811 //
XXbsu021_u:5130: godhūmadhānyajātāni ekaṃ hi bahudhā katham // Lank_10.812 //
XXbsu021_u:5136: rakṣakaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ rājā balī mahīpatiḥ // Lank_10.815 //
XXbsu021_u:5143: dadāti brahmā maheśvaro vanabhūmau vyavasthite // Lank_10.818 //
XXbsu021_u:5144: bhaviṣyati mahāyogī nāmnā vai virajo muniḥ /
XXbsu021_u:5145: mokṣasya deśakaḥ śāstā munīnāmeṣa vai dhvajaḥ // Lank_10.819 //
XXbsu021_u:5149: indro virūḍhakādyāśca vanabhūmau dadanti me // Lank_10.821 //
XXbsu021_u:5151: sādhayiṣyatyanutpādaṃ vāṅbhātraṃ kīrtyate tu vai // Lank_10.822 //
XXbsu021_u:5153: antarā kimavasthāsau yāvadrūpaṃ na jānati // Lank_10.823 //
XXbsu021_u:5155: rūpaṃ na tiṣṭhate kiṃcitkimālambya pravartsyate // Lank_10.824 //
XXbsu021_u:5157: na prasiddhaṃ kathaṃ tasya kṣaṇabhaṅgo 'vadhāryate // Lank_10.825 //
XXbsu021_u:5161: bhikṣutvaṃ samayaprāptirdṛṣṭā vai kṣaṇikā katham // Lank_10.827 //
XXbsu021_u:5163: abhūtikā ca bhūtāni bhūtāḥ kiṃcitkva cāgatau // Lank_10.828 //
XXbsu021_u:5167: pradhāne vidyate kāryaṃ kāryaṃ svātmaprasādhitam // Lank_10.830 //
XXbsu021_u:5170: yathā hi pāradaḥ śuddha upakleśairna lipyate /
XXbsu021_u:5171: ālayaṃ hi tathā śuddhamāśrayaḥ sarvadehinām // Lank_10.832 //
XXbsu021_u:5174: lavaṇādibhiśca lāvaṇyaṃ bījavatkiṃ na vartate // Lank_10.833 //
XXbsu021_u:5175: anyatve ca tadanyatve ubhayaṃ nobhaye tathā /
XXbsu021_u:5176: astitvaṃ nirupādānaṃ na ca nāsti na saṃskṛtam // Lank_10.834 //
XXbsu021_u:5180: anirdhāryaṃ vadantyātmā nopādāne na cānyataḥ // Lank_10.836 //
XXbsu021_u:5182: ekatvena tadanyatvena na ca budhyanti tārkikāḥ // Lank_10.837 //
XXbsu021_u:5183: darpaṇe udake netre yatha bimbaṃ pradṛśyate /
XXbsu021_u:5185: bhāvyaṃ vibhāvanādhyātā mārgaḥ satyā ca darśanam /
XXbsu021_u:5186: etatrayaṃ vibhāvento mucyante hi kudarśanaiḥ // Lank_10.839 //
XXbsu021_u:5187: dṛṣṭaṃ naṣṭaṃ yathā vidyuccakraṃ chidragṛhe yathā /
XXbsu021_u:5188: pariṇāmaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ bālairiva na kalpayet // Lank_10.840 //
XXbsu021_u:5198: sattvakāyā yathā citrā gatyāgatyāṃ vibhāvayet // Lank_10.845 //
XXbsu021_u:5211: nadīdīpabījavattasya nirgamaḥ kiṃ na kathyate // Lank_10.851 //
XXbsu021_u:5212: anutpanne ca vijñāne ajñānādi na vidyate /
XXbsu021_u:5213: tadabhāve na vijñānaṃ saṃtatyā jāyate katham // Lank_10.852 //
XXbsu021_u:5220: pavanaṃ hi vahnerdahanaṃ preraṇe na tu saṃbhave /
XXbsu021_u:5221: prerya nirvāyate tena kathaṃ sattvaprasādhakāḥ // Lank_10.856 //
XXbsu021_u:5225: sattvaḥ pravartitaḥ kena vahnivatkalpyate yataḥ // Lank_10.858 //
XXbsu021_u:5227: nairātmā sārthavannityaṃ cittena saha vartate // Lank_10.859 //
XXbsu021_u:5229: agnirhyasādhakasteṣāṃ na ca budhyanti tārkikāḥ // Lank_10.860 //
XXbsu021_u:5230: cittaṃ sattvāśca nirvāṇaṃ prakṛtyā bhāsurā nu vai /
XXbsu021_u:5234: dṛṣṭāśca te yathābhūtaṃ dṛṣṭvā kleśā vidāritāḥ /
XXbsu021_u:5237: na ca budhyanti durmedhā avaktavyaśca kathyate // Lank_10.864 //
XXbsu021_u:5239: bherī yathā candanajā bālaiḥ kurvanti nānyathā /
XXbsu021_u:5243: imaṃ nayaṃ yo 'numinoti yuktitaḥ prasādavān yogaparo hyakalpanaḥ /
XXbsu021_u:5244: anāśrito hyarthaparo bhavedasau hiraṇmayīṃ dharmagatiṃ pradīpayet //
XXbsu021_u:5245: bhāvābhāvapratyayamohakalpanā kudṛṣṭijālaṃ samalaṃ hi tasya tu /
XXbsu021_u:5250: mano hyālayasaṃbhūtaṃ vijñānaṃ ca manobhavam // Lank_10.870 //
XXbsu021_u:5258: yadā saṃjāyate dṛṣṭiḥ saṃsāraśca pravartate // Lank_10.874 //
XXbsu021_u:5265: nivartate yadā cittaṃ nivṛttaṃ paśyato jagat /
XXbsu021_u:5266: muditāṃ labhate bhūmiṃ buddhabhūmiṃ labhanti ca // Lank_10.878 //
XXbsu021_u:5269: karoti sattvakṛtyāni pratibimbaṃ yathā jale // Lank_10.879 //
XXbsu021_u:5276: yathā hi grantho granthena yuktyā yuktistathā yadi /
XXbsu021_u:5277: ato yuktirbhavedyuktimanyathā tu na kalpayet // Lank_10.883 //
XXbsu021_u:5278: cakṣuḥ karma ca tṛṣṇā ca avidyāyoniśastathā /
XXbsu021_u:5281: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
XXbsu021_u:5282: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodho evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
